body.p: bhagavān vararuci mupulakən sāra-sāra saṅ hyaṅ aṣṭādaśaparva, gave bhagavān byāsa, mataṅnyan panamaskāra sira i bhagavān byāsa, liṅnira,

jajñe bahujñaṁ paramābhyudāraṁ
yaṁ dvīpamadhye sutam ātmabhāvāt|
parāśarāt satyavatī maharṣiṁ
tasmai namo ’jñānatamonudāya||
jajñe bahujñaṃ param atyudāraṃ
yaṃ dvīpamadhye sutam ātmavantam|
parāśarād gandhavatī maharṣiṃ
tasmai namo ’jñānatamonudāya||
hana sira maharṣi, tan hana kapiṅgiṅnira, kinatvaṅan iṅ triloka, rumantasakən ptəṅniṅ ajñānaniṅ sarvabhāva, anak saṅ satyavatī, patəmvandevpatənvanbal lavan bhagavān parāśara, prasūta ri tṅahnikaṅ kr̥ṣṇadvīpa, bhagavān byāsa ṅaranira, sira ta səmbahən, kamnaniṅ hulun mujarakna sāraniṅ gavenira aji.

yathā samudro ’timahān
yathā ca himavān giriḥ|
ubhau ratnanidhī khyātau
tathā bhāratam ucyate||
yathā samudro bhagavān
yathā ca himavān giriḥ
khyātāv ubhau ratnanidhī
tathā bhāratam ucyate
nahanbalnahandev kottamanira, kady aṅganiṅ tasik lavan gunuṅ himavān, an kalyan mās maṇik sarvamūlya, maṅkana ta sakvehnikiṅ-nikaṅ aji bhāratakathā ginavenira, an tasakan iṅ uttamarasa makādi rahasyajñāna.

idaṁ kavivarair nityam
ākhyānam upajīvyate|
udayaprepsubhir bhr̥tyair
abhijāta iveśvaraḥ||
idaṃ sarvaiḥ kavivarair
ākhyānam upajīvyate
udayaprepsubhir bhṛtyair
abhijāta iveśvaraḥ
kunəṅkunaṅ kottaman saṅ hyaṅ bhāratakathā, ri denyan sira nitya pinakopajīvana saṅ kavivara, kady aṅgan saṅ prabhu sujanmān pinakopajīvananiṅ vadva aṅusirvadvāṅusir vibhava.

itihāsottamād asmāj
jāyante kavibuddhayaḥ|
pañcabhya iva bhūtebhyo
lokasaṁvidhayas trayaḥ||
apayāpan ikiṅikaṅ aji bhāratakathā, saṅkaniṅ buddhi saṅ kavi, kady aṅganiṅ triloka an vijil saṅke pañcamahābhūta.

anāśrityaitad ākhyānaṁ
kathā bhuvi na vidyate|
āhāram anupāśritya
śarīrasyeva dhāraṇā ||
anāśrityaitad ākhyānaṃ
kathā bhuvi na vidyate
āhāram anapāśritya
śarīrasyeva dhāraṇam
tātan hana aji riṅ bhuvana, tan pakāśraya ikiṅikaṅ byāsavasana, kady aṅganiṅ śarīra tan hana, ya tan pakāśrayaṅ āhāra.

śrutvā tv idam upākhyānaṁ śrāvyam anyan na rocate |
puṁs ko kila rutaṁ śrutvā rukṣā dhvāṁkṣasya vāg iva ||6||
lavan vaneh kottamanira, yan hana sira tlas ruməṅə: rasaniki saṅ hyaṅ aji, pisaniṅu juga sira ahyuna ruməṅva kathāntara, tka riṅ gīta veṇu vīṇādi, kady aṅganiṅ vvaṅ ruməṅə: suśabdaniṅ kuvoṅ, huvus ruməsəp ri hati laṅəniṅ svaranya, amaṅun harṣaniṅ citta, tan hana gantāni kahyuna ruməṅva rəsniṅ śabdaniṅ gagak.

maṅkana liṅ bhagavān vararucin panamaskāra riṅ bhagavān byāsa, nəhər umujarakən kottamanikiṅ bhāratakathā, ikiṅ inaranan sārasamuccaya, sāra ṅaraniṅ viśeṣa, samuccaya papupulnya, nahan mataṅnyan sārasamuccaya ṅaranikiṅ saṅ hyaṅ aji, daməl bhagavān vararuci, nihan pinkət bhagavān vaiśampāyana iṅ mahārāja janamejaya, i kālanira cumaritākən ikaṅ bharatakathā, yatiki vitaniṅ sārasamuccaya.

dharme cārthe ca kāme ca mokṣe ca bharatarṣabha |
yad ihāsti tad anyatra yan nehāsti na tat kvacit ||7||
anaku kamuṅ janamejaya, salvirniṅ vara-varah, yāvat makapadārthaṅ caturvarga, sāvataranya, sakopanyāsanya, hana juga ya ṅke, saṅkṣepanya, ikiṅ hana ṅke, ya ika hana iṅ len saṅkeriki, ikaṅ tan hana ṅke, tan hana ika riṅ len saṅkeriki.

mānuṣaḥ sarvabhūteṣu vartate vai śubhāśubhe |
aśubheṣu samāviṣṭaṁ śubheṣv evāvakārayet ||8||
ri sakvehniṅ sarvabhūta, ikiṅ janma vvaṅ juga vnaṅ gumavayakən ikaṅ śubhāśubhakarma, kunəṅ panəntasakna riṅ śubhakarma juga ikaṅ aśubhakarma, phalaniṅ dadi vvaṅ.

upabhogaiḥ parityaktaṁ nātmānam avasādayet |
caṇḍālatve ’pi mānuṣyaṁ sarvathā tato durlabham ||9||
mataṅyan hayva juga vvaṅ manastāpa, an tan paribhava, si dadi vvaṅ ta pva kagə:ṅakna ri ambək, apayapan paramadurlabha ikiṅ si janma mānuṣa ṅaranya, yadyapi caṇḍālayoni tuvi.

iyaṁ hi yoniḥ prathamā yāṁ prāpya jagatīpate |
ātmānaṁ śakyate trātuṁ karmabhiḥ śubhalakṣaṇaiḥ ||10||
apan ikiṅ dadi vvaṅ, uttama juga ya, nimittaniṅ maṅkana, vnaṅ vi ya tumuluṅ avaknya saṅkeṅ saṅsāra, makasādhanaṅ śubhakarma, hiṅaniṅ kottamaniṅ dadi vvaṅ ika.

ihaiva narakavyādheś cikitsāṁ na karoti yaḥ |
gatvā nirauṣadhaṁ sthānaṁ sarujaḥ kiṁ kariṣyati ||11||
hana pva vvaṅ tan gavayakən ikaṅ śubhakarma, tambaniṅ narakaloka kāṅkən lara, pjah pva ya, vvaṅ alara mara riṅ deśa katunan tamba ta ṅaranika, rūpaniṅ tan katmu ikaṅ enak kolahanya.

sopānabhūtaṁ svargasya mānuṣyaṁ prāpya durlabham |
tathātmānaṁ samādadhyād dhvaṁseta na punar yathā ||12||
paramārthanya, pəṅpə:ṅən ta pva katəmvanikiṅ si dadi vvaṅ, durlabha vi ya ta, sākṣāt haṇḍaniṅ mara riṅ svarga ika, sanimittaniṅ tan tibā muvah ta pva damlakna.

karmabhūmir iyaṁ brahman phalabhūmir asau matā |
iha yat kurute karma tat paratropabhujyate ||13||
apan ikiṅ janma maṅke, pagavayan śubhāśubhakarma juga ya, ikaṅ ri pəna pabhuktyan karmaphala ika, kaliṅanya, ikaṅ śubhāśubhakarma maṅke, ri pəna ika an kabhukti phalanya, ri pgatni kabhuktyanya, maṅjanma ta ya muvah, tumūta vāsanāniṅ karmaphala, vāsanā ṅaraniṅ saṅskāra, turahniṅ ambəmātra, ya tinūtniṅ paribhāṣā, svargacyuta, narakacyuta, kunaṅ ikaṅ śubhāśubhakarma ri pəna, tan paphala ika, mataṅnyan maṅke juga pəṅpə:ṅa śubhāśubhakarma.

mānuṣyaṁ durlabhaṁ prāpya vidyullasitacañcalam |
bhavakṣaye matiḥ kāryā bhāvopakaraṇeṣu ca ||14||
ikiṅ taṅ janma vvaṅ, kṣaṇikasvabhāva ta ya, tan pahi lavan kḍapniṅ kilat, durlabha tovi, mataṅnyan pə:ṅakna ya ri kagavayanniṅ dharmasādhana, sakāraṇaniṅ manāśanaṅ saṅsāra, svargaphala kunaṅ.

yo durlabhataraṁ prāpya mānuṣyaṁ lobhato naraḥ |
dharmāvamantā kāmātmā bhavet sakalavañcitaḥ ||15||
hana pva tuməmuṅ dadi vvaṅ, vimukha riṅ dharmasādhana, jnək riṅ arthakāma ārah, lobhāmbəknya, ya ika kabañcana ṅaranya.

mānuṣyaṁ mahāduṣprāpyaṁ taḍidvilasitopamam |
tal labdhvā yadi saṁsārān nāpakrāmati vañcitaḥ ||16||
ikaṅ maṅgih si dadi vvaṅ, prasiddha vvaṅ riṅ dharmasādhāna, tātan əntas saṅke saṅsāra, kabañcana ta ṅaranika.

ūrdhvabāhur viraumy eṣa na ca kaś cic chr̥ṇoti me |
dharmād arthaś ca kāmaś ca sa kim arthaṁ na sevyate ||17||
nihan mata kami maṅke, manavai, maṅuvuh, mapitutur, liṅ mami, ikaṅ artha, kāma, malamakən dharma juga ṅulaha, hayva palaṅpaṅ lavan dharma maṅkana liṅ mami, ndātan hana juga aṅrəṅə̄ ri heturnyan evəh saṅ makolah dharmasādhana, apa kunaṅ hetunya.

kāmārthau lipsamānas tu dharmam evāditaś caret |
na hi dharmād apetyārthaḥ kāmo vāpi kadācana ||18||
yan paramārthanya, yan arthakāma sādhyan, dharma juga ləkasakna rumuhun, niyata katəmvaniṅ arthakāma mne, tan paramārtha vi katəmvaniṅ arthakāma, deniṅ anasar sakeṅ dharma.

dhārmikaṁ pūjayanti ca na dhanāḍhyaṁ na kāminam |
dhane sukhakalā kā cid dharme tu paramaṁ sukham ||19||
kunaṅ saṅ paṇḍita, saṅ dhārmika juga, inastutinira, inaləmnira, an sira prasiddha anmu sukha, tan paṅaləm sugih, kāmī, apan tan tuhu sukha, ri hananiṅ ahaṅkārājñāna, ri sḍəṅniṅ dhanakāma vyavahāra.

dharma eva plavo nānyaḥ svargaṁ samabhivāñchatām |
sa ca naur vaṇijas taṭaṁ jaladheḥ pāram icchataḥ ||20||
ikaṅ dharma ṅaranya, hnuniṅ mara riṅ svarga ika, kadi gatiniṅ parahu, an hnuniṅ baṇyāga nəntas iṅ tasik.

yatnaḥ kāmārthamokṣāṇāṁ kr̥to ’pi hi vipadyate |
dharmāya punar āraMBhaḥ saṅkalpo ’pi na niṣphalaḥ ||21||
ikaṅ kayatnan ri kagavayaniṅ kāma, artha, mvaṅ mokṣa, dadi ika tan paphala, kunaṅ ikaṅ kayatnan riṅ dharmasādhana, niyata maphala ika, yadyapin aṅən-aṅənan juga, maphala atika.

yathādityaḥ samudyan vai tamaḥ sarvaṁ vyapohati |
evaṁ kalyāṇam ātiṣṭhan sarvapāpaṁ vyapohati ||22||
kadi krama saṅ hyaṅ āditya, an vijil, humilaṅakən ptəṅniṅ rāt, maṅkana tikaṅ vvaṅ mulahakən iṅ dharma, an hilaṅakən salviriṅ pāpa.

yathā yathā hi puruṣaḥ kalyāṇe ramate manaḥ |
tathā tathāsya siddhyanti sarvārthā nātra saṁśayaḥ ||23||
salviraniṅ vvaṅ kaniṣṭhamadhyamottama tuvi, yāvat gave hayu kajnəkni hatinya, niyata siddhaniṅ sasinādhyanya.

dharmaḥ sadā hitaḥ puṁsāṁ dharmaś caivāśrayaḥ satām |
dharmāl lokās trayas tāta pravr̥ttāḥ sacarācarāḥ ||24||
mvaṅ kottaman ikaṅ dharma, prasiddha saṅkaniṅ hitāvasāna, irikaṅ mulahakən ya, mvaṅ pinakāśraya saṅ paṇḍita, saṅkṣepanya, dharma mantasakən ikaṅ triloka.

yasya notkrāmati matir dharmamārgānusāriṇī |
tam āhuḥ puṇyakarmāṇaṁ na śocyo mitrabāndhavaiḥ ||25||
hana pva vvaṅ tan liṅgar apagəh buddhinya, ar tūtakən kadamlaniṅ dharmasādhana, ya ika vvaṅ bhāgyamanta liṅ saṅ paṇḍita, tan kalarākna deniṅ kadaṅ-mitranya, yadyan manāśakānapa-napamānāśakāna panapanaanapa-napa = atapa-tapa? Neither form is attested in OJED. Raghu Vira’s critical apparatus (notes 8 and 9) suggests that at least one manuscript reads mānāśakānapamaṅatīta°, which could be used as support for an alternative emn (without reduplication) manāśakānapa maṅatīta° (with anapa = atapa). But a reduplicated form seems to be supported by the majority of witnesses, if this is what may be inferred from Raghu Vira’s negative apparatus. maṅatīta jīvita tuvi.

yathekṣuhetor iha secitaṁ payaḥ
tr̥ṇāni vallīr api samprasiñcati |
tathā naro dharmapathena sañcaran
yaśāṁsi kāmāni vasūni cāśnute ||26||
kunaṅ paramārthanya, kady aṅganiṅ vvai maṅəna tbu, tan ikaṅ tbu juga kānugrahan denika, milu tkaniṅ tr̥ṇalatādi, saparək ikaṅ tbu milu kānugrahan, maṅkana taṅ vvaṅ makapravr̥ttiṅ dharma, artha, kāma, yaśa kasambi denika.

surūpatām ātmaguṇaṁ ca vistaraṁ
kulānvayaṁ dravyasamr̥ddhisaṁcayam |
naro hi sarvvaṁ labhate yathākr̥taṁ
sadā śubhenātmakr̥tena karmaṇā ||27||
kunaṅ ikaṅ vvaṅ gumavay ikaṅ śubhakarma, janmanyan saṅke riṅ svargga dlāha, lituhayu maguṇa, sujanma, sugih, mavīrya, phalaniṅ śubhakarmāvasāna tinmunya.

kāntāravanadurgeṣu kr̥cchreṣv āpatsu saMBhrame |
udyateṣu ca śastreṣu nāsti dharmavatāṁ bhayam ||28||
lavan ta vaneh, riṅ hlət, riṅ alas, riṅ priṅga, riṅ laya, salvirniṅ duhkhahetu, ri papraṅan kunəṅ, tar tka juga ikaṅ bhaya, ri saṅ dhārmika, apan ikaṅ śubhakarma rumakṣa sira.

manonukūlāḥ pramadā rūpavatyaḥ svalaṅkr̥tāḥ |
vāsaḥ prāsādapr̥ṣṭhe ca bhavanti śubhakarmaṇām ||29||
lavan ta vaneh, ikaṅ strīratna anakbi rahayu, saṅsaṅan riṅ sinaṇḍaṅ, vruh ri saṅinakanaEmend maṅinakana? riṅ jalu-jalu, lavan umah rahayu, makādi prāsādapr̥ṣṭha, upalakṣaṇa riṅ bhogopabhoga, mvaṅ anarghyaanardhya vastrābharaṇādi, dr̥bya saṅ puṇyakārī ika kabeh.

nipānam iva maṇḍūkāḥ saraḥ pūrṇam ivāṇḍajāḥ |
śubhakarmāṇam āyānti sahāyāś ca dhanāni ca ||30||
apan ikaṅ balakośavāhana, tumkākən avaknya juga ya ri saṅ puṇyakarma, kadi kramaniṅ maṇḍūka, an parākna avaknya riṅ sumur, mvaṅ ikaṅ manuk, an tkākna avaknya riṅ talaga.

arjayej jñānam arthāṁś ca vidvān amaravat sthitaḥ |
keśeṣv iva gr̥hītaḥ san mr̥tyunā dharmam ācaret ||31||
mataṅnya deyanika saṅ meṅət, apagəh kadi tan kneṅ pāti, lviraniran paṅarjana jñāna, artha, kunaṅ yan paṅarjana dharma, kadi katona rumaṅgut mastakanira, ta pva ikaṅ mr̥tyu denira, ahosanā palayvana juga sira.

mastakasthāyinaṁ mr̥tyuṁ yadi paśyed ayaṁ janaḥ |
āhāro ’pi na rucyeta kimutākr̥tyakāritā ||32||
yan vruha ktikaṅ vvaṅ an nirantarāṅinte manuṅgaṅ ri mastakanya ikaṅ mr̥tyu, yaya tan hyunanya maṅana tuvi, ṅūni-ṅūni kagavayaniṅ adharma.

yuvaiva dharmam anvicched yuvā vittaṁ yuvā śrutam |
tiryag bhavati vai darbha utpatan na ca viddhyati ||33||
mataṅnya deyaniṅ vvvaṅ, pəṅpə̄ṅan ikaṅ kayauvanan, paṇḍəṅniṅ avak, sādhanākna ri kārjananiṅ dharma, artha, jñāna, kunaṅ apan tan paḍa kaśaktiniṅ atuha lavan rarai, dr̥ṣṭānta nahan yaṅ alalaṅ atuha, tlas ruməpa, marin alaṇḍəp ika.

pūrve vayasi yaḥ śāntaḥ sa śānta iti me matiḥ |
dhātuṣu kṣīyamāṇeṣu śamaḥ kasya na vidyate ||34||
lavan ta vaneh, ikaṅ upaśaman, rarai ktikaṅ sinaṅgah upaśama, apan jātiṅ upaśama, yan katkān tuha, ri kṣayaniṅ dhātu ṅke riṅ śarīr, nāṅ vāta, pitta, śleṣma.

yuvatvāpekṣayā bālo vr̥ddhatvāpekṣayā yuvā |
mr̥tyor utsaṅgam āruhya sthaviraḥ kim apekṣate ||35||
nihan parikramaniṅ dadi, kayauvanan, aṅgəh inantiniṅ kararayan, ikaṅ kayauvanan, si tuha, aṅgəh inantinika, katmu pva si tuha, haneṅ kisapvaniṅ mr̥tyu ta ṅaranika, aparan tikaṅ aṅgəh inantinya, ṅhiṅ si pāti juga, mataṅnyan usə̄nakna kagavayaniṅ dharmapravr̥tti.

purā śarīram antako bhinatti rogasārathiḥ |
prasahya jīvitakṣaye śubhaṁ mahat samāharet ||36||
apan saṅ hyaṅ mr̥tyu ṅaranira, sarvavyādhi pinakasārathinira, nimittaniṅ hurip kṣaya, kṣaya pvaṅ hurip, tka taṅ pāti, mataṅnya hayva pramāda, usə̄nakna jugaṅ śubhakarma, tumuntunakna kita riṅ paran.

yuvaiva dharmaśīlaḥ syād anityaṁ khalu jīvitam |
ko hi jānāti kasyādya mr̥tyusenā patiṣyati ||37||
mataṅnya pəṅpə̄ṅan vvaṅ ta, maṅken rarai ta pva kitan lkasakna agave dharmasādhana, apan anitya ikiṅ hurip, syapa kāri vruha ri tkaniṅ pāti, syapa maṅvruhana ri tkaniṅ pātinya vih.

ā dhūmāgrān nivartante jñātayaḥ saha bāndhavaiḥ |
yena taiḥ saha gantavyaṁ tat karma sukr̥taṁ kuru ||38||
apanikaṅ kadaṅ-varga rakva, riṅ tunvan hiṅan ikan paṅatərakən, kunaṅ ikaṅ tumūt, sahāyanikaṅ dadi hyaṅ riṅ paran, gavenya śubhāśubha juga, mataṅnyan prihəna tikiṅ gave hayu, sahāyanta anuntunakna ri pə̄na dlāha.

mr̥taṁ śarīram utsr̥jya kāṣṭaloṣṭasamaṁ janaḥ |
muhūrtam uparudyātha tato yānti parāṅmukhāḥ ||39||
lavan tattvanikaṅ kadaṅ ṅaranya, ri pātinta, kāri tikaṅ śarīra tan pamūlya, makāntaṅ timpalakna, tan hana pahinya lavan varta viṅka, ya ta sinuṅkəman iṅ kadaṅta, irikaṅ sādhana, i vkasan luṅhā tika malakaṅ, mataṅnyan prihən tikaṅ dharmasādhana, sahāyanta tumkākna kita riṅ bhukti muktipada.

eko dharmaḥ paraṁ śreyaḥ kṣamaikā śāntir ucyate |
vidyaikā paramā tuṣṭir ahiṁsaikā sukhāvahā ||40||
ṅhiṅ dharma kta sākṣāt hayu, sākṣāt vibhava ṅaranya, ṅhiṅ lṅaniṅ manah, klānta riṅ panas tis, kta prasiddha tamba, prāyaścitta, pamaḍəm lara ṅaranya, ṅhiṅ samyagjñāna tuturta, ajinta, vruh ta riṅ tattva, paramārtha inak-ambək ṅaranya, ṅhiṅ ahiṅsā si tan pamāti-māti, si tan hana kakrodha, byaktaniṅ sukha ṅaranya.

ekaṁ yadi bhavec chāstraṁ śreyo niḥsaṁśayaṁ bhavet |
bahutvād iha śāstrāṇāṁ guhaṁ śreyaḥ praveśitam ||41||
yan tuṅgala kta saṅ hyaṅ āgama, tan saṅśaya ṅvaṅ irikaṅ sinaṅgah hayu, svargāpavargaphala, akveh mara sira, kapva dudū pakṣanira sovaṅ-sovaṅ, hetuniṅ vulaṅun, tan aṅgah riṅ aṅgəhakna, hana riṅ guhāgahvara, sira saṅ hyaṅ hayu.

mā tāta vr̥ddhān paribhūḥ śikṣasvāgamayasva ca |
aher iva hi dharmasya sūkṣmā duranugā gatiḥ ||42||
mataṅnya bapa, hayva juga masampai riṅ vvaṅ matuha, lot atañāminta vinarah, riṅ kadi sira ta pva kita, apan ikaṅ dharma ṅaranya, paḍa lavan ulā, ri kapva tan kinaniścayan larinira, dadyan saka lor, dadyan saka kidul marikaṅ ulā.

śrutir vedaḥ samākhyāto dharmaśāstraṁ tu vai smr̥tiḥ |
te sarvārtheṣv amīmāṁsye tābhyāṁ dharmo vinirbhr̥taḥ ||43||
nyaṅ ujarakna sakarəṅ, śruti ṅaranya saṅ hyaṅ caturveda, saṅ hyaṅ dharmaśāstra, smr̥ti ṅaranira, saṅ hyaṅ śruti, lavan saṅ hyaṅ smr̥ti, sira juga pramāṇākna, tūtakna vara-varahnira, riṅ asiṅ prayojana, yāvat maṅkana paripūrṇa haləp saṅ hyaṅ dharmapravr̥tti.

cāturvarṇyaṁ tathā lokāś catvāraś cāśramāḥ pr̥thak |
bhūtaṁ bhavyaṁ bhaviṣyac ca sarvaṁ vedāt prasidhyaddhyati ||44||
apan saṅ hyaṅ veda ṅaranira, sira saṅkaniṅ caturvarṇa, sira tumiṅkah utpattinya, tka ri ācāranya, sovaṅ-sovaṅ, maṅkanaṅ rāt, maṅkanaṅ caturāśrama, caturāśrama ṅaran saṅ brahmacārī, gr̥hastha, vānaprastha, bhikṣuka, vastu huvus dadi, vastu sḍəṅ hana, vastu yāṅkən dadya kunəṅ, ika ta kabeh, saṅ hyaṅ veda saṅkanikaṅ.

itihāsapurāṇābhyāṁ vedaṁ samupabr̥ṁhayet |
bibhety alpaśrutād vedo mām ayaṁ pracariṣyati ||45||
ndān saṅ hyaṅ veda, paripūrṇākna sira, makasādhana saṅ hyaṅ itihāsa, saṅ hyaṅ purāṇa, apan atakut, saṅ hyaṅ veda riṅ akḍik ajinya, liṅnira, kamuṅ hyaṅ, hayva tiki umarā ri kami, liṅnira maṅkana rakva atakut.

śrutyuktaḥ paramo dharmas tathā smr̥tigato ’paraḥ |
śiṣṭācāraḥ paraḥ proktas trayo dharmāḥ sanātanāḥ ||46||
kunaṅ keṅətakna, sāsiṅ kājar de saṅ hyaṅ śruti, dharma ṅaranika, sakājar de saṅ hyaṅ smr̥ti kunəṅ, dharma ta ṅaranika, śiṣṭācāra kunəṅ, ācāranika saṅ śiṣṭa, dharma ta ṅaranika, śiṣṭa ṅaran saṅ satyavādī, saṅ āpta, saṅ patīrthan, saṅ panaḍahan upadeśa, saṅkṣepa ika katiga, dharma ṅaranira.

na tat parasya sandadhyāt pratikūlaṁ yadātmanaḥ |
eṣa saṁkṣepato dharmaḥ kāmād anyat pravartate ||47||
kunaṅ deyanta, hana ya pravr̥tti, kapuhara deniṅ kāya, vāk, manah, ndātan panukhe ya ri kita, magave duhkha puhara hr̥droga, yatika tan ulahaknanta riṅ len, hayva tan harimbavā, ika gatinta maṅkana, yatika saṅkṣepaniṅ dharma ṅaranya, vyartha kadamlaniṅ dharma yan maṅkana, līlāntat gavayakna ya.

ye tu śiṣṭāḥ suniyatāḥ satyārjavaparāyaṇāḥ |
dharmyaṁ panthānam ārūḍhās teṣāṁ vr̥ttaṁ samācara ||48||
kunaṅ sarvadāya, ika saṅ śiṣṭa, saṅ āpta, satyavadī, jitendriya ta sira, satyālaris duga-duga, niyata pasaṇḍan dharma solahnira, pravr̥ttinira, yatika tūtaknanta, katūtan ika, yatika dharmapravr̥tti ṅaranta.

sarvato bhrāmyamāṇasya dharmasya rathacakravat |
veśyāsutasyeva pitur niścayo nopalabhyate ||49||
kunəṅ saṅ hyaṅ dharma, mahas midər iṅ sahana, ndātan hana umaku sira, tan hanenakunira, tan sāpa juga si lavanikaṅ nahan-nahan, tātan pahi lavan anakniṅ strī lañji, ikaṅ tan kina vruhan bavanya, rūpaniṅ tan hana umaku yānak, tan hana inakunya bapa, ri vetnyan durlabha ikaṅ vvaṅ mulahakna dharma kaliṅanika.

śrūyatāṁ dharmasarvasvaṁ śrutvā caivopadhāryatām |
ātmanaḥ pratikūlāni na pareṣāṁ samācara ||50||
mataṅnyat rəṅə̄ sarvadāya, paramārthaniṅ sinaṅgah dharma, tləs rinṅə̄nta cupvanantā ta ri hati, ikaṅ kadi liṅ mami ṅūni vih, sāsiṅ tan kahyun yāvakta, yatika tan ulahaknanta riṅ len.

pulakā iva dhānyeṣu puttikā iva pakṣiṣu |
tādr̥śās te manuṣyeṣu yeṣāṁ dharmo na kāraṇam ||51||
kunaṅ ikaṅ vvaṅ pisaniṅun damlaknaṅ dharmasādhana, hapa-hapaniṅ pari, vūkaniṅ antiga paḍanika, rūpaniṅ hana tan papakna.

mriyante janmano ’rthāya jāyante maraṇāya ca |
na dharmārthaṁ na kāmāthaṁ tr̥ṇānīva pr̥thagjanāḥ ||52||
apan purihnikaṅ pr̥thagjana, tan dharma, tan kāma, kasiddha denya, ṅhiṅ mātya donyan ahurip, doniṅ pātinya, ṅhiṅ janma muvah, ika taṅ pr̥thagjana maṅkana kramanya, tan hana pātinya iḍəpnika, tahā pih, tan hana pahinya lavan dukut, riṅ kapva pāti doniṅ janmanya, janma doniṅ pātinya.

ye tu dharmam asūyante buddhimohānvitā janāḥ |
apathā gacchatāṁ teṣām anuyātāpi pīḍyate ||53||
mvaṅ ikaṅ vvaṅ nindā riṅ dharmapravr̥tti, deniṅ puṅgunya, jnək ta ya riṅ adharmapravr̥tti, ikaṅ manūt-nūt iriya tuvi, niyata pamaṅguhanya lara.

adharmarucayo mandās tiryaggatiparāyaṇāḥ |
kr̥cchrāṁ yonim anuprāpya na vindanti sukhaṁ janāḥ ||54||
kunaṅ lvirnikaṅ mūḍha, jnək riṅ adharma, antasnya sakeṅ niraya, maṅjanma ta ya tiryak-prāṇī, meṣa-mahiṣādi, bvatniṅ janmanya jmah, maṅjanma ta ya riṅ nīca, kasakitan ta ya kinuñcaṅ iṅ lara prihatin, tan tmuṅ sukha.

dhanasya yasya rājato bhayaṁ na cāsti corataḥ |
mr̥taṁ ca yan na muñcati samarjayasva tad dhanam ||55||
mataṅnyan nihan juga ṅulaha, hana ya mās tan kavnaṅ rinampas, tan kvnaṅ inahal, tumūti pātinta, ikaṅ mās maṅkana kramanya, yatika prihən arjananta.

dharmaś cen nāvasīdeta kapālenāpi jīvataḥ |
āḍhyo ’smīty avagantavyaṁ dharmavittā hi sādhavaḥ ||56||
yadyapin atyanta daridra kta ṅvaṅ, mahuripa ta deniṅ tasyan, yan laṅgəṅ apagəh riṅ dharmapravr̥tti, hiḍəpən ta sugih jugāvakta, apan aṅhiṅ dharmapravr̥tti, mās maṇik saṅ sādhu ṅaranira, yatika prihən arjanan, yatika liṅ mami mās maṇik tan kna riṅ corabhayādi.

dharmam ācarato vr̥ttir yadi nopagamiṣyati |
na nāma kiṁ śiloñchāmbuśākādy api vipatsyate ||57||
lavan liṅ mami, ika saṅ kevala tumuṅkulanaṅ dharmapravr̥tti, tātan panəmva upajīvananira, apa mataṅnya tar polih aṅasag, gaṅan, vvai, lvirniṅ sulabha təakvanan i harakanira.

santi śākāny araṇyeṣu nadyaś ca vimalodakāḥ |
candraḥ sāmānyadīpo ’yaṁ vibhavaiḥ kiṁ prayojanam ||58||
nihan keṅət, akveh mara sāmsam riṅ alas, maṅkana ikaṅ lvah riṅ alas, nirmalādaləm aho bañunya, kunaṅ suluhan ta saṅ hyaṅ niśākara, tātan padon kārjananiṅ vibhava, sugyan kālakṣepa.

vyāpr̥tenāpi hi svārthaḥ kriyate cāntare ’ntare |
meḍhrī pr̥ṣṭe ’pi hi bhrāmyan grāsaṁ grāsaṁ karoti gauḥ ||59||
nihan taṅ ulaha, ri duvəganyan harohara hosana ṅvaṅ, i kagavayaniṅ dharmasādhana, sambina tikaṅ arthārjana riṅ antara saṅka pisan, kadi kramaniṅ ləmbu sḍəṅ mesi hanuṅan valakaṅnya, midər amatək riṅ savah, sinambinya aṅjaṅgut dukut, saparək kaparah ri lakunya, dadi ya tuṣṭa.

buddhena śāntadāntena nityam abhyutthitātmanā |
dharmasya gatir anveṣyā matsyasya gatir apsv iva ||60||
lavan ta vaneh, atyanta riṅ gahana kta saṅ hyaṅ dharma ṅaranira, paramasūkṣma, tan pahi lavan tapakniṅ ivak riṅ vvai, ndān pinet juga sira de saṅ paṇḍita, klan upaśamā pagvan, kotsāhan.
kāṇḍani caturvarṇa yājarakna sakarəṅ.

brāhmaṇaḥ kṣatriyo vaiśyas trayo varṇā dvijātayaḥ |
caturtha ekajātīyaḥ śūdro nāstīha pañcamaḥ ||61||
brāhmaṇa ādiniṅ varṇa, tumūt kṣatriya, tumūt vaiśya, ika saṅ varṇa tiga, kapva dvijāti sira, dvijāti ṅaraniṅ piṅrva maṅjanma, apan ri sḍəṅniran brahmacārī gurukulavāsī, kinənan sira dīkṣābratasaṅskāra, kapiṅrvaniṅ janmanira tika, ri huvusnira kr̥tasaṅskāra, nahan mataṅnyan kapva dvijāti sira katiga, kunaṅ ikaṅ śūdra kapātniṅ varṇa, ekajāti saṅ kadi rasika, tan dadi kinənan bratasaṅskāra, tātan brahmacārī, maṅkana kāṇḍanikaṅ varṇa an pāt, ya ika caturvarṇa ṅaranya, tan hana kalimaniṅ varṇa ṅaranya.

adhīyīta brāhmaṇo vai yajeta
dadyād iyāt tīrthamukhyāni caiva |
adhyāpayed yājayec cāpi yājyān
pratigrahān vā vihitān upeyāt ||62||
nyā dharma saṅ brāhmaṇa, maṅajya, mayajñā, maveh dānapuṇya, magləma atīrtha, amarahana, vikvaniṅ ayajñā, manaṅgapa dāna.

dharmaś ca satyaṁ ca tapo damaś ca
vimatsaritvaṁ hrīs titikṣānasūyā |
yajñāś ca dānaṁ ca dhr̥tiḥ kṣamā ca
mahāvratāni dvādaśa vai brāhmaṇasya ||63||
nyaṅ brata saṅ brāhmaṇa, rva-vlas kvehnya, pratyekanya, dharma, satya, tapa, dama, vimatsaritva, hrīh, titikṣā, anasūyā, yajña, dāna, dhr̥ti, kṣamā, nahan, pratyekanyan rva-vlas, dharma, satya, pagvanya, tapa ṅaranya śarīrasaṅśoṣaṇa, kapanasaniṅ śarīra, piharan, kuraṅana viṣaya, dama ṅaranya upaśama deniṅ tuturnya, vimatsaritva ṅarani hayva īrṣyā, hrīh ṅaraniṅ iraṅ, vruha riṅ iraṅ vih, titikṣā ṅaraniṅ hayva gə̄ṅ krodha, anasūyā ṅaraniṅ hayva doṣagrāhī, yajña magləm amūjā, dāna, maveha dānapuṇya, dhr̥ti ṅaraniṅ manēb āhniṅ, kṣamā ṅaraniṅ kə̄lan, nahan brata saṅ brāhmaṇa.

adhītya vedān parisaṁstīrya cāgnīn
iṣṭvā yajñaiḥ pālayitvā prajāś ca |
bhr̥tyān bhr̥tvā jñātisambandhinaś ca
dānaṁ dattvā kṣatriyaḥ svargam eti ||64||
kunəṅ ulaha saṅ kṣatriya, umajya saṅ hyaṅ veda, nitya agnihotrā, magavayaṅ yajña, rumakṣaṅ rāt, huniṅa riṅ vadva, tka riṅ kulagotra, maveha dāna, yapvan maṅkana, svargapada antukanira dlāha.

vaiśyo ’dhītya brāhmaṇān kṣatriyād vā
dhanaiḥ kāle saṁvibhajyāśritāṁś ca |
tretā pūrvaṁ dhūmam āghrāya puṇyaṁ
pretya svarge devasukhāni bhuṅkte ||65||
nihan ulaha saṅ vaiśya, maṅajya sira ri saṅ brāhmaṇa, ri saṅ kṣatriya kunəṅ, mvaṅ maveha dāna ri tkaniṅ dānakāla, riṅ śubhadivasa, dum-dumananira ta sakvehniṅ mamarāśraya ri sira, magləma amūjā riṅ saṅ hyaṅ tryagni, saṅ hyaṅ tryagni ṅaranira saṅ hyaṅ apuy tiga, pratyekanira, āhavanīya, gārhaspatya, citāgni, āhavanīya ṅaranira apuyniṅ asuruhan, rumatəṅ i pinaṅan, gārhaspatya ṅaranira apuyniṅ vinaraṅ, apan agni sākṣikā kramaniṅ vinaraṅ i kālaniṅ vivāha, citāgni ṅaranira apuyniṅ manunu śava, nahan ta saṅ hyaṅ tryagni ṅaranira, sira ta pūjān de saṅ vaiśya, ulahnira ika maṅkana, ya tumkākən sira riṅ svarga dlāha.

brahma kṣatraṁ vaiśyavarṇaṁ ca śūdraḥ
krameṇaitān nyāyataḥ pūjyamānaḥ |
tuṣṭeṣv eteṣv avyatho dagdhapāpas
tyaktvā dehaṁ siddhim iṣṭāṁl labheta ||66||
yapvan ulahaniṅ śūdra, bhaktya sumevā ri saṅ brāhmaṇa, ri saṅ kṣatriya, riṅ vaiśya, yathākrama juga, parituṣṭa saṅ tlun sinevakanya, hilaṅ ta pāpanya, siddha sakāryanya.

rājā bhīrur brāhmaṇaḥ sarvabhakṣo
vaiśyo ’nīhāvān hīnavarṇo ’lasaś ca |
vidvān aśīlo vr̥ttahīnaḥ kulīnaḥ
satyād bhraṣṭo brāhmaṇaḥ strī ca duṣṭā ||67||
hana pva maṅke kramanya, ratu vdi-vdi, brāhmaṇa sarvabhakṣa, vaiśya nirutsāha riṅ krayavikrayādikarma, śūdra aləməh sevaka riṅ saṅ trivarṇa, paṇḍita duśśīla, sujanma anasar riṅ maryādānya, brāhmaṇa tan satya, strī duṣṭa duśśīlā.

rāgī muktaḥ pacamānaḥ svahetor
mūrkho vaktā nr̥pahīnaṁ ca rāṣṭram |
ete sarve śocyatāṁ yānti rājan
yaś cāmuktaḥ snehahīnaḥ prajāsu ||68||
vaneh, vānaprasthādi, sāvakaniṅ mataki-taki kamokṣan, tātan hilaṅ rāganya, masuruhan maphala ry avaknya, svārtha kevala vih, inahakən patīrthana, panəmvana vara-varah, ndān mūrkha, tan panolih sukhāvasāna, kaḍatvan tan paratu, gr̥hastha tan māsih riṅ anak, tan huniṅa riṅ rāt kunəṅ, samaṅkana lvirniṅ kavlas-arəp, niyata vi panəmvanya hala.

ārjavaṁ cānr̥śaṁsyaṁ ca damaś cendriyanigrahaḥ |
eṣa sādhāraṇo dharmaś cāturvarṇye ’bravīn manuḥ ||69||
nyāṅ ulah pasādhāraṇan saṅ caturvarṇa, ārjava, si duga-duga bnər, ānr̥śaṅsya, tan nr̥śaṅsya, nr̥śaṅsya ṅaraniṅ ātmasukhapara, tan harimbavā ri laraniṅ len, yāvat mamuhara sukha ry avaknya, yatika nr̥śaṅsa ṅaranya, gatiniṅ tan maṅkana, ānr̥śaṅsya ṅaranika, dama, tumaṅguhana avaknya, indriyanigraha, humrəta indriya, nahan taṅ pravr̥tti pāt, pasādhāraṇan saṅ caturvarṇa, liṅ bhaṭāra manu.

ahiṁsā satyavacanaṁ sarvabhūteṣu cārjavam |
kṣamā caivāpramādaś ca yasyaite sa sukhī bhavet ||70||
nihan tmən-tmən iṅ yogya kavaśākna, ahiṅsā, satya, si tan kira-kira kahalanniṅ sarvaprāṇī, si klana, si tan palə-paləh, saṅ makadr̥bya ika kabeh, sira prasiddhaniṅ sukha ṅaranira.

sarvaṁ jihmaṁ mr̥tyupadam ārjavaṁ brahmaṇaḥ padam |
etāvān jñānaviṣayaḥ kiṁ pralāpaḥ kariṣyate ||71||
apan yāvat si tan r̥ju, saṇḍānikaṅ pravr̥tti, niyata mr̥tyupada ika, tan paṅdadyakən kaləpasən, kunaṅ yan ārjava pagvan ikaṅ pravr̥tti, niyata brahmapada ika, mukti phala vih, maṅkana sarvadāyaniṅ hiḍəp, tan padon ikaṅ ujar adavā, ika ta pva vatvaniṅ hiḍəp.

ānr̥śaṁsyaṁ paro dharmaḥ kṣamā ca paramaṁ balam |
ātmajñānaṁ paraṁ jñānaṁ satyavrataṁ paraṁ vratam ||72||
kunaṅ ikaṅ si tan nr̥śaṅsya, ya ika mukhyaniṅ dharma, yapvan si klan, prasiddhaniṅ kaśaktin ika, ika vruh ta amavāvakta, meṅəta ri savavanya, ṅuniveh vruh ta riṅ ātmatattva, ya ika paramārtha rahasyajñāna ṅaranya, kunaṅ vastuniṅ brata ṅaranya, si satya juga.

kaṇṭakān kūpam agniṁ ca varjayanti sadā narāḥ |
tathā nr̥śaṁsakarmāṇaṁ varjayanti narādhamam ||73||
nihan halaniṅ nr̥śaṅsa, tan kinonəṅan juga yan hana riṅ rāt, deniṅ vvaṅ adhama tuvi, tan kinahyunan ika, kadi kramanikaṅ vvaṅ sumiṅgahi rvi, sumur māti, apuy kunəṅ, maṅkana tikaṅ sarvajanan tumiṅhalakən ikaṅ vvaṅ nr̥śaṅsa.

dānād damo viśiṣṭo hi dānam unnatikāraṇam |
dātā kupyati no dāntas tasmād dānāt paro damaḥ ||74||
nihan kottamaniṅ dama, dama ṅaraniṅ kopaśaman, makahetu meṅət, vruhta mituturi manahta, yatika ləvih saṅkeṅ dāna, ikaṅ dāna ṅaranya, kīrtti lavan uccapada, phalanika, ndān sor ika deniṅ dama, apan ika saṅ dātā, dadi sira tan pakadr̥byaṅ dama, kataman krodhādi, kunaṅ saṅ makadr̥byaṅ dama, niyatanya tan vipatha sira apan atutur, mataṅnyan ləvih taṅ dama saṅkeṅ dāna.

nodakaklinnagātro hi snāta ity abhidhīyate |
sa snāto yo damasnātaḥ sabāhyābhyantaraśuciḥ ||75||
lavan ta vaneh, tan ikaṅ atələs vinasəhan śarīranya, ktikaṅ madyus ṅaranya, kunaṅ ikaṅ prasiddhādyus ṅaranya, ika saṅ makadr̥byaṅ dama juga, saṅ sinaṅgah dānta, si tikādyus liṅ saṅ paṇḍita, śuci riṅ vāhyābhyantara.

na hr̥ṣyati mahaty arthe vyasane ca na śocati |
yo vā parimitaprajñaḥ sa dānta iti kīrttyate ||76||
nihan ta lakṣaṇaniṅ dānta, tar ləñōk, tan agiraṅ yan anmu sukha, tan prihatin an katkan duhkha, enak ta vruhnira riṅ tattva, vnaṅ ta sira tumaṅguh i manahnira apan pakadr̥byaṅ dama, sira ta dānta ṅaranira.

indriyāṇy eva tat sarvaṁ yat svarganarakāv ubhau |
nigr̥hītanissr̥ṣṭāni svargāya narakāya ca ||77||
nyaṅ pājara vaneh, indriya ikaṅ sinaṅgah svarganaraka, kramanya, yan kavaśa kahrətanya, ya ika sākṣāt svarga ṅaranya, yapvan tan kavaśa kahrətanya, sākṣāt naraka ika.

jīvitaṁ sādhuvr̥ttaṁ ca yogakṣemaṁ balaṁ yaśaḥ |
dharmam arthaṁ ca puṣṇāti nr̥ṇām indriyanigrahaḥ ||78||
phalaniṅ kahrətaniṅ indriya, nihan, kadīrghāyuṣan, ulah rahayu, pagəhniṅ yoga, kaśaktin, yaśa, dharma, artha, yatika katmu ri kavaśaniṅ indriya.

manasā trividhaṁ caiva vācā caiva caturvidham |
kāyena trividhaṁ cāpi daśakarmapathāṁś caret ||79||
hana karmapatha ṅaranya, kahrətaniṅ indriya, sapuluh kvehnya, ulahakna, kramanya, pravr̥ttyaniṅ manah sakarəṅ, tlu kvehnya, ulahaniṅ vāk, pāt, pravr̥ttyaniṅ kāya, tlu, piṇḍa sapuluh, pravr̥ttyaniṅ kāya, vāk, manah, keṅət.

anabhidhyāṁ parasveṣu sarvasattveṣu cāruṣam |
karmaṇāṁ phalam astīti trividhaṁ manasā caret ||80||
pravr̥ttyaniṅ manah rumuhun ajarakna, tlu kvehnya, pratyekanya, si tan eṅin adəṅkya ri dr̥byaniṅ len, si tan krodha, riṅ sarvasattva, si mamituhva ri hananiṅ karmaphala, nahan taṅ tiga ulahaniṅ manah, kahrətaniṅ indriya ika.

asatpralāpaṁ pāruṣyaṁ paiśunyam anr̥taṁ tathā |
catvāri vācā rājendra na jalpen nānucintayet ||81||
nyaṅ tan pravr̥ttyaniṅ vāk, pāt kvehnya, pratyekanya, ujar ahala, ujar aprəgas, ujar piśuna, ujar mithyā, nahan taṅ pāt siṅgahananiṅ vāk, tan ujarakna, tan aṅən-aṅənan, kojaranya.

prāṇātipātaṁ stainyaṁ ca paradārānathāpi ca |
trīṇi pāpāni kāyena sarvataḥ parivarjayet ||82||
nihan yaṅ tan ulahakna, sy amāti-māti maṅahal-ahal, si paradāra, nahan taṅ tlu tan ulahakna riṅ asiṅ riṅ parihāsa, riṅ āpatkāla, ri paṅipyan tuvi siṅgahana jugeka.

kāyena manasā vācā yadabhīkṣṇaṁ niṣevyate |
tad evāpaharaty enaṁ tasmāt kalyāṇam ācaret ||83||
apan ikaṅ kinatahvan ikaṅ vvaṅ, kolahanya, kāṅən-aṅənanya, kocapanya, ya juga bvat umalap ikaṅ vvaṅ, jnək katahvan irika vih, mataṅnyan ikaṅ hayu atika ṅabhyāsan, riṅ kāya, vāk, manah.

vāci karmaṇi citte ca durlabhaḥ saguṇo janaḥ |
yasya tv evaṁvidhaṁ kāryaṁ sa janaḥ sarvadurlabhaḥ ||84||
huvusnyan, durlabha ikaṅ saguṇa, riṅ kāya, vāk, manah, hana pva māṅkana, sira vkasniṅ durlabha, tan māṅkanya juga siran pinakevəh.

manasā niścayaṁ kr̥tvā tato vācā vidhīyate |
kriyate karmaṇā paścāt pradhānaṁ vai manas tataḥ ||85||
kunaṅ saṅkṣepanya, manah nimittaniṅ niścayajñāna, dadi pvaṅ niścayajñāna, lumkas taṅ ojar, lumkas taṅ mapravr̥tti, mataṅnyan manah ṅaranika pradhānan maṅkana.

mano hi mūlaṁ sarveṣām indriyāṇāṁ pravartate |
śubhāśubhāsv avasthāsu kāryaṁ tat suvyavasthitam ||86||
apan ikaṅ manah ṅaranya, ya ika vitniṅ indriya, mapravr̥tti ta ya riṅ śubhāśubhakarma, mataṅnyan ikaṅ manah juga prihən kahrətanya sakarəṅ.

dūragaṁ bahudhāgāmi prārthanāsaṁśayātmakam |
manaḥ suniyataṁ yasya sa sukhī pretya ceha ca ||87||
hihan ta kramanikaṅ manah, bhrānta luṅhā svabhāvanya, akveh inaṅən-aṅanya, dadi prārthana, dadi saṅśaya, pinakāvaknya, hana pva vvaṅ ikaṅ vnaṅ humrət manah, sira tika maṅgah amaṅgih sukha, maṅke riṅ paraloka vaneh.

sarvaṁ paśyati cakṣuṣmān manoyuktena cakṣuṣā |
manasi vyākule jāte paśyann api na paśyati ||88||
lavan tattvanikiṅ manah, nyaṅ mata vuvusənta, naṅ mulat riṅ sarvavastu, manah juga sahāyaniṅ mata nikān vulat, kunaṅ yan vyākula manahnya, tan ilu sumahāyeṅ mata, mulata tovi irikaṅ vastu, tan katon juga ya denika, apan manah ikaṅ vava rəṅə̄ ṅaranya, hiṅanyan pradhānaṅ manah kaliṅanika.

straiṇasyāvācyadeśasya klinnanāḍīvraṇasya ca |
abhede ’pi manobhedāj janaḥ prāyeṇa vañcyate ||89||
nihan mara keṅətanta, hana ya avayavaniṅ strī, tan yogya vuvusən pradeśanya, rinahasya vih, mvaṅ hana ta kani atləs haṅuruvak, ika taṅ rinahasyanyaṅ strī, lavan ikaṅ kani, ndya pahinika, yan iṅət-iṅətən, ndān kabañcana jugaṅ vvaṅ denika, sumaṅgah ya dudū, makahetu vikalpaniṅ manah, hiṅanyan manah ikaṅ pradhāna ṅaranya.

lālety udvijate loko vaktrāsava iti spr̥hā |
pravañcyate janenātmā saṁjñāśabdaiḥ svayaṁkr̥taiḥ ||90||
lavan vaneh, hana ya mukhāsava ṅaranya, madya, matahapan, tutuk asilih, maṅkana rakva kvamanika saṅ kāmī mvaṅ kāminī, yan dələ̄un, tan hana bhedanya lavan ilu, ya mukhāsava, ndān yan ilu paṅaraniṅ vvaṅ, elik ajəjəb ya, yapvan mukhāsava paṅaranya, harṣa ya, takarin umañcana avaknya, makasādhana ṅaran karikaṅ vvaṅ, an maṅkana, ikaṅ ṅaran gavenikaṅ vvaṅ ika, hiṅanyan aglis ikaṅ manah kaliṅanika.

abhinneṣv api kāryeṣu bhidyate manasaḥ kriyā |
anyathaiva stanaṁ putraś cintayaty anyathā patiḥ ||91||
tonən vaneh, tuṅgala tuvi ikaṅ vastu, dudū juga āgrahaniṅ savvaṅ-savvaṅ irika, vyaktinya, nāṅ susuniṅ ibu, dudū āptinikaṅ anak, an monəṅiṅ ibu, lavan āptinikaṅ bapa, hiṅanyan manah magave bheda.

The stanza is also attested in this form in a few brahmanical works. The same idea is expressed in Indische Sprüche 1343 = MSS_7451.
parivrāṭkāmukaśunām ekasyāṁ pramadātanau |
kuṇapaḥ kāminī bhakṣyam iti tisro vikalpanaḥ ||92||
nyaṅ dr̥ṣṭānta vaneh, nahan saṅ bhikṣuka brata parivrājaka, nahan yaṅ kāmuka, vvaṅ gə̄ṅ rāga sakta riṅ strī, nahan taṅ śr̥gāla, ika ta katiga, ya ta mulat iṅ strī, rahayu sasiki kapva dudū hāptinika katiga, vaṅke liṅ saṅ parivrājaka, apan eṅət riṅ anityatattva, liṅnikaṅ kāmuka strī, tka sih iki, kunaṅ liṅnikaṅ śr̥gāla, vastu surasa bhakṣya iki, arah vetnyan vikalpaniṅ manah tinūtniṅ vastubheda.

Indische Sprüche 4579
bhāvaśuddhir manuṣyasya vijñeyā sarvakarmasu |
anyathā cumbyate kāntā bhāvena duhitānyathā ||93||
lavan vaneh, eṅət juga kita, an śuddhiniṅ manah, nikaṅ vvaṅ tinūtniṅ pravr̥ttinya, riṅ asiṅ vastu, vyaktinya, nahan yaṅ bapa humarək i strīnya, muvah hinarəkanya ta anaknya, ndān dudū juga āptinyan ikānarəki ika kalih, āptinyan kapva harṣāndəlanya, hiṅanyan, manah kāraṇa riṅ kriyābheda.

abhidhyāluḥ parasveṣu neha nāmutra nandati |
tasmād abhidhyā santyājyā sarvadābhīpsatā sukham ||94||
hana ta maṅke kramanya, eṅin ri dr̥byaniṅ len, madəṅki ri sukhanya, ikaṅ vvaṅ maṅkana, yatika pisaniṅun, təmvaṅ sukha maṅke, riṅ paraloka tuvi, mataṅnyan aryakna ika, de saṅ mahyun laṅgəṅ anəmvaṅ sukha.

sadā samāhitaṁ cittaṁ naro bhūteṣu dhārayet |
nābhidhyāyen na spr̥hayen nābaddhaṁ cintayed asat ||95||
nyāyeki kadeyāknaniṅ vvaṅ, ikaṅ buddhi māsih riṅ sarvaprāṇī, yatika pagəhakna, hayva ta dəṅki, havya ta iṅin, hayva ta humayam-ayam ikaṅ vastu tan hana, vastu tan yukti kunəṅ, hayva ika inaṅən-aṅən.

niyacchāyaccha saṁyaccha cendriyāṇi manas tathā |
pratiṣedhyeṣv avadyeṣu durlabheṣv ahiteṣu ca ||96||
mataṅnya hrətən talyana, pagəhakna ta pva ikaṅ pañcendriya, lavan manah, hayva vineh mambahaṅ hinila-hila, vastu inupət, vastu durlabha, vastu tan panukheriṅ avasāna kunəṅ.

yasyerṣyā paravitteṣu rūpe vīrye kulānvaye |
sukhasaubhāgyasatkāre tasya vyādhir anantagaḥ ||97||
ikaṅ vvaṅ īrṣyā ri paḍanya janma tumon māsnya, rūpanya, vīryanya, kasujanmanya, sukhanya, kasubhaganya, kāləmanya, ya ta amuhara īrṣyā iriya, ikaṅ vvaṅ maṅkana kramanya, yatika prasiddhaniṅ saṅsāra ṅaranya, karakət laranya tan patamban.

kṣamāvatām ayaṁ lokaḥ paralokaḥ kṣamāvatām |
iha sammānam r̥cchanti paratra ca śubhāṁ gatim ||98||
nihan taṅ keṅət, ikiṅ sarvabhāva tka riṅ martyaloka, saṅ kṣamāvān makanu ika, kṣamāvān ṅaranira, saṅ klan upaśama, ika riṅ paraloka tuvi, hanunira tika apayāpan maṅke inastuti, pinūjā tinakvaṅan, sira deniṅ rāt, riṅ paraloka, uccapada katmu denira.

nātaḥ śrīmattaraṁ kiñ cid anyat pathyataraṁ tathā |
prabhaviṣṇor yathā tāta kṣamā sarvatra sarvadā ||99||
saṅkṣepanya, kṣamā ikaṅ paramārthaniṅ pinakadr̥bya, pinakamās-maṇiknika saṅ vnaṅ lumage śaktiniṅ indriya, nora luməvihana haləpnya, aṅhiṅ ya vkasniṅ pathya, pathya ṅaraniṅ pathādānapetah, tan panasar saṅke mārga yukti, maṅgah sādhana asiṅ parana, tan apilih riṅ kāla.

yadi na syur manuṣyeṣu kṣamiṇaḥ pr̥thivīsamāḥ |
na syāt sakhyaṁ manuṣyāṇāṁ krodhamūlo hi vigrahaḥ ||100||
apan ya tan hana saṅ kṣamāvān, saṅ kṣamāvān ṅaranira, tan pahi lavan saṅ hyaṅ pr̥thivī, riṅ kapva klan, an maṅkana, tan hana niyataniṅ pamitran, krodhātmaka avakiṅ sarvabhāva, kapva tātukartatukar niyatanya.

yaḥ samutpatitaṁ krodhaṁ kṣamayaiva nirasyati |
yathoragas tvacaṁ jīrṇāṁ sa vai puruṣa ucyate ||101||
hana pva sira vnaṅ maniṅgalakən krodha, makasādhanaṅ kṣamā, kadi kramaniṅ ulān tiṅgalakən limuṅsuṅanya, ri kapva tan valuyakna muvah, ika saṅ maṅkana sira tika mahābuddhi ṅaranira, maṅgah sinaṅgah vvaṅ.

na śatravaḥ kṣayaṁ yānti yāvaj jīvam api ghnataḥ |
krodhaṁ niyantuṁ yo veda tasya dveṣṭā na vidyate ||102||
katuhvan, apan yadyapi vnaṅa ikaṅ vvaṅ ri musuhnya, tan kavadhan pātyana śatrunya, asiṅ kakrodhanya, sadavāni huripnya tah yan tūtakna gləṅnya tuvi, yaya juga tan həntyani musuhnika, kunəṅ prasiddhaniṅ tan pamusuh, saṅ vnaṅ humrət krodhanira juga.

avyādhijaṁ kaṭukaṁ śīrṣarogaṁ
yaśomuṣaṁ pāpaphalodayaṁ ca |
satāṁ peyaṁ yan na pibanty asanto
manyuṁ mahārāja piba praśāmya ||103||
nyaṅ saṅ kiriman, hana ya ininum saṅ paṇḍita, maṅdani panas amuhara ṅəlu, tan lara iki pih, maṅilaṅakən yaśāpuhara pāpa tapva ya, tan ininum iki deniṅ sāmānyajana, saṅ uttamapuruṣa juga sira vnaṅ minum, sira tuhun śakti kaliṅanya, krodha ika maṅkana kramanya, yatika inumənta, kavaśāknanta sāktinya, rapvan, tmuṅ kopaśaman.

ātmopamas tu bhūteṣu yo bhaved iha pūruṣaḥ |
tyaktadaṇḍo jitakrodhaḥ sa pretya sukham edhate ||104||
apayapan ikaṅ vvaṅ opaśama, tan pahi lavan avaknya ta pva ikaṅ sarvabhāva liṅnya arah harimbava, tātan paṅḍaṇḍa, tan kataman krodha, ya ika vyaktiniṅ sarvasukha, apan maṅken tmuṅ sukha, riṅ paraloka sukha tah tinmunya.

jātavairas tu pūruṣo duḥkhaṁ svapiti sarvadā |
anirvr̥tena manasā sa sarpa iva veśmani ||105||
kunaṅ ikaṅ vvaṅ aṅgə̄ṅ tukar, sadākālāduhkha ika saparanya, solahnya, riṅ paturvan tuvi, makanimitta, tan aṅgəhni hatinya, kadi kramaniṅ aturu riṅ umah mesi sarpa.

āturasya kuto nidrā trastasyāmarṣitasya ca |
arthaṁ cintayato vāpi kāmayānasya vā punaḥ ||106||
samaṅke mara tan enak turunya, pratyekanya, vvaṅ alara, vvaṅ atakut, vvaṅ hana kagləṅnya, vvaṅ umaṅən-aṅən sakāryanya, vvaṅ sarāga kunaṅ.

akrodhanaḥ krodhanebhyo viśiṣṭas
tathā titikṣur atitikṣor viśiṣṭaḥ |
amānuṣebhyo mānuṣāś ca pradhānā
vidvāṁs tathaivāviduṣaḥ pradhānaḥ ||107||
saṅkṣepanya, lvih ikaṅ vvaṅ maṅavaśākna krodha, saṅke kinavaśākniṅ krodha, mon pakalvih juga anugrahaṇa vīryādi tuvi, maṅkana ikaṅ klan, lvih ika saṅkeṅ tan klan, yadyapin maṅkana kalvihnya, maṅkana mānuṣajanma, lvih jugeka saṅkeṅ tan mānuṣa, mon lvih riṅ bhogopabhogādi, maṅkana saṅ paṇḍita, lvih sira saṅkeṅ tan paṇḍita, yadyapin samr̥dhya riṅ dhanadhānyādi.

yat krodhano yajati yad dadāti
yad vā tapas tapati yaj juhoti |
vaivasvatas tad dharaty asya sarvaṁ
vr̥thā śramo bhavati krodhanasya ||108||
apan ikaṅ vvaṅ kakavaśā deniṅ krodhanya, salvirniṅ pinūjākənya, sāvakaniṅ pavehnya dāna, salvirniṅ tapanya, salvirniṅ hinomakənya, ika ta kabeh bhaṭāra yama sira umalap phalanika, tan paphala iriya, tvas ṅhel, mataṅnyat kavaśākna taṅ krodha.

nityaṁ krodhāt tapo rakṣec chriyaṁ rakṣec ca matsarāt |
vidyāṁ mānāvamānābhyām ātmānaṁ tu pramādataḥ ||109||
nihan taṅ kayatnākna, ikaṅ tapa rakṣan, makasādhana kapaḍəmaniṅ krodha ika, kunəṅ hyaṅ śrī, paḍəmniṅ īrṣyā paṅrakṣa ri sira, kunəṅ saṅ hyaṅ aji, paḍəmniṅ ahaṅkāra mvaṅ avamāna paṅrakṣa ri sira, yapvan karakṣanyāvakta, si tan pramāda sādhana irika.

krodho vaivasvato mr̥tyus tr̥ṣṇā vaitaraṇī nadī |
vidyā kāmadughā dhenuḥ santoṣo nandanaṁ vanam ||110||
lavan ta vaneh, ikiṅ krodha sinaṅgah mr̥tyu ṅaranya, maṅkana ikiṅ tr̥ṣnā, ya ika lvah vaitariṇī ṅaranya, atyanta bībhatsa, durgama tovi, atyanta riṅ tīs, atyanta riṅ panas vvainya, ikiṅ tr̥ṣnā ta vastuniṅ vaitariṇī ṅaranya, kunəṅ saṅ hyaṅ aji, saṅ hyaṅ rahasyajñāna, sira ləmbu mamətvakən sakahyun, kunaṅ ikaṅ kasantoṣan, ya ika nandanavana ṅaranya, taman riṅ indraloka, ikaṅ nandanavana ṅaranya, atyanta ri konaṅ-unaṅ.

kruddhaḥ pāpāni kurute kruddho hanyād gurūn api |
kruddhaḥ paruṣayā vācā naraḥ sādhūn api kṣipet ||111||
kunaṅ ikaṅ vvaṅ kakavaśā deniṅ krodhanya, niyata gumave ulah pāpa, makāntaṅ vvaṅ amātyani guru, vnaṅ ta ya tumiraskāra saṅ sādhu, tumke sira paruṣavasana.

vācyāvācyaṁ prakupito na vijānāti karhi cit |
nākāryam asti kruddhasya nāvācyaṁ vidyate kvacit ||112||
lavan lvirniṅ kakavaśā deniṅ krodhakrādha, tan vruh juga ya ri salahknaniṅ ujar, tātan vruh ya riṅ ulah laraṅan, lavan adharma, vnaṅ umujarakən ikaṅ tan yukti vuvusakna.

krodhaḥ śatruḥ śarīrastho manuṣyāṇāṁ narottama |
yaḥ krodhalobhau tyajati sa loke pūjyatām iyāt ||113||
paramārthanikaṅ krodha ṅaranya, musuh ṅke riṅ śarīra juga ya, hana pva sira tumiṅgalakən ikaṅ krodha, sira ta kinatvaṅan, inaləm, pinūjā an haneṅ rāt.

devatāsu viśeṣeṇa rājasu brāhmaṇeṣu ca |
niyantavyo bhavet krodho bālavr̥ddhātureṣu ca ||114||
riṅ maṅke taṅ krodha prihan tmən kahrətanya, lvirnya, riṅ devatā, riṅ saṅ prabhu, riṅ saṅ brāhmaṇa, riṅ rare kunaṅ, ikaṅ sḍəṅ muṇḍu, riṅ vvaṅ atuha kunəṅ, irikaṁ tlas lilu, vvaṅ alara kunaṅ, i samaṅkana ikaṅ krodha prihən tmən kahrətanya.

dharmārthahetoḥ kṣamatas titikṣoḥ śāntir uttamā |
lokasaṁgrahaṇārthaṁ vai sa tu dhairyeṇa labhyate ||115||
lavan vaneh, ika saṅ klan riṅ panas-tīs, riṅ kasiddhaniṅ dharma, artha, klan ta sira ri hala-hayuniṅ ujar, katmu ta paḍəmniṅ krodha denira, makanimitta kadhīranira, kākarṣaṇa ikaṅ loka denira.

nāstikyaṁ vedanindāṁ ca devatānāṁ ca kutsanam |
dveṣaṁ daMBhaṁ ca mānaṁ ca krodhaṁ taikṣṇyaṁ ca varjayet ||116||
nihan ta prakāraniṅprakāra, niṅ aryakna, lvirnya, si tan pamituhu ri hananiṅ paraloka, lavan phalaniṅ śubhāśubhakarma, kanindān saṅ hyaṅ veda, kanindāniṅ devatā, īrṣyā, si pūjyan māvak, si ahaṅkāra, krodha, panas-bhāra, rəṅə̄-rəṅə̄n, samaṅkanaṅ aryakna, dohakna saṅkeṅ manah.

sandigdhe ’pi pare loke tyājyam evāśubhaṁ budhaiḥ |
yadi nāsti tataḥ kiṁ syād asti cen nāstiko hataḥ ||117||
yadyapin saṅśayā ktaṅ vvaṅ ri hananiṅ paraloka, mvaṅ phalaniṅ śubhāśubhakarma, tathāpin maṅkana, aryakna juga ikaṅ aśubhakarma, liṅ saṅ hyaṅ āgama, siṅgahana ikaṅ karma senuhutakən saṅ paṇḍita, ləñoka pva rakva saṅ paṇḍita, advā saṅ hyaṅ āgama, ri hananiṅ svarganaraka, tan paphala ikaṅ śubhāśubhakarma, tan hana tah kocivaniṅ umituhu varah saṅ paṇḍita, sumiṅgahanaṅ aśubhapravr̥tti liṅ saṅ hyaṅ āgama, apagəh pva saṅ hyaṅ āgama, niyata maphalaniṅ śubhāśubhakarma, ndah hilaṅ nāstikāvas, kakləman ya riṅ niraya.

na dr̥ṣṭapūrvaṁ pratyakṣaṁ paralokaṁ vidur budhāḥ |
āgamāṁs tv anatikramya śraddhātavyaṁ vijānatā ||118||
tan pratyakṣa kta paṅavruh saṅ paṇḍita ri hananiṅ paraloka, svarganaraka, kunəṅ apan apagəhapəgah saṅ hyaṅ āgama pinramāṇāknira, mataṅnyan pratyakṣa lvirniṅ vruhnira.

aprāmāṇyaṁ ca vedānāṁ śāstrāṇāṁ cātilaṅghanam |
sarvatra cānavasthānam etan nāśanam ātmanaḥ ||119||
lavan ta vaneh, yan tan pramāṇākna varah saṅ hyaṅ veda, tan pituhun varah saṅ hyaṅ dharmaśāstra kunəṅ, mvaṅ tan tūtakna pakṣa saṅ hyaṅ āgama, niyata hilaṅniṅ ātma, punarbhāva valuy-valuy riṅ saṅsāra.

nāstikaṁ bhinnamaryādaṁ kūle vātam iva sthitam |
vāmataḥ kuru viśrabdhaṁ naraṁ reṇum ivoddhatam ||120||
hana mara vvaṅ nāstika, tan pamituhu ri hananiṅ śubhāśubhakarmaphala, umambah ikaṅ senuhutakən saṅ hyaṅ āgama, yadyapin asgəha ya ri kita tuvi, dohana juga ya, hayva kita tṅən iriya, apan tan hana pahinya lavan aṅin adrəs ri piṅgiriṅ lvah, rūpaniṅ basa manūb anibākna, hanan kadi lbu mlək rūpaniṅ niyata malit anamāla.

ye nāstikā niṣkriyāśca guruśāstrātilaṅghinaḥ |
vihiṁsakā durācārāste bhavanti gatāyuṣaḥ ||121||
apan ikaṅ vvaṅ nāstika, vvaṅ niṣtriya kunaṅ, niṣtriya ṅaraniṅ vvaṅ tan paniddhākən trivargga, vvaṅ tan pamisiṅgih rasa saṅ hyaṅ āgama, vara-varah saṅ guru kunəṅ, vvaṅ hiṅsaka pravr̥tti kunəṅ, vvaṅ durācāra kunəṅ, ika ta vvaṅ maṅkana kramanya, ya ika māti ṅaranya.

aihalaukikamīhante māṁsaśonitavardhanāḥ |
pāralaukikakr̥tyeṣu prasuptā bhr̥śanāstikāḥ ||122||
nihan ta krama nikaṅ nāstika, kevalāvaknya juga iniṅunya, yatna ri vrəddhyaniṅ rah dagiṅnya, dāsiṅ pravr̥tti maphala maṅke linkasakanya, kunaṅ ikaṅ pravr̥tti maphala svarggāvavargga dlāha, aturu ya irika, tan vava rəṅəh vih.

dve karmaṇī naraḥ kurvanniha loke mahīyate |
abruvanparuṣaṁ kiñcidasato nārthayaṁstathā ||123||
kunaṅ liṅ mami, rva ikaṅ ulah nimittaniṅ vvaṅ inastuti, lvirnya, ikaṅ pisaniṅu mujarannaṅ paruṣavacana, ikaṅ pisaniṅu kumirakiraṅ ulah tanyukti kunaṅ, samaṅkana ikaṅ vvaṅ pinūjin haneṅ rāt.

saṁyagalpaṁ ca vaktavyamavikṣiptena cetasi |
vākprabandho hi saṁrāgādvirāgādvā bhavedasana||124||
ika taṅ ujarakna, rahayva ta ya, hayva ta vinistārākən, hayva hyun-hyun kavarjana aṅucap, apan ikaṅ ujar yan jambat, hanaṅ karṣa, hana ilik pinuharanya, tan rahayu ta ṅaranika.

abhyāvahati kalyāṇaṁ vividhaṁ vāksubhāṣitā |
saiva durbhāṣitā puṁsāmanarthāyopapadyate ||125||
apan ikaṅ ujar yan rahayu, rahayu ta kojaranya, tan tuṅgal ikaṅ sukha kapuhara denya, yadyapin rahayu tovi, yan tan rahayu kojaranya, irikaṅ umujarakənya tuvi, pvan pamuhara lara.

vāksāyakā vadanānniṣpatanti yairāhataḥ śocati ratryāhani |
spr̥śya vā marmasu te patanti tasmāddhīro nāvasr̥jetpareṣu ||126||
ikaṅ ujar ahal tan pahi lavan hru, soṅkabnya sakatəmpuhan denya juga alara, rəsəp ri hati, tātan kneṅ paṅan turu ri rahina vṅi ikaṅ vvaṅ denya, mataṅnyat tan inujarakən ika de saṅ dhīra puruṣa, saṅa ahniṅ mānəb manahnira.

marmānyasthīni hr̥dayaṁ tathāsūn ghorā vāco nirdahantīha puṁsām |
tasmādvācaṁ rucatīntīkṣṇarūpaṁ dharmārāmo antyaśo varjayettām ||127||
nihan ta denyāṅlare, rəsəp riṅ prāṇa, susuk ri hati, tkeṅ tahulan, mataṅnyan aryyakna ika de saṅ dhārmmika.

saṁrohati śanairviddhaṁ vanaṁ paraśunā hatam |
vācā duruktaṁ bībhatsaṁ na saṁrohati tatkṣatam ||128||
apan ikaṅ alas, binabad pinaharadin, tumuvuh niyatanika pūrṇna muvah, kunaṅ ikaṅ manah linaraniṅ ujar alarāhala, tan tuvuh ika, kaliṅanya, tan panuvuhakən buddhiṅ ujarahala.

hīnāṅganatiriktāṅgānvidyāhīnānvigarhitāna|
rūpadraviṇahīnāṁśca sattvahnaṁśca nākṣipeta||129||
nyaṅ inilagakən, hana vvaṅ vikāra, kuraṅ lvih avayavanya, tan vruh maṅaji kunaṅ, vvaṅ durbhāga, durbala inupət kunaṅ, vvaṅ ahala, vvaṅ tan pamās, vvaṅ mūḍa, vvaṅ vdi-vdi kunaṅ, yatika tan kiraskārān tanuyan, pāvakniṅ pāruṣya aṅujar maṅkana.

nākrośamicchenna mr̥ṣā vadecca na paiśunyaṁ janavādaṁ na kuryāta|
satyavrato mitabhāṣo pramattasty avāgdvāramupaiti guptim ||130||
mataṅnyan maṅke saṅ mahāpaṅḍita, saṅ makabrataṅ kasatyan, tan paṅuman-uman, tan pagavai vaiśunya, tan paṅupat, ṅuniveh tan mrəṣāvāda, yakna juga sira amihəri ujarnira, rumakṣa halaniṅ len.

pratyakṣaṁ guṇavādī yaḥ parokṣe tu vinindakaḥ |
sa mānavaḥ śvavalloke naṣṭalokaparāyaṇaḥ ||131||
kunaṅ ikaṅ vvaṅ maṅke kramanya, yan ri harəp yan paṅaləm, aṅupət yan ri vuri, ya ika crol ṅaranya, n haneṅ rāt, dūran təmvaṅ hayu riṅ ihatra parakra.

na vācyaḥ parivādo vai na śrotavyaḥ kadācana |
karṇau vāpi pidhātavyau gantavyaṁ va tato’nyataḥ ||132||
mataṅnyat tan ujarakna juga kopətaniṅ len, tan rəṅən, tukupanaṅ taliṅa, mūra kunəṅ.

satyadharmacyutātpuṁsaḥ kruddhādāśīvisādiva |
nāstikoaḥpyudvijeteha janaḥ kiṁ punarāstikaḥ ||133||
ikaṅ vvaṅ nāstika tuvi, atakut juga ya riṅ vvaṅ mithya, vvaṅ gə̄ṅ krodha, katulvan apa tan pahi mvaṅ sarppa ikaṅ vvaṅ maṅkana, hayva ta vinuvus saṅ dhārmika.

satyam[sampādyatām] amr̥taṁ caiva mr̥tyuśca dvayaṁ dehe pratiṣṭhitam |
mr̥tyurāpadyate mohātsatyenāpadyate’mr̥tam ||134||
tan madoh marikaṅ viṣa, mvaṅ amrəta, ṅke riṅ śarīra kahananya, kramanya, yan apuṅguṅ ikaṅ vvaṅ jnək riṅ adharma, viṣa katmu denya, yapvan atguh riṅ kasatyan, mapagəh riṅ dharma, katmuṅ amrəta.

na yajñāḥ phaladānāni niyamāstāryantii hi |
yathā satyaṁ paraṁ loke puruṣaṁ puruṣarṣabha ||135||
nihan ta kottamaniṅ kasatyan, nāṅ yajña, nāṅ dāna, nāṅ brata, kapva vnaṅ ika maṅəntasakən, sor tika deniṅ kasatyan, riṅ kapva aṅəntasakən.

brāhmaṇo vā manuṣyāṇāmādityo vāpi tejasām |
śiro vā sarvagātrāṇāṁ dharmāṇāṁ satyamuttamam ||136||
yan riṅ janma mānuṣa, brāhmaṇa sira lvih, kunəṅ yan riṅ teja, saṅ hyaṅ āditya sira lvih, yan riṅ avayava, nāṅ pāṇipādādi, hulu ikaṅ viśeṣa, yapvan riṅ dharma, ṅhiṅ kasatyan viśeṣa.

yaḥ parārthe’paharati svāṁ vācaṁ puruṣādhamaḥ |
ātmārthaṁ kiṁ na kuryātsa pāpanarakānibhāryaḥ ||137||
hana ta vvaṅ ujar makaphala laraniṅ para, umakusāra siddhaniṅ kāryyaniṅ para kunaṅ, ndān mithyā ya, ikaṅ vvaṅ maṅkana kramanya, tan atakut riṅ naraka ika, ta kārin pagavayakēn avaknya kapāpan ṅaranika, apan ikaṅ para prasiddhaniṅ mukti kapāpanya, saṅkṣepanika, tan ujaraknaṅ ujar maṅkana.

satyāṁ vācamahiṁsāṁ ca vadedaparivādinīm |
kalyopetāmaparuṣāmanr̥śaṁsāmapaiśunām ||138||
kunəṅ lvir iṅujarakna nihan, satya ta ya, hayva ta ya makāvak hiṅsā, hayva makāvak upət, titāvasāna ta ya, hayva ta pāruṣya, hayva kaslatan gləṅ, hayva nrəśaṅsa, hayva paiśunya, maṅkana lvirniṅ tan yogya ujarakna.

dr̥ṣṭānubhūtamarthaṁ yaḥ pr̥ṣṭo na vinigūhate |
yathābhūtaṁ pravāditvātītyetatsatyalakṣaṇam ||139||
nihan lakṣaṇaniṅ satya, hana ya tinañan tātan pavuni, mājar ta ya, yathābhūta, torasi ikaṅ saka pruhnya, pravr̥ttinya ikaṅ maṅkana, yatika lakṣaṇaniṅ kasatyan.

na tathyavacanaṁ satyaṁ nātathyavacanaṁ mr̥ṣā |
yadbhūtahitamatyarthaṁ tatsatyamitaraṁ mr̥ṣā ||140||
kunəṅ paramārthanya nihan, tan ikaṅ ujar advā ktikaṅ mithyā ṅaranya, tan ikaṅ si tuhu satya ṅaranya, kunəṅ prasiddhanya, mon mithyā ikaṅ ujar, thər maṅde hita juga, magave sukhāvasāna riṅ sarvabhāva, ya satya ṅaranika, mon yathābhūta tovi, yan tan paṅde sukhāvasāna riṅ sarvabhāva, mithyā ṅaranika.

dharmārthakāmamokṣāṇāṁ prāṇāḥ saṁsthitihetavaḥ |
tānnighnatā kiṁ na hataṁ rakṣā bhūtahitārthā ca ||141||
mataṅnyan prihən tikaṅ bhūtahita, hayva tan māsih riṅ sarvaprāṇī, apan ikaṅ prāṇa ṅaranya, ya ika nimittaniṅ kapagəhan ikaṅ caturvarga, nāṅ dharma, artha, kāma, mokṣa, hana pva maṅilaṅakən prāṇa, ndya ta tan hilaṅ denika, maṅkana ikaṅ rumakṣa riṅ bhūtahita, ya ta mamagəhakən caturvarga ṅaranya, abhūtahita ṅaranikaṅ tan karakṣa denya.

ahiṁsā[sampādyatām] jivitaṁ yaḥ svayaṁ hīcchetkathaṁ so’nyaṁ praghātayeta|
yadyadātmana iccheta tatparasyāpi cintayeta||142||
apan ikaṅ vvaṅ nahat ri huripnya, apa nimitta nikan paṅlilaṅakən prāṇaniṅ len, ika tātan harimbavā kta ya, ikaṅ sanukhanaryyavaknya, ya ta aṅen-aṅenənya, riṅ len.

yasyānte śvāpi caraṇau kurute mūrdhanya śaṅkitaḥ |
sa kāyaḥ parapīḍanairdhāryata iti ko naraḥ ||143||
lavan ya vaneh, ikaṅ śarīra ṅaranya, anitya pinakasvabhāvanya, tan lanā, apan ri pātinya, tan pamūlya ya, mastakanya tuvi linaṅkahaniṅ śrəgāla, an maṅkana tattvanya, aparan ta rakva ya, iṅuni makasādhanaṅ parapīḍā, ndya ta yogyanika.

kr̥mayo bhasmaviṣṭā vā niṣṭhā yasyedr̥śī bhaveta|
kāyo’yaṁ pālayaṁ pīḍya yatk? paripālyate ||144||
nihan marāvasthānikiṅ śarīra, pilih hulər, pilih havu, pilih purīṣa tmahanya, an maṅkana, rakṣanta rakva ya iṅun, makasādhanaṅ parapīḍā, apa ta nimittanya.

gacchatastiṣṭhato vāpi jāgrataḥ svapato’pi na |
phalaṁ bhūtahitārthāya tatpaśoriva ceṣṭitam ||145||
saṅkṣepanya, bhūtahita tikaṅ ulaha, apan ikaṅ vvaṅ lumaku, aluṅguh, ataṅhi, maturu kunəṅ, ndātan pakaphalaṅ bhūtahita, tan hana pahiniṅ pravr̥ttinya lavan ulah iṅ paśu.

ekaṁ sūte mr̥gāriṇī bahūnsūte vr̥kī sutāna|
uttāraḥ pralayaṁ yānti nādyamānāḥ kathañcana ||146||
nihan pājara sakarəṅ nāṅ kidaṅ, sakatuṅgal denika mānak, kunaṅ ikaṅ srəgāla, mānak ika sakapitu nəm, kaliṅanika, riṅ nəm pitu, tan ahurip ika kabeh, apan ikaṅ amaṅan, upalakṣaṇa riṅ makāryya riṅ hala, ya ika kagə̄ṅaniṅ vighka, kunaṅ ikaṅ pinaṅan, salvirniṅ kināryya riṅ hala, taha ika.

vadhabandhaparikleśānprāṇino na karoti yaḥ |
sa sarvasya hitaṁ prepsuḥ sukhamatyantamaśnute ||147||
hana mara vvaṅ maṅke kramanya, tapvan pagave parikleśa riṅ prāṇī, tan paṅapusi, tan pamāti, kevala sānukana riṅ prāṇī tapva ginavenya, ya ika sinaṅgah amaṅgih paramasukha ṅaranya.

yaccintayati yadyāti ratiṁ badhnāti yatra ca |
tathā cāpnotyayatnena prāṇino na hinasti yaḥ ||148||
kunəṅ phalanya nihan, ikaṅ vvaṅ tan pamāti-mātin, haneṅ rāt, senaṅən-aṅənya, sapinaranya, sakahyunya yatika sulabha katmu denya, tanulihnya kasakitan.

rūpamavyaṅgatāmāyuḥ pūrṇaṁ prajñaṁ cauryaṁ smr̥tim |
prāptukāmairnarairhiṁsā varjanīyā kr̥tātmabhiḥ ||149||
kaliṅanya, yan kalituhayvan sādhyanta, paripūrṇna mardya vikāra kunəṅ, kadīrghāyuṣan kunəṅ, athavā kaprajñān, kaśūran, kaśaktin, tutur laṅgəṅ kunəṅ, ikaṅ hiṅsāpravr̥tti hayva ginavayakən.

abhayaṁ sarvabhūtebhyo yo dadāti dayāparaḥ |
abhayaṁ tasya bhūtāni dadatīha na saṁśayaḥ ||150||
lavan vaneh, ikaṅ vvaṅ umehakəniṅ abhaya, abhaya ṅaranya, tayaniṅ vdi, ya ta vinehakənya riṅ sarvabhāva, vetniṅ gə̄ṅnyāsihnya, sinuval riṅ abhaya ika, deniṅ sarvabhāva, riṅ ihatra paratra.

sarvasattveṣu yaddhānamekasattve ca yā dayā |
sarvasattvapradānāddhi dayaikā ca viśiṣyate ||151||
apan ikaṅ dānapuṇya riṅ sarvabhāva, lavan māsihapuṇya hurip riṅ prāṇī sasiki, yan tahilan gati nika kālih, lvih tmən rakva bhāranikaṅ puṇya hurup riṅ prāṇī sasiki.

na hi prāṇātpriyataraṁ loke kiñcana vidyate |
tasmāddayā naraḥ kuryādyathātmani tathā pare ||152||
apan tan hana lviha saṅkeṅ prāṇa ṅaranya, ṅhiṅ hurip mūlya riṅ triloka, mataṅnyan māsiha juga ṅvaṅ, sāsih niṅvaṅ māvak, maṅkana asihaniṅvaṅ riṅ len.

akrodhanaḥ satyavādī bhūtānāmavihiṁsakaḥ |
anasūyaḥ sadācāro dīrghamāyuravāpnuyāta||153||
hana maṅke kramanya, tan kataman krodha, apagəh riṅ kasatyan, tātan pamāti-māti, tan doṣagrāhī, tuvi śuddhāsāra, samaṅkana kramanira, kadīrghāyuṣan pinaṅguḥnira dlāha, adyāpi maṅke tuvi.

dauṣkulā vyādhibahulā durācārāḥ prahāriṇaḥ |
bhavantyalpāyuṣaḥ pāpā rodukā kaśmalodayāta||154||
kunəṅ tikaṅ vvaṅ maṅke kramanya, maṅjanma riṅ vvaṅ kaśmala, vyādhi ta ya, durācāra, hiṅsāpravr̥tti, alpāyuṣa, dumeh ya maṅkana, krurakarmma ṅūni riṅ pūrvva janmanya kaliṅanika.

astenyam[sampādyatām] ye dhanāny apakarṣanti narāḥ svabalamāśritāḥ |
na hareddharmakāmaṁ ca pramuṣanti na saṁśayaḥ ||155||
yapvan maṅke kramanikaṅ vvaṅ, aṅalap māsniṅ mamās, makapaṅhaḍa kaśaktinya, kvehniṅ hambanya, tātan māsnika juga inalapnika, apa pva dharma, artha, kāma, nika milu kālap denika.

āharankasyaciddravyaṁ yo naraḥ sukhamāvaseta|
sarvataḥ śaṅkitaḥ steno mr̥go grāmamivāgataḥ ||156||
kunaṅ ika vvaṅ tapvan hana pva inalapnya, dr̥byaniṅ asiṅ-asiṅ, ya ika vastuniṅ tan hana katakutnya, līlāsiṅ saparanya, kunaṅ ikaṅ maliṅ ṅaranya, sakvanyan sarvasaṅśaya iriya, nihan paḍanyanika kramaniṅ mrəga mara riṅ grāma.

trīṇyeva ca dhanānyāhuḥ puruṣasyottamavratāḥ |
na druhyāccaiva dayācca satyaṁ caiva sadā vadeta||157||
tlunikaṅ prasiddha dr̥bya, māsmaṇik, ṅaranya, liṅ saṅ paṅḍita, pratyekanya, si tan mahyun mamātya-mātyani, si tan drohi, si mujaraknaṅ satya, nahan taṅ dr̥bya vastuniṅ mūhya, liṅ saṅ mahāpuruṣa.

duḥkhine bandhuvargāya suhr̥de saṁśritāya ca |
yā nābhidruhyata vr̥ttiḥ sā kr̥pātigarīyasī ||158||
apan ikaṅ ulah manuluṅ riṅ kadaṅvargga, katnan lara prihati, yaniṅ mitra kunəṅ, an riṅ mamarāśraya, ya ika krəpā ṅaranya, vkasiṅ inuttama ika.

paradāra[sampādyatām] paradārā na gantavyāḥ sarvavarṇeṣu karhicita|
na hīdr̥śamanāyuṣmaṁ yathānyastrīniṣevanam ||159||
ikaṅ kaparadārān, sarvadāni tan ulahakna ika, hayva aṅulalakən asiṅ amuhara alpāyuṣa.

tatprājñe vinītena jñānavijñānavedinā |
nāyuṣkāmena sevyāḥ syurmanasāpi parastriyaḥ ||160||
ya ta mataṅnya, saṅ prājña, saṅ suśīla, saṅ vruh riṅ parijñāna, saṅ ahyun dirghyāyuṣa, tar lamba-lambān juga sira, maṅən-aṅənaṅ kaparadārān.

tadeva saṁsparśasukhaṁ saiva cānte viḍambanā |
svāsu cānyāsu ca strīṣu parastrīṣvatha ko guṇaḥ ||161||
lavan ta vih ikaṅ sukhaniṅ aharas mvaṅ strīniṅ vaṅ, yan tah katmu irikaṅ parastrī, tan pahi vih denyāgave vañcana tah, maṅkana riṅ avadāna visih, yaya tah niyatanika tan pahi, maṅkana pva ya, apa ta phalaniṅ parastrīn keṅinakna.

suśīla[sampādyatām] tasmādvākkāyacittaistu nācaredaśubhaṁ naraḥ |
śubhāśubhaṁ hyācarati tasyāśnute phalam ||162||
mataṅnyan nihan kadāyaknaniṅ vvaṅ, tan vāk, kāya, manah, kavarjanā, makolahaṅ aśubhakarma, apan vvaṅ mulahakən ikaṅ hayu, hayu tinmunya, yapvan hala pinakolahnya, hala tinmunya.

adrohaḥ SaB्teṣu kāyena manasā girā |
anugrahācca dānaṁ ca śilāmetadvidubudhāḥ ||163||
ikaṅ kapātyaniṅ sarvabhāva, hayva jugenulahakən, makadādhanaṅ trikāya, nāṅ kāya, vāk, manah, kunaṅ prihən ya riṅ trikāya, anugraha lavan dāna juga, apan ya ika śīla ṅaranya, liṅ saṅ paṇḍita.

dhaḥ satyaṁ tathā vr̥ttaṁ balaṁ ja़्ścaiva 5maḥ |
niścayena mahārāja sadā nāstyatra saṁśayaḥ ||164||
apan ikaṅ dharma, satya, maryyādāyukti, kaśaktin, śrī, kinaniścayan ika, śīla hetunyan han.

śīlena hi trayolokaḥ śakyā jetuṁ na saṁśayaḥ |
na hikiñcidasādhyaṁ vai loke śīlena niścitaḥ ||165||
apan ikaṅ tribhuvana tuvi, kinaniścayakən ikān alaha, kakavaśa vih, denika saṅ apagəh riṅ śīlayukti, apan tan hana tan katkan denika saṅ suśīla.

śīlaṁ pradhānaṁ Pūe tadyasyeha praṇaśyati |
na tw Jitenārtho duḥśīlaṁ kiṁ prayojanam ||166||
śīla ktikaṅ pradhāna riṅ dadi vvaṅ, hana pravr̥ttiniṅ dadi vvaṅ duśśīla, aparan ta prayojananika riṅ hurip, riṅ vibhava, riṅ kaprajñān, apan varyatha ika kabeh, yan tan hana śīlayukti.

jyāyāṁsamapi śīlena vihīnaṁ naiva pūjayeta|
api śūdraṁ tu dharmajñaṁ savr̥ttaṁ cāpi pūjayeta||167||
yadyapi brāhmaṇa tuha tuvi, yan duśśila, tan yogya katvəṅan, mon śūdra tuvi, yan dhārmika, suśīla, pūjān katvaṅan jugeka, liṅ saṅ hyaṅ aji.

vr̥ttena rakṣyate dharmo vidyā yogena rakṣyate |
mr̥jayā rakṣyate rūpaṁ kulaṁ śīlena rakṣyate ||168||
pravr̥tti rahayu kta sādhananiṅ rumakṣaṅ dharma, yapvan saṅ hyaṅ aji, jñāna pagəh ekatāna sādhana ri karakṣanira, kunaṅ ikaṅ rūpa, si radin paṅrakṣa irika, yapvan kasujanman, kasuśīlan sādhananiṅ rumakṣa ika.

ātmānamākhyāti kulīno yo naraḥ svaśīlacāritrakr̥taiḥ śubhodayaiḥ |
pranaṣṭamapyātmakulaṁ tathā naraḥ punaḥ prakāśaṁ kurute svaśīlataḥ ||169||
ulah rahayu mara ketunikaṅ vvaṅ kinavruhan kasujanmanya, yadyapin hilaṅa ktaṅ kapvaṅan, yan suśīla ikaṅ vvaṅ vvaṅ, ndān kinavruhan muvah kapvaṅan ika.

sarve ca vedāḥ saha ṣaḍbhiraṅgaiḥ sāṁkhyaṁ purāṇaṁ ca kule ca janma |
sarvāṇi naitāni gatirbhavanti śīlavyapetasya narasya rājana||170||
apan saṅ hyaṅ caturvveda saka ṣaḍaṅgopāṅganira, saṅ hyaṅ sāṅkhya, saṅ hyaṅ purāṇa, lavan ika kasujanman ikaṅ kula kunəṅ, ika ta kabeh, tan katmu phalanika deniṅ kaduśsīlan, kaliṅanya, varyatha vruhnya aṅaji lavan kasujanmanya.

na bāndhavā na ca vittaṁ na vidyā na ca śrutaṁ na ca mantrā na vīryam |
duḥkhāttrātuṁ sarva evotsahante paratra śīle na tu tatra loke ||171||
lavan ta vaneh, tar vnaṅ ikaṅ kadaṅ kulahgātra matuluṅ maṅəntasakən, saṅkeṅ kaprihati, maṅkanaṅ mās salvirniṅ dr̥bya, maṅkanaṅ kasujanman, maṅkanaṅ aji, maṅkana saṅ hyaṅ mantra, makkanaṅ vīdyar, tan vnaṅ jugeka manuluṅ, kunəṅ vnaṅ manuluṅ, kasuśīlan juga, apan prasiddha vnaṅ maḍəmiṅ duhkha riṅ paraloka dlāha.

yo lokam anugr̥hṇāti daridraṁ dīnamānasam |
sa putrapaśubhirvr̥ddhiṁ yaśaścākṣayam aśnute ||172||
hana ta vvaṅ maṅke kramanya, maveh anugraha, masukha agave bodhana, riṅ vvaṅ daridra, enak ta ya manahnya, ika ta vvaṅ maṅkana, vrəddhi hanaknya, putunya, vka vetnya kneṅ vnaṅ-vnaṅnya, lavan kocapani lkasnya riṅ hayu.

amitramapi yo dīnaṁ śaraṇaiṣiṇamāgatam |
vyasaneṣvanugr̥hṇāti sa vai puruṣa ucyate ||173||
len saṅkerika, hana ya maṅke kramanya, musuknya tovi, salvirniṅ makira-kira riṅ hala, dīna alara katnan prihati, mara ta ya maminta śaraṇa iriya, tinuluṅnya ta ya, ikaṅ maṅkana kramanya, ya ika puruṣasattama ṅaranya, tuhu sajjana viśeṣaniṅ vvaṅ.

dānam[sampādyatām] sārthaḥ pravasato mitraṁ bhāryā mitraṁ gr̥he sataḥ |
āturasya bhiṣaṅmitraṁ dānaṁ mitraṁ mariṣyataḥ ||174||
hyaṅ riñciniṅ mitra ṅaranya, nyaṅ adagaṅ, vaṇija, baṇyāga, yeki mitraniṅ vvaṅ maṅlampuran, apasah apadohan, kunaṅ mitra saṅ grəhastha, strīnira ika, yapvan vvaṅ alara, valyan, mami-mami mitra nika, kunaṅ ikaṅ vvaṅ meh mātya, dānapuṇya mitranika.

na mātā na pitā kiñcitkasyacitpratipadyate |
dānapathyodano jantuḥ svakarmaphalamaśnute ||175||
ika taṅ dana, tan bapa, tan ibu, umukti phalanika, aṅhiṅ ikaṅ vvaṅ gumavayakən ikaṅ dānapuṇya, ya juga umukti phalanikaṅ dānapuṇya.

amātsaryaṁ budhāḥ prāhurdānaṁ dharme ca saṁyamam |
avasthitena nityaṁ hi tyāgetyāsādyate śubham ||176||
nihan taṅ dāna liṅ saṅ paṇḍita, ikaṅ si hayva kimburu, ikaṅ si jnək ri kagapayaniṅ dharmasādhana, apan yan laṅgəṅ ika, nitya katəmvaniṅ hayu, paḍa lavan phalaniṅ kyāgadāna.

dānena bhogī bhavati medhāvī vr̥ddhasevayā |
ahiṁsayā ca dīrghāyuriti prāhurmanīṣiṇaḥ ||177||
kunəṅ phalaneṅ tyāgadāna, yāvat katmuṅ bhogopabhoga riṅ paraloka dlāha, yapvan phalaniṅ sevaka riṅ vvaṅ kabayan, katmuṅ medhāguṇa, si yatnān kitātutur, kunəṅ phalaniṅ ahiṅsā, si tan pamāti-māti, kadīrghyāyuṣan, maṅkana liṅ saṅ paṇḍita.

na dānād duṣkarataraṁ triṣu lokeṣu vidyate |
arthe hi mahatī tr̥ṣṇā sa ca kr̥cchreṇa labhyate ||178||
apan riṅ tribhuvabha, tan hana mevəh kagavayanya, len saṅkeṅ dāna, agə̄ṅ vi kaṅ trəṣnā riṅ artha, apan ulihniṅ kasakitaniṅ kaṅ artha katmu.

duṣkaraṁ bata kurvanti mahato’rthāṁstyajanti ye |
vayaṁ tvenānparityaktumasato’pi na śaknumaḥ ||179||
āścaryya mata saṅhulun ri saṅ pnaṅ tumiṅgalakən kvehniṅ dr̥byanira, prasiddha mulahakəniṅ duṣkara ṅaranira, hetuniṅ maṅkana, nora paran ri kami, ndātan vnaṅ juga kami tumiṅgalakən ikaṅ tan hana ri kami, tan pahuvusan trəṣnā aṅayam-ayam kaliṅanya.

arthavānarthamarthibhyo na dadātyatra ko guṇaḥ |
ekaiva gatirarthasya dānyamanyavipattayaḥ ||180||
kunəṅ, annvaṅujar saṅ sugih maveh dāna riṅ kāsyasih, tan padon ika, apan kevala tuṅgal deniṅ mās, dānākna juga kārih, len saṅkerika donya, lara kativasən ṅaranika.

dhanāni jivitaṁ caiva parārthe prājñā utsr̥jeta|
sannimittaṁ varaṁ tyāgo vināśe nīyate satī ||181||
maṅke mara de saṅ enak vruhnira, tar tinṅətnira māsnira, huripnira tuvi, yan pakaphalaṁ kaparamārthan, vruh vi sira riṅ niyataniṅ pāti mvaṅ ri tan hananiṅ vastu laṅgəṅ, mataṅyan ləhəṅ, ikaṅ vibhāśa makaphalaṅ kaparamārthan.

dāḍadhvaṁ bhūñjatā bhr̥śaṁ mā bhūta kr̥paṇā janāḥ |
karmakṣayeṇa kṣīyante nopabhogena sañcayāḥ ||182||
mataṅnya deya nikaṅ vvaṅ, hayva juga tṅət, maveveha gavaya dānapuṇya, mamuktya, apan tan hənti ikaṅ vibhava, yan tan hənti ikaṅ karmaphala humadākənya.

agnihotrāphalā vedā dattabhuktaphalaṁ dhanam |
ratiputraphalā nārī śīlavr̥ttaphalaṁ śrutam ||183||
nihan pājara mami, phala saṅ hyaṅ vedan inaji, kapujān saṅ hyaṅ śivāgni, rapvan vruh riṅ mantra, yajñāṅga vidhi-vidhābhadi, kunaṁ doniṅ dhanan hinanākən, bhuktin dābhākna, yapvan doniṅ anakbi, dadyaniṅ āliṅganādi krīḍā maputra-putrī santāna, kunəṅ phala saṅ hyaṅ ajinnika vruhan, hayvaniṅ śīla mvaṅ ācāra, śīla ṅaraniṅ svabhava, ācāra ṅaraniṅ pravr̥tti kavarah riṅ aji.

dhanena kiṁ yena dadāti nāśnute balena kiṁ yena ripūnna bādhate |
śrutena kiṁ yena na dharmamācaret kimātmanā yo na jitendriyo vaśī ||184||
ndya kari doniṅ dhan, yan tan dānākna, tan bhuktin, maṅkanaṅ kaśaktin, tan padon ika yan tan sādhananiṅ maṅalahannaṅ musuh, maṅkanaṅ aji, tan padon ika yan tan suluha ri dharmasādhana, maṅkanaṅ buddhi kaprajñān, tan padon ika yan tan paṅalahaknenidraya, tan paṅavaśāknaṅ rajah tamah.

yasya pradānavandhyāni dhanānyāyānti yānti ca |
sa lohakārabhastreva śvasannapi na jivati ||185||
kunaṅ ikaṅ vvaṅ luṅhā tkā māsnya, tan pakahetuṅ dāna, ya ika māti ṅaranya, tuhun māmbəkan, bhedanya saṅkeṅ vaṅke, tan pahi lapan ububaniṅ paṅḍe vsi.

dānaṁ hi bhūtābhayadakṣiṇāyāḥ sarvāṇi dānānyadhitiṣṭhatīha |
tīkṣṇaṁ tanuṁ yaḥ prathamaṁ jahāti so’nantamāpnotyabhayaṁ prajābhyaḥ ||186||
hana ta abhayadāna ṅaranya, lvih saṅkeṁ sarvadāna, mahīdānādi, kramanya, abhaya, tayaniṅ takut, dāna, ya ta vinehakənya riṅ sarvabhāva, tan pagave takutniṅ sarvabhāva kaliṅanya, ikaṅ vvaṅ maṅkana kramanya, ya ika tan kataman bhayān haneṅ rāt, amoghāsih avlas anukūla bhakti ikaṅ sarvabhāva iriya dlāha.

p.quote:
deśakālāgamakṣetradravyadātr̥manoguṇāḥ |
sukr̥tasyāpi dānasya phalātiśayahetavaḥ ||187||
samaṅkeṅ amuhara gə̄ṅniṅ dānaphala, pratyekanya, deśa, kāla, āgama, kṣetra, dr̥bya, dātā, manah, hayun ika kabeh, yatika amaṅun bhāraniṅ dānaphala, deśa ṅaraniṅ bhūbhāga, anuṅ rahayva śucya tikaṅ bhūbhāga, deśa pavehana dāna, kāla ṅaraniṅ śubhakāla, nāṅ uttarāyaṇādi, āgama ṅaranya varah saṅ hyaṅ aji, anuṅ tumasakakəniṅ varah saṁ hyaṁ āgama, tah kramanya, kṣetra ṅaran saṅ vehana dāna, anuṅ sulakṣaṇa supātra ta sira, dr̥bya ikaṅ vastu dābhākna, anuṅ uttama ta ya, dātā ṅaran saṅ masuṅ dāna, saṅ yajamāna, magave dāna, manah, buddhi saṅ yajamāna, śraddhā lvā ta ya, makanimitta atiśayaniṅ dābhaphala, hetunyan panmuṅ hayva.

body.p:
dvāvimau puruṣavyāghra svargasyopari tiṣṭhataḥ |
durbhikṣe cānnadātā ca subhikṣe ca hiraṇyadaḥ ||188||
lavan ta vaneh, ikaṅ vvaṅ mapuṇya skul, ri kālaniṅ durbhikṣa, mvaṅ hana ta mapuṇya mās, ri kālaniṅ subhikṣa, ika ta kālih, paḍa ya ta rakveka muṅga iṅ ruhurniṅ svarga dlāha.

anyeṣu ca yaddattaṁ ṣaḍaśītimukheṣu ca |
candrasūryoparāge ca viṣṇave ca tadakṣayam ||189||
nyaṅ śubhakāla, pratyekanya, hana dakṣiṇāyana ṅaranya, tambe saṅ hyaṅ ādityāṅidul, hana uttarāyaṇa ṅaranya, tambe saṅ hyaṅ ādityāṅalor, hana ṣaḍaśītimukha ṅaranya, somagraha, sūryagraha, viṣuvakāla kunaṅ, ikaṅ vastu dānākna ri kāla samaṅkana, atiśaya rakva bhārani phalanika.

prāṇasantāpanirviṣṭāḥ kākinyo’pi mahāFaḥ |
anyāyopārjtaidattā na parārthe sahasraśaḥ ||190||
yadyapin akḍika ikaṅ dāna, ndān maṅəne vəlkaṁ ya, agə̄ṅ phalanika, yadyapin akveha tuvi, maṅke vəlkaṅ tuvi, yan antukniṅ anyāya, niṣphala ika, kaliṅanya, tan si kveh, tan si kḍik, amsāra kveh kḍikniṅ dānphala, kunəṅ paramārthanya, nyāyā-nyāyaniṅ dāna juga.

arthaṁ na dadyānna cāsatsu ṅānbrūyānna cānaḥ |
ādadyācca na sādhubhyo nāsatPūaṁ saṁśrayeta||191||
hayva ta maveh dāna riṅ tan sajjan, hayva ta mucap guṇa iṅ avakta, hayva tan aṅgap, da:napuṇya saṅkeṅ tan sādhu, hayva ta marāśraya riṅ tan sajjan.

brāhmaṇaścenna vidyeta śrutavr̥ttopasaṁhitaḥ |
pratigrahītā dānasya moghaṁ syāddhanināṁ dhanam ||192||
yan tan hana kta saṅ brāhmaṇa, anuṅ śuddhācāra vruh ya ri saṅ hyaṅ aji, sayogya vehanaṅ dān, liṅ saṅ paṇḍita, dadya niṣphala dhananika saṅ dātā, hiṅanyan tan ṅaraṅ saṅ vehana dāna.

caritraniyatā rājanye kr̥śāḥ kr̥śavr̥ttayaḥ |
arthinaścopagacchanti teṣu dattaṁ mahāFpha़् ||193||
lvirniṅ yukti ikaṅ vehana dāna, vvaṅ śuddhācāra, vvaṅ daridra, tan panmu āhāra, vvaṅ mara aṅgə̄ṅ harəp kunəṅ, ikaṅ dāna riṅ vvaṅ maṅkana agə̄ṅ phalanika.

na dadyādyācase dānaṁ na bhayānnopakāriṇe |
na nr̥tyagītaśīlebhyo hāsakebhyo na dharmikaḥ ||194||
deyaniṅ aveha dāna, hayva maprarojana pāləman, hayva deniṅ vdi, hayva maphala pratyu pakāra, hayva riṅ bhaṇḍagiṇa, maṅkana deya saṅ dhārmmika, maveha mata sira, ndātan dhana ṅaranika, veveh dəmakan pratyu pakāra ṅaranika.

mātā pitā vā prāṇānāṁ bhavatāmarthinau yadi |
tābhyāṁ sampratidātavyaste hi tābhyāmupārjitāḥ ||195||
kunəṅ yan bapa ibunta sira maminta dāna, yadyan huripta tovi, suṅakna juga ri sira, apan sira humanākənika.

yanmātāpitarau kleśaṁ sahete garbhadhāraṇe |
na tasya niṣkr̥tiḥ śakyā kartuṁ varṣaśatairapi ||196||
apayapan agə̄ṅ ikaṅ duhkha kabhukti denira, ṅūnin hana riṅ garbha, sarvadāya hutaṅta ika sakarəṅ, yaya tan kavnaṅnyaṅ sahurənta sātus tahun.

daridrānbhaja kaunteya mā prayaccheśvare dhanam |
vyādhitasyauṣadhaṁ pathyaṁ nīrujasya kimauṣadhaiḥ ||197||
kunəṅ pvānaku, kamuṅ vka saṅ kontī, daridraha tikaṅ vehananta dāna, hayva maveh riṅ sugih, apan riṅ vyādhi yogyaniṅ tambān vehakna, kunəṅ riṅ varas, tan papaknaṅ tambā denika.

ayācataḥ sīdataśca sarvopāyairniyantavyaḥ |
ānr̥śaṁsyaṁ paro dharmo’yācate yatpradīyate ||198||
hana ya vvaṅ daridra, ndātan pamalaku, upāyanika sakāraṇanyan pamalakva, apan syanrəśaṅsa pva viśeṣaniṅ dharma ṅaranya, yatika katmu ri kavehaniṅ dāna riṅ amalaku.

nāvamanyetābhigatī na praṇudyātkathañcana |
api śvapāke śuni vā na dānaṁ vipraṇaśyati ||199||
lavan hayva ta sampe riṅ amalaku dāna, hayva matuṇḍuṅ, yadyapin riṅ saṇḍāla, śrəgāla tuvi, tan viphala ikaṅ dāna irika.

ahanyahani yācantaṁ ko’vamanyedguruṁ yathā |
mārjanaṁ darpaṇasyeva yaḥ karoti dine dine ||200||
lavan ta vaneh, syapa kari sampaya riṅ amalaku dāna, salvirniṅ manasi sāri-sāri, marāṅgə̄ṅ harəp, tan hana bhedanira lavan guru mājar dharma, sabukaniṅ vain lot kumilaṅakən malaniṅ aveh dāna, kady aṅganiṅ maṅisuhi crəmin, lot sāri-sāri maṅlilaṅakən mala, maṅkana ta saṅ manasi.

nātaḥ paraṁ ca lokeṣu kiñcitpāpiṣṭamasti vai |
yathātmanāśanaṁ loke nāsti dehīti vā punaḥ ||201||
tan hana kta kapāpan lviha saṅkeriki, ikaṅ sumahurakənə nāsti, si mujarakənə dehi kunəṅ, dehi maveveha kita, liṅnikaṅ marā mintāṅgə̄ṅ harəp, nāsti, tan hana, sahurnikaṅ atṅət, pinintan, vkasniṅ kapāpanika, ika taṅ makojar dehi, phalaśeṣani kapāpaniṅ sumahur nāsti ṅūni ika, mataṅnyar paḍa pāpanika kālih.

śikṣyantii na yacchante dehīti kr̥paṇā narāḥ |
avastheyamadānasya mā bhūdevaṁ bhavāniti ||202||
kunəṅ kapavitranika saṅ manasi mara aminta dāna, ri denyar pavara-varah, mapitutur, kumva liṅnira, hayva juga ṅvaṅ matṅət, prihən kagavayakna tapva ikaṅ dāna, vulatana kta avasthāniṅ tan pagave dāna ṅūni, ya ika mamaṅke kadi saṅhulun, yathanya tan mamaṅke ya, mataṅnyan gavayakna ikaṅ dāna, maṅkana liṅnira vara-varah, tatar panasi sirar maṅkana apitutur juga, mataṅnyan pavitra.

pradadyāddeyamityeva yajedyaṣṭavyamityapi |
astu vāstraphalaṁ mā ca kartavyaṁ puruṣeṇa hi ||203||
lavan vaneh yadyapin hanā, tan hana kunəṅ ikaṅ phala, vehakna ta pva yathāsaMBhava, sakāya-kāya, ikaṅ yogya pehakna, maṅkanaṅ vastu yogya pūjākna, pūjākna juga, niyata maphala pvaṅ dāna, ṅūni-ṅūni tikān gavayən,

hiraṇyadānaṁ godānaṁ pr̥thivīdānamityapi |
etāni vai pavitrāṇi tāryantii paratra ca ||204||
kunaṅ ikaṅ kanakadāna, godāna, bhūmidāna, vkasniṅ pavitra ika, pavitra ṅaraniṅ maṅhilaṅakən kleśa, lavan mankākən riṅ svarggaloka.

suvarṇaṁ rajataṁ vastrī maṇimuktāvasūni ca |
sarvametanmahārāja dadāsi vasuvāndhanam ||205||
nihan saṅkṣepaniṅ dādākna, mās, pirak, dodot, maṇik mutya, bhūmi salvirniṅ vastu mulya, yatika dādākna.

dadyācchubhaṁ yaḥ kapilāṁ sacelāṁ kāṁsyopadohāṁ kanakāgraśr̥ṅgīm |
taistairguṇaiḥ kāmadughā hi bhūtvā naraṁ pradātāramupaiti sā gauḥ ||206||
kunəṅ yan ləmbu kapilā, lvirnikaṅ dādākna, dodotana ta ya, bhūṣaṇani kanaka tuṅ-tuṅniṅ suṅunya, saha kāṅsabhājana, vavaniṅ aməh, phalanya dlāha, kāmadughā dhenu, ləmbu mamətvakna sakahyun, kadi bhaṭarī nandinī, dr̥byanika riṅ paraloka.

sugandhadhūpāny anulepanāni snānāni mālyāni ca mānavo yaḥ |
dadyāddvijebhyaḥ sa bhavedarogī tathā surūpaśca sa devaloke ||207||
yapvan asəp sugandha, śarīralepana kunəṅ, aṅgarāga makādi jnu dodot, kəmbaṅ inaṅit, lvirnikaṅ dāna, ika saṅ maveh dāna maṅkana, sira ta lituhayu, nirvyādhi sulakṣaṇa surūpa dlāha.

tilāndadata pānīyaṁ dīpāndadata mā prathā |
jñātībhiḥ saha modadhvametatpretya sudurlabham ||208||
nihan ta lvirniṅ dāna tan evəh, lṅa vuṅkal, vvai, vr̥tti, pañjut, phalanya, masukha-sukhan lavan kadaṅ-varga dlāha.

durlabhaṁ salilaṁ tāta viśeṣeṇa paratra ca |
pānīyasya pradānena tr̥ptirbhavati śāśvatī ||209||
lavan atyanta durlabha kta ikaṅ vvai ri pə̄na, hana pva magave saliladāna, niyata ika amaṅgiḥ tr̥pti, tan kevəhan riṅ bañu dlāha.

alokadātā cakṣuṣmānprabhāyukto bhavennaraḥ |
pradīpadaḥ svargaloke dīpamāleva rājate ||210||
kunaṅ ika saṅ madānapuṇya suluh, rahayu matanira dlāha, surūpa akiris aləṅis, luməṅ tejanira, yapvan pañjut dānapuṇyanikaṅ vvaṅ, suteja surūpa abhrā haləp dlāha.

chetraṁ hi bhārataśreṣṭha yo dadāti dvijātaye |
sa cakraloke vasati pūjyamāno’psarogaṇaiḥ ||211||
kunəṅ phalaniṅ mapuṇya payuṅ riṅ saṅ brāhmaṇa, mantuk riṅ indraloka jmah, pinūjā kinatvaṅan deniṅ vidyādhara vidyādharī.

upanāhau tu yo dadyācchlakṣṇasnehasamanvitau |
