klabakna taṅ ləməh, taki-takin vara-varah saṅ hyaṅ dharmasāstra, ri maryyādāniṅ caturvarṇa sovaṅ-sovaṅ, sarvadāyaniṅ dharmasādhana ika, makapagvan kābyāsaniṅ śiṣṭācāra.

ācārādvicyuto janturna dhaFamaśnute |
ācārā hi saṁyuktaḥ samPnaFabhāgbhaveta||260||
apan ikaṅ vvaṅ yan panasar saṅkeṅ śiṣṭācāra, vyartha ikaṅ dharmasādhana ginavenya, tan kabhukti phalanya dlāha, kunaṅ ika saṅ apagəh riṅ śiṣṭācāra, paripuṇa phalanikaṅ dharmasādhana, kabhukti denira dlāha.

amāvāsyaṁ caturdaśyāṁ Pnamasyaṣṭamīṣu ca |
brahmacārī bhavenṇīamamr̥tasnātako dvijaḥ ||261||
nihan tācāranika saṅ brāhmaṇa, yan riṅ amāvāsyā, caturdaśī, riṅ pūrṇamā, riṅ aṣṭamīkāla kunəṅ, brahmacāryya juga sira, hayva parəkiṅ strī, ṅaraniṅ brata maṅkana, amrətasnātaka.

yamaniyamavrata[sampādyatām] nādattamicchenna pibecca madyaṁ prāṇānna hiṁsenna vadecca mithyām |
parasya dārānmanasāpi necched yaḥ svargamicchedgr̥havatpraveṣṭum ||262||
lavan hayva aṅalap yan tan pāyupobhayan, hayva tāṅinum madya, hayva amāti-mati, hayva mithyā riṅ vacana, hayva aṅaṅən-aṅən paradāra, yan ahyun mantuka riṅ svarga.

nr̥tyaṁ gītaṁ vāditraṁ gandhamālyaṁ yānaṁ darpaṁ śāyanaṁ cāsavaṁ ca |
saṁvarjayanparvakāle mitāśī marutāṁ lokānakṣayānabhyupaiti ||263||
lavan pihərana ikaṅ pinaṅan, vvaṅ deniṅ amaṅan, iriṅana taṅ bhojanakāla, hayva tāṅigəl, hayva tāṅiduṅ, hayva monyunyan, hayva magandhalepana, hayvāskar, inaṅit, hayva aṅlaku-laku, hayva asukha-sukhan darpavija-vijah, hayva avut turu, hayva aṅinum madya, phalanya, tan hiniṅan, ikaṅ svargaloka kabhukti dlāha.

yamānseveta satataṁ na nityaṁ niyamānbudhaḥ |
yamānpatatyasevanhi niyamānkevalaṁ bhajana||264||
lavan yama ikaṅ prihən nityaśa gavayakna, kunəṅ ikaṅ niyama, vnaṅ ika tan laṅgəṅən gavayakna, apan ika saṅ manəkət gumavayakən ikaṅ niyama, tātan yatna ri kagavayaniṅ yama, tibā sira riṅ nirayaloka.

ānr̥śaṁsyaṁ kṣamā satyamahiṁsā dama ārjavam |
prītiḥ prasādo mādhuryaṁ mārdavaṁ ca yamā daśa ||265||
nyaṅ brata ikaṅ inaranan yama, pratyekanya nihan, sapuluh kvehnya, ānrəśaṅsya, kṣamā, satya, ahiṅsā, dama, ārjava, prīti, prasāda, mādhurya, mārdava, nahan pratyekanya sapuluh, ānrəśaṅsya, si harimbava, tan svārtha kevala, kṣamā, ci kəlan riṅ panastīs, satya, si tan mrəṣāvāda, manukhe sarvabhava, dama, si upaśama vruh mituturi manahnya, ārjava, si duga-dugābnər, prīti, si gə̄ṅ karuṇa, prasāda, hniṅniṅ manah, mādhurya, manisniṅ vulat lavan vuvus, mārdava, pə̄sniṅ manah.

dānamijyā tapo dhyānaṁ svādhyāyopasthanigrahaḥ |
vratopavāsamaunaṁ ca ānanaṁ ca niyamā daśa ||266||
nyaṅ brata sapuluh kvehnya, ikaṅ niyama ṅaranya, pratyekanya, dāna, ijyā, tapa, dyāna, svādhyāya, upasthanigraha, brata, upavāsa, mauna snāna, nahan ta avakniṅ niyama, dāna veveh, annadānādi, ijyā, devapūjā, pitrəpūjādi, tapa, kāyasaṅśoṣaṇa, kasatan ikaṅ śarīra, bhūśayyā, jalatyāgādi, dhyān, ikaṅ śivasmaraṇa, svādhyāya, vedābhyāsa, upasthanigraha, kahrətaniṅ upastha, brata annavarjjādi, mauna, vācaṅyama, kahrətaniṅ ujar, hayvākəcək kunəṅ, snāna, trisaṅdhyāsavana, madyusa ri kālaniṅ sandhya.

arthaḥ[sampādyatām] dharmeṇārthaḥ samāhāryo dharmalabdhaṁ tridhā dhanam |
kartavyaṁ dharmaparamaṁ mānavena prayatnataḥ ||267||
lavan tkapaniṅ maṅarjana, makapagvanaṅ dharma ta ya, ikaṅ dāna antukniṅ maṅarjana, yatika patlun, sādhana riṅ tlu, kayatnākna.

ekenāṁśena dharmārthaḥ kartavyo bhūmimicchataḥ |
ekenāṁśena kāmārtha ekamaṁśaṁ vivardhayeta||262||
nihan kramanyan pinatlu, ikaṅ sabhāga, sādhana ri kasiddhaniṅ dharma, ikaṅ kapiṅrvaniṅ bhāga, sādhana ri kasiddhaniṅ kāma ika, ikaṅ kapiṅtiga, sādhana ri kasiddhaniṅ artha ika, vrəddhyakna muvah, maṅkana kramanyan pinatiga, denika saṅ mahyun maṅgihaknaṅ hayu.

ye’rthā dharmeṇa te labhyā ye dharmeṇa dhigastu tāna|
dharmānvai śāśvataṁ loke na jahyādarthakāṅkṣayā ||269||
apan ikaṅ artha, yan dharma lvirniṅ kārjananya, ya ika lābha ṅaranya, paramārthaniṅ amaṅgih sukha saṅ tuməmvakən ika, kunəṅ yan ardhamma lvirniṅ kārjananya, kaśmala ika, siniṅgahan de saṅ sajana, mataṅnyan hayva anasar saṅke dharma, yan taṅarjana.

dharmārthaṁ yasya vittehā tasyānīha garīyasī |
prakṣālanāddhi paṅkasya dūrādasparśanaṁ varam ||270||
hana pva vvaṅ maṅke kramanya, maṅga makasādhanaṅ adharma, an paṅarjanārtha, an sādhana riṅ dharma prayojananikaṅ artha denya, ikaṅ vvaṅ maṅkana kramanya, ləhəṅ juga yan tan paṅarjana, apan yukti tmən ikaṅ maniṅgali latək saṅka riṅ maṅambah, yadyapin, vasəhana avasānanya.

savesāmeva śaucānāmarthaśaucaṁ viśiṣyate |
yo’rthe śucirhi sā śucirna mr̥dvāriśuciḥ śuciḥ ||271||
apan iri sakvehniṅ śauca, nāṅ pākraśauca, mrətśauca, jalaśauca, bhasmaśaucādi, ṅhiṅ arthaśauca juga lvih, kaliṅanya, ikaṅ śuci riṅ artha ṅaranya, sumiṅgahiṅ anyāyārtha, ya ika paramārthaniṅ śuci ṅaranya, kunaṅ ikaṅ śuci deniṅ jalaśaucādi, tan paramārthaniṅ śuci ika.

ye’rthāḥ kleśena mahatā dharmasyātikrameṇa vā |
arervā praṇipātena mā sma teṣu kr̥thā manaḥ ||272||
hana yārtha ulihniṅ parikleśa, ulihniṅ anyāya kunəṅ, athavā kasəmbahaniṅ śatru kunəṅ, hetunya ikaṅ artha maṅkana kramanya, tan keṅinakna ika.

jātasya hi kule mukhye paravitteṣu gr̥dhyataḥ |
lobhaśca prajñāmāhanti prajñā hanti hatā śriyam ||273||
yadyapin kulaja ikaṅ vvaṅ, yan eṅin riṅ para dr̥bya haraṇa, hilaṁ kaprajñān ika deniṅ kalobhanya, hilaṅniṅ kaprajñānya, ya ta humilaṅakən śrīnya, haləpnya salvirniṅ vibhavanya.

dharmaścārthaśca kāmaśca tritayaṁ jivite phalam |
etattrayamavāptavyamadharmaparivarjitam ||274||
tlu kta phalaniṅ hurip ṅaranya, avaknyan tlu, dharma, artha, kāma, nahan tāvaknyan tlu, hayva ta kaslatan adharmma.

avandhyaṁ divasaṁ kuryāddharmataḥ kāmato’rthataḥ |
gate hi divase tasmiṁstadūnaṁ tasya jivitam ||275||
hayva tikaṅ kāla vineḥ niṣphala, vehən saphala juga ya, pilih upayogākna, i kasiddhaniṅ dharma artha tāma kunəṅ, apan tan vuruṅ kṣayaniṅ hurip, irikaṅ kāla, mataṅnyan pəṅpəṅən ikaṅ hurip hayva tālakṣepa.

yanna dharmāya nārthāya na kāmāya na śāntaye |
vyarthaṁ tajjanmināṁ janma maraṇāyaiva kevalam ||276||
ikaṅ vvaṅ tan paniddhākən dharma, artha, kāma, mokṣa, hemana hana-hana apārthaka huripnya, ṅaranikān maṅkana, umiṅu śarīranya paṅanəniṅ mr̥tyu ika.

arthāṁstyajata pātreṣu bhajadhvaṁ kāmajānguṇāna|
priyaṁ priyebhyaḥ kuruta mr̥tyurhi tvarate jayī ||277||
mataṅnyan tiṅgalakna ikaṅ artha, dānākna ri saṅ pātra, pātra ṅaran saṅ yogya vehana dāna, maṅkana ikaṅ bogopabhoga, salvirniṅ viṣaya, bhuktinnatika, ikaṅ vastu sānukheri hatinta, vehakna riṅ manukheri hatinta, sakasṅəpta, apan ikaṅ mr̥tyu agya juga ya, tan kavnaṅ inalahakən.

sukham[sampādyatām] iha vaikasya nāmutra amutraikasya no iha |
iha cāmutra caikasya nāmutraikasya no iha ||278||
apan ikaṅ vvaṅ ṅaranya, hana sukha maṅke juga, tan sukha riṅ janmāntara, hana ta sukha riṅ janmāntara juga, tan sukha maṅke, hana ta sukha maṅke, riṅ janmāntara vaneh sukha tah, hana tātan sukha maṅke, tan sukha riṅ janmāntara.

dhanāni yeṣāṁ vipulāni santi nityaṁ ramante suvibhūṣitāśca |
teṣāmayaṁ śatruvaraghnaloko nāsau sadā dehasukhe ratānām ||279||
nihan ikaṅ sukha maṅke ṅaranya, hana vvaṅ sugih tan pahiṅan kvehniṅ māsnya piraknya, ndān bhinuktinya juga, sinaṇḍaṅnya, pinaṅanya pisaniṅu dadahakna riṅ dharmakriyā, ikaṅ vvaṅ maṅkana pravrəttinya, ya ika sukha maṅke juga ṅaranya.

ye yuktayogās tapasi prasaktāḥ svādhyāyaśīlā jarayanti dehāna|
jitendriyā bhūtahite niviṣṭās teṣāmasau nāyamarighna lokaḥ ||280||
kunaṅ ikaṅ vvaṅ tan kaluban masamādhi, jnək gumavayaṅ tapa, tuhagaṇa vidyābhyāsa, jitekdriya, māsih riṅ sarvasatya, ikaṅ vvaṅ maṅkana, ya ika sukha dlāha ṅaranya.

ye dharmameva prathamaṁ caranti dharmeṇa labdhvā ca dhanāni kāle |
dārānavāpya kratubhiryajante teṣāmayaṁ caiva paraśca lokaḥ ||281||
nihan lvirnikaṅ vvaṅ sukha maṅke, sukha dlāha, hana ya maṅabhyāsa dharmasādhana, ri tlasnyan paripūrṇa kadamlaniṅ dharmasādhana denya, maṅarjana ta ya artha, dharmatah denyāṅarjana, mastrī pva ya, mamukti viṣaya, dharmata denya, muvah mayajñā ta ya, devayajñā, pitrəyajñādi, ikaṅ vvaṅ maṅkana, yatika sukha maṅke, sukha dlāha ṅaranya.

ye naiva vidyāṁ na tapo na dānaṁ dānaṁ na cāpi pūjāṁ kratubhiryajante |
na cādhigacchanti sukhānyabhāgyās teṣāmayaṁ caiva paraśca lokaḥ ||282||
kunaṅ ikaṅ vvaṅ maṅke kramanya, tan paṅaji ya, tan patapa, tan paveh dāna, tan pūjā, tan yajñā, ikaṅ ginavayakanya, nirbhāgya ta ya, tivas viphala, asiṅ sasolahnya, tātan panmu sukha, ikaṅ vvaṅ maṅkana kramanya, yatika tan sukha maṅke, tan sukha dlāha ṅaranya.

tīrthayātrā[sampādyatām] akrodhanaśca rājendra satyaśīlo dr̥ḍhavrataḥ |
ātmopamaśca bhūteṣu sa tīrthaphalamaśnute ||283||
hana ya vvaṅ maṅke kramanya, tan katamana krodha, satya ta ya, apagəh ta ya riṅ brata, māsih riṅ sarvabhūta, tar pahi lavan avaknya, ikaṅ sarvasattva ri hiḍupnya, ikaṅ vvaṅ maṅkana kramanya, phalaniṅ tīrthayātrā katmu denika dlāha, tīrthayātrā ṅaraniṅ mahas agləm atīrtha.

anupoṣya trirātrāṇi tirthānyanabhigamya ca |
adattvā kāñcanaṁ gāśca daridro nāma jāyate ||284||
nihan hananiṅ tan patīrtha, hana ya vvaṅ maṅke kramanya, tapvan popavāsa tigaṅ vṅi, tapvan pādyus riṅ tīrtha, tapvan paveh kāñcanadāna, godāna, ikaṅ vvaṅ maṅkana kramanya, ya ika paramārthaniṅ daridra ṅaranya.

sadā daridrairapi hi śakyaṁ prāptuṁ narādhipa |
tīrthābhigamanaṁ puṇyaṁ yajñerapi viśiṣyate ||285||
apan maṅke kāttamaniṅ tīrthayātrā, atyanta pavitra, lvih saṅkeṅ kalāvananiṅ yajña, vnaṅ ulahakna riṅ daridra.

daridraḥ[sampādyatām] mr̥to daridraḥ puruṣo mr̥taṁ rājyamarakṣakam |
mr̥tamaśrotriyaṁ śrāddhaṁ mr̥to yajñastvadakṣiṇaḥ ||286||
ika taṅ vvaṅ daridra, ya ika māti ṅaranya, maṅkanaṅ rāṣṭra, vanvāgə̄ṅ, janapada punpunan, ya tan paratu, māti ṅaranika, maṅkanaṅ śrāddha, pitrətarppaṇa, ya śrāddha ṅaranya, yan tan kinahanan saṅ śrotriya, māti ṅaranika, śrotriya ṅaran saṅ samāpta riṅ veda, saṅ huvus tumamakən saṅ hyaṅ veda, maṅkanaṅ yajña yan tan padakṣiṇā, māti ṅaranika.

durbhikṣādeva durbhikṣaṁ bhayādatibhayaṁ tathā |
mr̥tebhyaḥ pramr̥taṁ yānti daridrāḥ pāpakāriṇaḥ ||287||
anona pva kita daridra, mulahakna ikaṅ adharmma, ya lvirniṅ kapāpan, ya ika durbhikṣa saṅkeṅ durbhikṣa ṅaranya, vkasniṅ karahaṅ kleśa saṅkeṅ kleśa, vkasniṅ sinaṅgah kleśa, bhaya saṅkeṅ bhaya, atyantaniṅ karəsrəs, māti saṅkeṅ māti, putusniṅ sinaṅgah māti.

daridrasya manuṣyasya duṣprajñasyādhanasya ca |
kāle’pyuktaṁ hitaṁ vākyaṁ na kaścitpratipadyate ||288||
ika taṅ daridra, yadyapin prājñā tuvi, tan hiniḍep juga ikaṅ senujarakənya, yadyapi maṅəne kāladeśa tuvi, śabda hitāvasāna tuvi, ṅuniveh yan apuṅguṅa ikaṅ vvaṅ daridra, pisaniṅun hanā sambega ruməmvā sojarnya.

sato’pi na virājante luptārthasyetare guṇāḥ |
āditya iva bhūtānāṁ śrīrguṇānāṁ prakāśikāḥ ||289||
apan ikaṅ daridra ṅaranya, yadyapin ika makveh guṇa ka vruhanya, tan prakāśa ika, tan paripūrṇa haləpnya, apan śrī nimittaniṅ guṇan paripūrṇa haləpnya, kadi rūpa saṅ hyaṅ ādityan prakāśākən ikanāṅ sarvabhūta, sira nimittanyān katon.

caṇḍalaśca daridraśca dvāvetau sadr̥śau matau |
caṇḍalasya na gr̥hṇanti daridrasya na prayacchati ||290||
ikaṅ daridra ṅaranya, mvaṅ caṇḍāla, yan iniṅət-iṅətən gatinya, paḍa juga ya, ri kapva tan pagave dāna, apan ikaṅ caṇḍāla ṅaranya, tan tinaṅgap dānanika, maṅkana ikaṅ daridra, tan hana gantanyāveha dāna.

ahiraṇyamadāsaṁ tadalpānnādyagorasam |
gr̥haṁ kr̥paṇārtīnāṁ narakasya paro nidhiḥ ||291||
maṅkana umahniṅ daridra ṅaranya, yan rasana, tan hana juga pahinya lavan narakaloka, rūpaniṅ tan hanaṅ mās iriya, tan hanaṅ rare hulun, tan hanaṅ annādi bhoga iriya, mvaṅ tan hanaṅ gorasa.

yaśca kr̥śaḥ kr̥śadhanaḥ kr̥śabhr̥tyaḥ kr̥śātithiḥ |
sa vai rājankr̥śanāmā na śarīrakr̥śaḥ kr̥śaḥ ||292||
ika taṅ daridra, ya ika byaktaniṅ sinaṅguh makuru ṅaranika, yadyapin aləmva tuvi, yan tan pamās, akuru ṅaranika, maṅkana ikaṅ vvaṅ tan pahamba, tan vvaṅ aveha maṅana, vvaṅ tan patamuy kunaṅ, tan pinaraparan, yatika prasiddhakuru ṅaranya, kaliṅanya tan kuruniṅ śarīra kāraṇaniṅ sinaṅguh akuru.

suhr̥dāṁ hi dhanaṁ bhuṅkte kr̥tvā praṇayamīpsitam |
pratikartumaśaktasya jivināṁtānmaraṇaṁ varam ||293||
apan ikaṅ daridra ṅaranya, bhinuktinya ta vibhavaniṅ mitranya, tinkan saprayojabhanya, ndan pisaniṅu ya vnaṅ amaləsa ri mitranya, deniṅ daridranya, deniṅ kaśmalaniṅ buddhinya kunəṅ, lobha humət atṅət, yan paramārthanya, ləhəṅaṅ māti saṅkerika.

na tathā khidyate rājanprakr̥tyā nirdhano janaḥ |
yathā bhadrāṇi samprāpya tairvihīnaḥ sukhaidhitaḥ ||294||
ləhəṅ mata laranikaṅ vvaṅ daridra svabhāva, kāsyasih sadākāla, tan kadi laranikaṅ vvaṅ daridra mūlasugih, agə̄ṅ tmən laranika.

prāyeṇa śrīmatāṁ gehe bhoktuṁ śaktirna vidyate |
daridrāṇāṁ tu rājendra saśākamapi jīryati ||295||
prāyanika saṅ sugih, hīnaśakti juga ya ri kabhuktyan ikaṅ viṣaya, kunəṅ ikaṅ daridra, yadyapin gaṅan tovi, kunti juga ya.

saṁpannataramevānnaṁ daridrā bhuñjate sadā |
kṣutsvādutāṁ janayati sā cāḍhyeṣu na vidyate ||296||
saṅkṣepanya, asiṅ vastu pinaṅaniṅ daridra jugan enak, apan ikaṅ lapā, yāmaṅun inakniṅ pinaṅan, riṅ daridra tandəlan ika, kunəṅ ri saṅ sugih, tan uṅgu ika.

kṣuddharmasaṁjñāṁ praṇudatyādatte dhairyameva ca |
arthānusāriṇī jihvā karṣatyeva rasānprati ||297||
lavan ta paveh, ikaṅ lapā maṅhilaṅakən kayatnan, ri kagavayaniṅ dharma sādhana ya, mvaṅ maṅhilaṅakən kadhīran ta ya, təkvan ikaṅ jihvā, meṅət juga ya riṅ rasa, ya tā matəkakən lapā.

viṣamāṁ hi daśāṁ prāpya devāngarhayate’budhaḥ |
ātmanaḥ karma doṣāṇi na vijānātyapaṇḍitaḥ ||298||
ndān ikaṅ apuṅguṁ, manəsəl purākrəta juga ya, yan panmu lara duhkha, apan tan eṅət ya, an aśubhakarma ginavenya ṅūni.

īhamānaḥ samāraMBhānyadi nāsādayeddhanam |
tapo mahatsamātiṣṭhen na hyanuptaṁ pararohati ||299||
paramārthanya, ikaṅ vvaṅ viphala prayāsa, tan tmuṅ artha, an atiśaya gə̄ṅniṅ kotsāhanyan pamrih aṅarjana, yogya nikan pagavayan tan pamisan-misan kta ya, apan tan hana tumuvuh yan tan inipuk ṅaranya, hananiṅ paṅipuk hananiṅ tumuvuh, hiṅanyan tan hana śubhakarmanya ṅūni kaliṅanika.

atyantavimukhe daive vyarthayatne ca pauruṣe |
tejasvino daridrasya vanādanyatkutaḥ sukham ||300||
hana pva daridra agə̄ṅ viveka, ndān vyartha juga solahnya, makahetu tan hana śubhakarmaphalanya, tan hana kāraṇa nikān panəmvaṅ sukha, ṅhiṅ halas juga, tyaktaparigrahānusupa riṅ alas ta pva ya.

pratyādiṣṭasya vittena viṣamārpitacetasaḥ |
tulye sati parikleśe kaḥ pradveṣastapovane ||301||
apan ikaṅ vvaṅ siṅlariṅ sukha, katkan tuha tovi, yayāmrih kasakitan, tuhun vrāgāna ta ya, tan tmuṅ phalaniṅ prihnya, apa kelitnika riṅ alas, apa kāraṇaniṅ pradveṣanika riṅ tapa, apan yaya pva ikaṅ parikleṣa katmu denya.

p.quote:
kubjasya kītakhātasya dāvaniṣṇusitatvacaḥ |
tarorapyūṣarasthasya bhadraṁ janma na cārthinaḥ ||302||
lavan ta vaneh, nyaṅ kayu-kayu suṇḍe vilut purətən, pinaṅaniṅ bololan, pinakomahniṅ smut, rinambataniṅ ani, babak kulitnya deniṅ apuy alas, tumuvuh ta ya riṅ karikil gatarasa tiṅgaraṅ, samaṅkanani laranya, lavan saṅsāranya, ndān ləhəṅ tman ika saṅkeṅ duhkhaniṅ daridra, mvaṅ laraniṅ sadākāla mana-mana harəp-harəp, ṅuniveh yan pasevā harəp-harəp vevehan.

body.p:
ehi gaccha patottiṣṭha vada maunaṁ samācara |
evamāśāgrahagrastaiḥ krīḍanti dhanino’rthibhiḥ ||303||
apan ikaṅ harəp-harəp vevehana, pinakāmṅ-amṅan juga ya, denika saṅ sinevā hinarəp-harəp maveha, liṅnira, paraṅke, laku, paṅadəg, paluṅguh, paṅucap, hnəṅ, maṅkana liṅ saṅ sinevā, ndān yatna juga ikaṅ vvaṅ harəp-harəp, vetniṅ gə̄ṅniṅ harəp-harəpnya.

ahanyahani bhūtāni sr̥jatyeva prajāpatiḥ |
adyāpi na sr̥jatyekaṁ yo’rthinaṁ nāvamanyate ||304||
sāri-sāri mata bhaṭāra brahmā manrəṣṭi sarvabhūta, aneka prakāra lvirnya, tan tuṅgal buddhinya, lavan pravr̥ ttinya, mvaṅ guṇanya, rūpanya, ṅhiṅ tuṅgal juga tan kasrəṣṭi denira, adyāpi katka maṅke, ikaṅ tan asampaya riṅ masevāṅgə̄ṅ harəp.

kaṇṭhe gadgadatā svedo mukhe vaivarṇyavepathū |
mriyamāṇasya cihnāni yāni tānyeva yācataḥ ||305||
katuhvan ikaṅ mamintāṅgə̄ṅ harəp, tan hana juga pahinya lavan vvaṅ meh mātya, ikaṅ sḍəṅ kaṇṭhagataprāṇa, apayapan tuna tka pgat-pgat denyāṇucap, hariṅətən alət, mukhanya, kumtər ktə-ktəgən bhāvanya, mataṅnyan paḍa lavan meh mātya juga ya.

saṁsargaḥ[sampādyatām] vastramaMBhas tilānbhūmiṁ gandho vāsayate yathā |
puṣpāṇāmadhivāsena tathā saṁsargajā guṇāḥ ||306||
nyaṅ slaṅakna, ikaṅ saṅsarga, aglis jugānularakən guṇaya, irikaṅ lot masaṅsarga lavan maguṇa, vyaktinya, nahan yāmbə̄niṅ skar, an tular mara riṅ dodot, vvai, lṅa, lmah, makanimitta pasaṅsarganya, lavan ikaṅ kəmbaṅ.

hīyate hi matistāta hīnaiḥ saha samāgamāta|
samaiśca samatāmeti viśiṣṭaiśca viśiṣṭatām ||307||
mataṅnyan maṇḍəh ikaṅ bhuddhi, yan pasaṅsargga ṅvaṅ lavan vvaṅ sor hīnabudhhi, yapvan vvaṅ madhyama saṅsarganiṅ vvaṅ, madhyama ikaṅ buddhi denya, vvaṅ uttama pva saṅsinaṅsarga, uttama buddhiniṅ vvaṅ yan maṅkana.

guṇavatsu guṇālpo’pi yāti vistaratāṁ nèṇām |
patitaḥ svādulimāle tailabindurivāMBhasi ||308||
yadyapin akḍika ktikaṅ guṇa, yan irika saṅ vvaṅ maguṇa, lot masaṅsarga lavan saṅ maguṇa kunəṅ, lumrā ya maṅkin avuvuh, kadi rūpanikaṅ lṅa tumibā riṅ vvai, lumrā juga purihnya.

mahānapyalpatāmeti nirguṇe guṇavistaraḥ |
ādhārānusvabhāvatvādgajendra iva darpaṇe ||309||
yadyapin akveha ikaṅ guṇa, yan riṅ vvaṅ nirguṇa tan patkən ri hananiṅ paṅavruhnya, ahə̄t juga ya, tan katon vistāranya, kady aṅganiṅ vayaṅ-vayaṅaniṅ liman riṅ pahyasan alit, tumūt litnya āvāranya.

tasmādguṇeṣu rājyeta mā doṣeṣu kadācana |
nirguṇo yo hi durbuddhirātmanaḥ so’bhirucyate ||310||
mataṅnyan hayva ṅvaṅ tan jnət riṅ guṇa, pvihan taki-takin juga ya, hayva kāveśa gumavayaṅ doṣa, apan ikaṅ vvaṅ durbuddhi deniṅ tan paguṇanya, makamusuh avaknya juga ya.

sādhuḥ[sampādyatām] sadbhireva sahāsīta sadbhiḥ kurvīta saṅgatim |
sadbhirvividaṁ maitrīṁ nāsadbhiḥ kiñcidācareta||311||
kunaṅ ulaha, yan pasahāyanika, saṅ sādhu juga sahāyanta, yan ta gavaya pakadaṅan, saṅ sādhu juga kadaṅanta, yadyapin patukara tuvi, ṅuniveh yan samitra lavan saṅ sādhu juga, apan pisaniṅun hanā kayogyaniṅ tan sādhu.

na prahr̥ṣyati sammāne nindito nānutapyate |
na kruddhaḥ paruṣāṇyāha tamāhuḥ sādhulakṣaṇam ||312||
kunəṅ lakṣaṇa saṅ sādhu, tan agiraṅ yan inləm, tan alara yan inandā, tan kataman krodha, pisaniṅun ujaraknaṅ paruṣavacana, laṅgəṅ dhīrāhniṅ manahnira.

na smarantyaparāddhāni smaranti sukr̥tāni ca |
asambhinnāryamaryādāḥ sādhavaḥ puruṣottamāḥ ||313||
lavan ta vaneh, taraṅən-aṅən doṣaniṅ len, pisaniṅun ujaraknaṅ parāpavāda, guṅanya mvaṅ ulahnya, rahayu juga keṅətnira, tātan hana gantanira manasara sakeṅ śiṣṭācāra, apagəh juga sira ri maryyānānira, maṅkana lakṣaṇa saṅ sādhu, sira puruṣottama ṅaranira vaneh.

yathā yathā prakr̥ṣṭānāṁ kṣetrāṇāṁ śasyasampadaḥ |
śākhā ca phalabhāreṇa namraḥ sādhustathā tathā ||314||
paramārthanya, upaśama ta pva saṅ sādhu ṅaranira, tumut kula deniṅ kvehniṅ guṇanira, mvaṅ vruḥnira, kady aṅganiṅ pari, tumut kula deniṅ bvatniṅ vvahnya, mvaṅ pāṅniṅ kayu, tumut kula deniṅ tə̄bniṅ phalanya.

pr̥ṣṭhato na vijalpanti dīnamabhyuddharanti ca |
saṁvāsannāvamanyante sevyā rājendra sādhavaḥ ||315||
nihan ta purih saṅ sādhu, tan dadi juga sira mucapa doṣaniṅ len, ri vuri-vurinya tuvi, tar aṅgā tan patuluṅa yan panen kalaran, tātar asampe, matvaṅ asih riṅ amarāśraya, mataṅnyan yogya sevān juga sira.

arthaṁ mahāntamāsādya vidyāmācāryayatiameva ca |
vicaredasamunnaddhaṁ yaḥ sa paṇḍita ucyate ||316||
kunaṅ saṅ maṅke kramanira, agə̄ṅ ikaṅ vibhava katmu denira, vruh ta sira aṅaji kinatvaṅan, saphalan pavīrya, ndātan katkan mada, tan asiga, tan uddhata, sira tika paṇḍita ṅaranira.

anugantuṁ satāṁ vartma yadi kr̥tsnaṁ na śakyate |
svalpamapyanugantavyaṁ mārgastho’pi na sīdati ||317||
yapvan tan katūt ācāra saṅ mahāpuruṣa, katuhvan apan atyanta kvehnya lavan kāsnya, savanehnya ta kunaṅ tūtakna, sasambhava katūta denta, apan vnaṅ ikānuluṅ sakeṅ lara, tumulaka sakeṅ narakaloka.

na kevalaṁ janasyāsya sādhurbhavati sammataḥ |
puruṣaṁ vr̥tasampannamātmāpi bahu manyate ||318||
lavan vaneh tan kevala vvaṅ, muvah ktikaṅ vvaṅ māsih riṅ vvaṅ sādhu, saṅ hyaṅ ātmā tuvi māsih sira, irikaṅ vvaṅ śuddhaśīla, māsih māvak, mara kasaṅgahanika.

āryavr̥ttamidaṁ vr̥ttamiti vijñāya śāśvatam |
santaḥ parārthaṁ kurvānā nāvekṣante pratikriyām ||319||
tātan pakanimitta hyunira riṅ pratyupakāra saṅ sajjana, argavayakən ikaṅ kaparārthan, kunaṅ viveka sira, pravr̥tti saṅ sādhu ta pva iki, maryādā saṅ mahāpuruṣa, maṅkana juga vivekanira, tar prekṣaka riṅ phala.

vr̥ttaṁ yatnena saṁrakṣyamuttameti ca yāti ca |
akṣīṇo vittataḥ kṣīṇo vr̥ttatastu hato hataḥ ||320||
saṅkṣepanya pravr̥tti saṅ sajjana rakṣān kayatnākna, kunaṅ ikaṅ dhanādi, tan yukti ika rakṣān, apan luṅhā tka svabhāvanya, tan kna kinayatnākən, lavan ta vaneh, tan si tan paḍāṅinak tikaṅ kāsyasih ṅaranya, yadyapin daridra tuvi, yan sugih riṅ kasuśīlan, prasiddha sugih ṅaranika, mon sugih riṅ dhana, yan duśśīla, daridra ṅaranika, prasiddhaniṅ māti ika.

pratyahaṁ pratyavekṣeta hyātmano vr̥ttamātmana|
kiṁ nu me paśubhistulyaṁ kimu satpuruṣaiḥ samam ||321||
mataṅnyan hayva tan paviveka, avakta ta pva umaṅən-aṅəna ulahnyāvakta sāri-sāri, liṅanta, salah kariki ulaḥta, yukti karika, paḍa lavan paṣu kariki ta maṅke, paḍa lavan saṅ paṇḍita kunaṅ, deniki pravr̥ttinta, maṅkana liṅanta sāri-sārin yaknātutura ri pravr̥ttinta.

kartā kārayitā caiva yaścaivamanumanyate |
śubhaṁ vā yadi vā pāpaṁ teṣāmapi samaṁ phalam ||322||
samaṅke taṅ amukti karmaphala, ikaṅ magave, ikaṅ makon agavaya, ikaṅ maṅanumata, maṅyuktyani, ika ta katlu, phala ika mamukti karmaphala, salviranya, yan hala, yan hayu.

na pāpe pratipāpaḥ syātsādhureva sadā bhaveta|
ātmanaiva hataḥ pāpo yaḥ pāpaṁ kartumicchati ||323||
mataṅnyan śubhakarma tikaṅ prihən, yadyapin pāpakarma ulahaniṅ vvaṅ ri kita, ulah saṅ sādhu juga pamaləsanta, hayva amaləs riṅ pāpakarma, apan ikaṅ vvaṅ mahyun gumavayaṅ kapāpan, pāvakniṅ pāpa ika, hilaṅ denyāvaknya, ika pva tan len mukti phalanikaṅ aśubhakarma ginavayanya.

āropyate śilā śaile kleśena mahatā yathā |
patyate ca sukhenādhastathātmā puṇyapāpayoḥ ||324||
mataṅnyan hayva tan yatnā, rakṣan kayatnākna katəmvan ikiṅ si dadi vvaṅ denta, sakāraṇanyan qəntas miṇḍuhura muvah, ta pva gavayakna, apan atyanta ivəhniṅ mamiṇḍuhurakən, kunaṅ yan pamiṅsorakna, eman ika, tonənta, nāṅ vuṅkal, piṅruhurakna vyargraniṅ vukir, antukniṅ parikleśa ika, kunaṅ yan tibākna ika, tan kevəhan mvaṅ irika.

divaṁ spr̥śati bhūmiṁ ca śabdaḥ puṇyasya karmaṇaḥ |
yāvatsa śabdo bhavati tāvatpuruṣa ucyate ||325||
apan ikaṅ śubhakarma ṅaranya, tka riṅ svargaloka kocapanya, ṅuniveh riṅ pr̥thvaṅtala, ya ika kaṅrtti ṅaranika, pocapan, makanimittaṅ gave rahayu, salavasnyan kocap, samaṅkana ikaṅ magave, an vvaṅ ṅaranya.

kīrtirhi puruṣānloke sañjivayati mātr̥vata|
akīrtirjivitaṁ hanti jivato’pi śarīriṇaḥ ||326||
ika taṅ kīrti, sākṣāt ibu juga ya, ri kapva ahuripi, yadyapin līna ikaṅ makīrti ya, mahurip juga ikān maṅkana, ri tan hilaṅniṅ kīrtinya, kunaṅ ikaṅ si duryaśa, byakta mr̥tyu ika, apan yadyapin ahuripa ika, makakaduryaśanya, yan kocap ika kaduryaśanya māti ṅaranya ika.

drogdhavyaṁ na ca mitreṣu na viśvasteṣu karhicita|
yasya cānnāni bhuñjīta yatra ca syātpratiśrayaḥ ||327||
nyaṅ paṅrakṣa kīrti, hayva drohaka riṅ mitra, drohaka ṅaraniṅ mahyun ri pātyanika, hayva drohaka ri kaparcaya, parcaya ri kita kunaṅ, riṅ pinaṅanta skulnya, pamarāśraya kuneṅ, apan kr̥taghna ṅaraniṅ pāpaniṅ maṅkana, tan pūrvarəṇa.

asādhuḥ[sampādyatām] brahmaghnā ca sarāpe ca caure bhagnavrate ca te |
niṣkr̥tirvihitā sadbhiḥ kr̥taghne nāsti niṣkr̥tiḥ ||328||
brahmaghna ṅaraniṅ mamāti brāhmaṇa, humilaṅakən saṅ hyaṅ brāhma mantra kunaṅ, tan yatna ri sira, surāpa ṅaraniṅ maṅinum madya, an pakabrata tan paṅinum madya, cora kunaṅ, bhagnabrata ṅaraniṅ maṅləbur brata, atyanta gə̄ṅniṅ pāpanika ka bah, tathāpin maṅkana hana pamrāyaścitta irika, kunaṅ pāpaniṅ kr̥taghna, tan patambānika, tan kavnaṅ pinrāyaścitta.

narakādhyuṣitaḥ panthā gantavyastena dāruṇaḥ |
apāpe pāpahr̥daye yaḥ pāpamanutiṣṭhati ||329||
ikaṅ vvaṅ pāpabuddhi, ahyun gumavayaknaṅ ulah pāpa, irikaṅ vvaṅ nirmalabuddhi, pisaniṅun ahyuna ri kagavayaniṅ ulah pāpa, ika taṅ vvaṅ maṅkana kramanya, niyata karəsrəs, lvirnikaṅ hnu tka riṅ niraya, tinūtnya dlāha.

yaḥ karoti naraḥ pāpaṁ tasyātmā dhruvaṁ priyaḥ |
ātmanaiva kr̥taṁ pāpamātmā naivāpi bhujyate ||330||
kunaṅ ikaṅ vvaṅ gumavayakən ikaṅ ulah pāpa, tan māsih māvak ṅaranika, apayapan avaknya gumavayikaṅ kapāpan, avaknya amukti phalanya dlāha.

saṁkliṣṭakarmāṇamatipramādaṁ nityānr̥taṁ cādr̥ḍhabhaktikaṁ ca |
vikr̥ṣṭarāgaṁ bahumāninaṁ cāpy etānnaseveta narādhamānṣata||331||
nihan lvirniṅ tan saṅsarggan, vvaṅ mabulahakən pisakit, parapīḍā durācāra, vvaṅ gə̄ṅ pramāda, vvaṅ mithyāvāda, vvaṅ tan apagəh kabhaktinya, vvaṅ gə̄ṅ rāga, vvaṅ sakta riṅ madya, nahan taṅ nəm kaniṣṭaniṅ vvaṅ, tan yogya sivin.

asantyāgātpāpakr̥tāmapāpāṁs tulyo doṣaḥ spr̥śate miśrabhāvāta|
śuṣkeṇārdraṁ dahyate miśrabhāvāt tasmātpāpaiḥ saha sandhiṁ na kuryāta||332||
apan ikaṅ vvaṅ yan pasaṅsargga lavan vvaṅ pāpakarma, kahavā juga ya deniṅ doṣanikaṅ pāpakarma, kady aṅganiṅ tahən ahurip, milu gsəṅ yan pamiśra lavan tahən akiṅ, mataṅnyan tan pasahāya, tan pamitrā lavan vvaṅ pāpakarma juga ṅvaṅ.

varjanīyaścātimatā durjanaḥ sandhi vairayoḥ |
śvābhavatyupaghātāya lālannapi daśannapi ||333||
saṅkṣepanya, tan samitra, tan patukara ṅvaṅ lavan durjana, apan tan yukti ṅvaṅ dilakəniṅ asu, ṅuniveh yan sahutanya.

kaṇtakānāṁ khalānāṁ ca dvividhaiva pratikriyā |
upānanmukhabhaṅgo vā dūrato vā vivarjanam ||334||
ika taṅ durjana, tan pahi lavan rvi ika, rūpaniṅ rva tamba irika, upāyan riṅ tan pamuharanya hala, kramanya, yan irikaṅ rvi, pilih tarumpah, pilih siṅgahana ya, kunaṅ ikaṅ durjana, pilih tumuṅkula miṅhaya, pilih dohana kunaṅ, nahan taṅ upāya rva irika kālih.

mā gāḥ khaleṣu viśraMBhaṁ mameti cirasaṁstutaḥ |
dīrghakālopanīto’pi daśatyeva bhujaṅgamaḥ ||335||
hayva ta sgəh parcaya riṅ durjana, anuṅku iki, malavas iki haneryyaku, kumva kunaṅ liṅa, hayva ta maṅkana, apan ikaṅ sarpa ṅaranya, yadyapin atyanta lavasanya ajar-ajarana, ivəṅ juga panahutnika.

vinayāvanatāṁ santaṁ nīcaḥ samadhirohati |
svagātrakr̥tasopānaṁ niṣaṇṇaṁ vanakuñjaram ||336||
lavan kramanikaṅ nīsa, maṅkin uddhata juga ya, tiniṅhalanya pva saṅ sajjana, tumuṅkul ādara atvaṅ, deniṅ kasuśīlanira, tatan eraṅ amapas anatap, paḍa lavan liman aṅrəpa sira ri hiḍəpnya.

santo mā gāta viśrambhaṁ namatīti khale jane |
tulāvanamaḥ ko nāma yo na kūpāmbutaskaraḥ ||337||
mataṅnya deya saṅ sādhu, hayva juga sira parcaya riṅ durjana, bhakti mara ya, prahva manəmbah kumva kunaṅ liṅanira, hayva ta maṅkana, apan tahan ika kāryyakāraṇa jātinika, ndi karika anon si ṅgon tumuṅkul, yan tan pakakāryya kālapaniṅ vvai riṅ sumur.

apakāramasamprāpya tuṣyetsādhurasādhutaḥ |
naiṣo’lābho bhujaṅgena veṣṭito yo na daśyate ||338||
hayva ta agiraṅ manah niṅvaṅ, tan kinasampayan denikaṅ durjana sinaṅsarga, apan agə̄ṅ ambəkniṅ tan sinahut deniṅ ulān pamilət.

durjanenocyamānāni vacāṁsi madhurāṇyapi |
akālakusumānīva trāsaṁ sañjanayanti me ||339||
yadyapin karṇnamanohara amanis vtunikaṅ ujar, yan durjana mujarakən, trāsa arəs juga kami denya, kady aṅganiṅ konaṅunaṅiṅ skar mtu riṅ tan māsanya, pāvakniṅ utpāta amuhara bhaya.

madhure satyamanveṣyaṁ tacca nāstyamr̥taṁ ca tata|
dharmo nveṣyaśca paruṣe sa ca nāsti viṣaṁ ca tata||340||
apan yan petən paramārthanikaṅ crolan, riṅ paramārtha madhura, tan hana juga, ṅhiṅ paramārtha amr̥ta juga katmu, maṅkanaṅ paramārtha dharma, yan petən riṅ paramārtha pāruṣya, nora juga ya paramārtha viṣa juga katmu.

vr̥ścanimbaṁ paraśunā añjainaṁ madhusarpiṣā |
arcanaṁ gandhamālyābhyāṁ sarvathā tikta eva saḥ ||341||
apan ikaṅ mimba, yan tugələn vaḍuṅən, yadyan tuvuha, niyata apahit juga səvə̄nika, yadyapin lepanan riṅ madhu phan miñak, ivə̄ṅ pahitnaka səvə̄nya, knān gandhamālya kunaṅ, aṅgarāga jnu lepana, salviraniṅ vaṅi-vaṅi mvaṅ kəmbaṅ inaṅit, yayānyan apahita səvə̄nya, maṅkana taṅ durjana, tan kna hinala-hala, tan kna hinayu-hayu.

madopaśamanaṁ śāstraṁ khalānāṁ kurute madam |
cakṣuḥsaṁskārakaṁ teja ulūkānāmivāndhatā ||342||
don saṅ hyaṅ aji ṅaranira, maṅhilaṅakna mada, kunəṅ riṅ durjana, maṅdadyakən mada sira, maṅkin ptəṅ hatinya, vuta tan vruḥ ri liṅniṅ rāt, kady aṅganiṅ teja saṅ hyaṅ ādityan paṅhilaṅakən ptəṅ, dumliṅakən panoniṅ rāt, kunaṅ riṅ ulūka, amuhara ptəṅ, maṅkin ahulap, vuta ya denika.

vidyāmado dhanamadastr̥tīyo’bhijñairmadamadaḥ |
hyete valiptānāmeta eva satāṁ damaḥ ||343||
nihan saṅkṣepaniṅ maṅdadyakən mada riṅ durjana, vidyā, dhana, abhijana, vidyā ṅaran saṅ hyaṅ aji, vidyāmada ṅaraniṅ vəpū kapuhara denira, dhana ṅaraniṅ mās maṇik, salvirniṅ vibhava, dhanamada ṅaranikaṅ mada kavaṅun denya, abhijana ṅaraniṅ kavvaṅan, abhijanamada ṅaranikaṅ vəpū kapuhara denya, nahan tāvakniṅ maṅdadyakən mada riṅ durjana, kunaṅ ri saṅ sajjana, maṅdadyakən kopaśaman ika.

namyate yāti sandhānaṁ dravībhavati tapyate |
mr̥du durjanacittena kiṁ lohamupamīyate ||344||
apan hana kaləhaṅniṅ vsi saṅkeṅ buddhiniṅ durjana, apan kavnaṅ ya inluk, tinuṅkulakən, kavnaṅ pinakəmvakən, maṅgā ta ya drava yan pinanasan, tātan maṅkana buddhiniṅ durjana, kevalākasa marikas, maṅkana jātinya.

aho pracchāditākāryaṁ naipuṇyaṁ paramaṁ khale |
yattuṣāgnirivānarcirdahannapi na lakṣyate ||345||
āścaryya mata ṅvaṅ ri buddhiniṅ durjana, apan atyanta kavidagdhanyan saputiṅ kaduṣṭan, ri kagavayaniṅ hala, tātan hana pahinya lavan apuyiṅ mrāṅ, rūpaniṅ tan katəṅəran paṅgəsəṅi.

aho bata mahatkaṣṭaṁ viparītamidaṁ jagata|
yenāpatrapate sādhurasādhustena nandati ||346||
kapūhan mata ṅvaṅ deniṅ buddhinikiṅ rāt, hetuniṅ maṅkana, ikaṅ sādhusamūha, mapa hetu niran hana kinahananiṅ iraṅ ri saṅ sādhu, yatika viparīta, niyata amuhara sukha ya irikaṅ durjana.

khalaḥ saṣapamātrāṇi parachidrāṇi paśyati |
ātmano bilvamātrāṇi paśyannapi na paśyati ||347||
lavan purihnikaṅ durjana, yadyan savijiniṅ sasavi doṣa saṅ sādhu, katon juga denya, kunaṅ yan doṣanyāvaknya, yadyan savvahniṅ vilva tovi katon ta denya, tan tinon juga ya.

abhivādya yathā vr̥ddhānsanto gacchanti nirvr̥tim |
tathā sajjanamākruśya mūrkho bhavati nirvr̥taḥ ||348||
lavan svabhāvaniṅ durjana, ika saṅ sādhu, atyanta juga sukha nirān panambaha atvaṅ ādara ri saṅ vr̥ddha paṇḍita, tātan maṅkanaṅ durjana, viparīta kramanya, atyanta parituṣṭanyān tlas maniraskārāvamāna aṅapahāsa ri saṅ mahāpuruṣa.

apradātā samr̥ddho’sau daridraśca mahāmanāḥ |
aśrutaśca samunnaddhastamāhurmudacetasām ||349||
kunaṅ ikaṅ vvaṅ sugih paripūrṇa, ndātan pagave dānapuṇya, vvaṅ daridrāhaṅkārākas hatinya kunaṅ, uddhata garvva, an vvaṅ tan vruh maṅaji kunaṅ, ika ta katlu, prasiddhaniṅ mūḍa ika, liṅ saṅ paṇḍita.

paraṁ kṣipati doṣeṇa vartamānaḥ svayaṁ tathā |
yacca kupyatyanīśaḥ sansattu mūḍhataro naraḥ ||350||
hana ta vvaṅ nindāgalak riṅ molah salah, ndān inulahakənya juga ikaṅ ulah tan ykti liṅnya, muvah hana ta vvaṅ krodha riṅ pisaniṅun kavaśa denya, dūran vvaṅ tumkākna gləṅnya, ikaṅ vvaṅ maṅkana kramanya, vkasniṅ mūḍa ika.

mr̥du vai manyate pāpo bhāṣyamāṇamaśaktijam |
jitamarthaṁ vijānīyādupalamardave sati ||351||
apan hiḍəpnikaṅ vvaṅ pāpa, irikaṅ ujar mr̥du manohara, saṅka riṅ kahīnakāyānya, hetunika tan eṅat ya, an pamintonan ri kottamaniṅ mās, kālahnyan pagharṣa lavan udyan.

asanto’bhyarthitāḥ sadbhiḥ kiñcitkāryaṁ kadācana |
manyante santamātmānamasantamiti viśrutam ||352||
kathañcana pva saṅ sāḍu, hana kināryaranira, irikaṅ tan sāḍu, samaṅkana ta yan humiḍəp avanya mahāpuruṣa, yadyapin tlas vruh ya ri kocapan yan sinaṅgah tan sāḍu.

prājño’pi jalpatāṁ puṁsāṁ śrutvā vācaḥ śubhāśubhāḥ |
guṇavadvākyamādatte haṁsaḥ kṣīramivāmbhasi ||353||
kunaṅ saṅ paṇḍita ṅaranira, yadyapin kapva karəṅva halahayun inucapan denira, ndān ikaṅ ujar ahayu juga inalapnira, kadi kramaniṅ haṅsa amaṅan pəhan miniśra lavan vvai, an ikaṅ pəhan juga kapaṅan denya.

codyamāno’pi pāpāya śubhātmā nābhipadyate |
vāryamāno’pi pāpātmā pāpebhyaḥ pāpamicchati ||354||
apan saṅ sāḍu ṅaranira, yadyapin konən sira riṅ ulah salah, tan paṅhiḍəp juga sira, tan reṅə-rəṅə̄n, kunaṅ ikaṅ vvaṅ duṣṭa, yadyapin uhutana tovi riṅ ulaḥ salaḥ, inulahakənya juga ya.

vyathāṁ śrutāmaśīlasya dhanaṁ kr̥paṇajivinaḥ |
utsāho mandabhāgyasya balaṁ kāpuruṣasya ca ||355||
apan yadyapin paripūrṇna vruhnikaṅ vvaṅ maṅaji, yan durśīla, vyartha ika, apan suluha riṅ śīla yukti don saṅ hyaṅ aji, maṅkana māsnikaṅ vvaṅ atṅət, vyartha ika, apan dānākna dadaha riṅ dharma sādhana doniṅ mās ṅaranya, maṅkana kotsāhaniṅ vvaṅ nirbhagya, vvāgan solahnya, vyartha ika, maṅkana kaśaktiniṅ vvaṅ kaśmala ,pāpakarma, vyartha ika, apan karakṣān saṅ sāḍu doniṅ kaśaktin ṅaranya.

kapāle yadvadāpaḥ syuḥ śvadrr̥tau vāyathā payaḥ |
āśrayasthānadoṣeṇa vr̥ttahīne tathā śrutam ||356||
saṅkṣepa saṅ hyaṅ aji, yar uṅgu riṅ durśīla, vyartha sira māri pavitra, kady aṅganiṅ vvai muṅgu riṅ kapāla, kady aṅganiṅ vvai muṅgu ri śvadr̥ti kunaṅ, dr̥ti ṅaranya kulitniṅ vivi sinasat, ginave baladeva, pinakapaṅasvana, yan kulitniṅ sr̥gāla kunaṅ, ginave paṅasvan kunaṅ, yatika śvadr̥ti ṅaranya, ikaṅ vvai makabhājana maṅkana, kapāna tikān śucya, kahavā deniṅ sthanadoṣa, maṅkana ta saṅ hyaṅ aji, yar uṅgu irikaṅ vvaṅ durśīla, vyartha sira, apan tan pagave kapāvanan.

nācchādayati kaupīnaṁ na daṁśamaśakāpaham |
śunaḥ pucchamivānārthaṁ jñānamanyāyavartitaḥ ||357||
yadyapin saṅ hyaṅ samyagjñāna, kavruhan ikaṅ vvaṅ durśīla, vyartha ta rakva sira, apan tan vnaṅ sira mankākən iṣṭasādhya, yan tan rinakṣa riṅ śiṣṭācāra, kady aṅganiṅ ikūniṅ śr̥gāla, tan panaputi, tan kupina, tan mamurug daṅśamaśaka, alū lalərādi, maṅkana tika saṅ hyaṅ samyagjñāna, an uṅgu irikaṅ vvaṅ durśīla.

pūrvakarma[sampādyatām] Kṁadāyādako lokaḥ Kṁasambandhiळḥ |
Kṁāṇi codayantīha Se Kṁavaśā vayam ||358||
apan ikaṅ loka, karma pinakakaliliranya, kaliṅanya, śubha-śubha karmaphala juga tinmunya, niyata masambandha lavan śubha-śubhakarma ta pva ya, saṅkṣepanya, inatagniṅ pūrvakarmanya, ikaṅ loka ṅaranya, paramārthanya, kinavaśākəniṅ pūrvakarma kita kabeh.

y8 dhenusahasreṣu vatso vindati mātaram |
t8 śubhā-śubhaṁ Kṁa kartāramanugacchati ||359||
tātan aṅgā tan kabhuktya ikaṅ pūrvakarma, sakalviriṅ phalanika, denikaṅ makakarma ya, mvaṅ tan kemuran dumunuṅ irikaṅ kartā ṅūni, kadi kramanikaṅ anakniṅ ləmbu, tan komuran umet mavitanya, yadyan mātusatusa ikaṅ ləmbu sḍəṅnya amisusu, pamoranika ravitnya, meṅət juga ya tan kemurani ravitnya.

acodyamānāni y8 puṣpāṇi ca Fāni ca |
svaṁ kalaṁ nātivartante t8 Kṁa purā Kam ||360||
mvaṅ kna tinulat, luput dinohakən, pinarəkakən, kady aṅganiṅ puṣpaphala, an meṅət ri māsanya, dumāni śarīranya.

lg.l: bālo yuvā ca vr̥ddhaśca yatkaroti śubhāśubham |

body.p:
uparyupari lokw So bhavitumicchati |
yatate ca y8ja़्ki na cāsau vartate tathā ||364||
kapva māti kaṅ loka, mahyun riṅ sukha asama-sama, kunaṅ apan yathāśakti denyāgave dharmasādhana, ya ta tinūtnikaṅ karmaphala tinmunya.

sammānaścāvamānaśca lābhālābhau kṣayākṣayau |
pravr̥ttā vā nivartante vidhānante pade pade ||365||
nāṅ tvaṅ, nāṅ sampe, nāṅ saubhāgya, nāṅ nirbhāgya, nāṅ kṣaya, nāṅ vrədḍi, ika ta kabeh, luṅhā tka ika, irikaṅ sarvaloka, tiṅkahnikaṅ pūrvakarma ini, tinūtniṅ kabhuktyanya maṅke.

muṣnandaridrātyabhihaný ghnan pūyānasampūjya Bḥyapūjyaḥ |
yatKṁaviyaṁ vapate manuṣyaḥ tasyānuऱāṇi Fāni bhuṅkte ||366||
ikaṅ aklit riṅ paradrəvya ṅūni riṅ pūrvajanma, daridra janmanika riṅ dlāha, ikaṅ amāti ṅūni pinatyan ika dlāha, saṅkṣepanya, salvirniṅ karma vīja inipuk ṅūni, ya ika kabhukti phalanya dlāha.

anyaduptaṁ jātamanyadityetannopapadyate |
upyate bhuvi yadvīja tattadeva parohati ||367||
lavan ikaṅ vastu inipuk, tan patuvuh ika len saṅkerikaṅ iniput, maṅkana tikaṅ pūrvakarma, yatika tinūtniṅ phala kabhukti dlāha.

ṇīameva sukhaṁ svarge sukhaṁ dSamihobhayam |
narake dSamevaitanmokṣe tu Pāaṁ sukham ||368||
yan riṅ svargaloka, sukha kevala ikaṅ bhinukti ṅkāna, kunaṅ yan ṅke riṅ martyaloka, sukhaduhkha ikaṅ kabhukti, kunaṅ riṅ narakaloka, duhkha kevala ikaṅ bhinukti ṅkāna, yapvan riṅ mokṣapada, paramasukha ikaṅ kabhukti ṅkāna.

svargalokaṁ nayantyenaṁ pañcaiva suKāḥ Kāḥ |
kūpārāmasabhāvaprā Bṁa vasathā nr̥pa ||369||
lima ikaṅ sukr̥ta mankākən riṅ svargaloka, pratyekanya, sumur, yaśa pavilāsān, sabhā, kady aṅganiṅ lbuh, pkən, tambak, lalayan, śālā, nahan taṅ lima mankākən riṅ svargaloka.

śvaḥ Kya़madya kurvīta Pāhn cāparāhnikam |
na hi pratīkṣate mr̥tyuḥ Kaṁ vāpyaKaṁ tathā ||370||
hayva ta aṅinak-inak, ikaṅ gavayən sakatambe liṅta, maṅke jugan gavayakna, ikaṅ gavayənta sore liṅta, eñjiṅ jugeka gavayaknanta, apan ikaṅ mr̥tyu, tan paṅerakən juga ya, tan huniṅa riṅ turuṅ gavenya, lavan huvus gavenya.

mr̥tyuḥ[sampādyatām] yw syānmr̥tyunā sakhyaṁ yo vai syādajarāmaraḥ |
tw tadyujý vaktumidaṁ me śvo bhaviṣyati ||371||
yapvan hana sira samitra lavan saṅ hyaṅ mr̥tyu, tan kna riṅ tuha pāti kunaṅ, sira yogyan umiyataknaṅ mne hlam.

aparyantw kālw kiyānaṁśaḥ śaracchatam |
tanaṁaPāāyuryaḥ sa k8 svaptumarhati ||372||
tan pahiṅan tka ikaṅ kāla ṅaranya, mātus-atusa ikaṅ tahun, tar pakalvasan, kunaṅ ikaṅ pravr̥tti makalvasan ika, sep-sepan gatinya, ikaṅ hurip pva ya ta, kṣaṇamātra hananya, apa ta nimittaniṅ martuvva, pəṅpə̄ṅən juga ikaṅ hurip, dadahakna riṅ dharmasādhana.

B्taJitamatyalpaṁ rātristatra rddhahāriṇī |
tadardhamapi nirhrāsyaṁ vyādhiśokajarāmaraiḥ ||373||
apan atyanta juga kḍikniṅ huripnikaṅ sarvabhava, an akḍik ya, kaparvan ta ya deniṅ vṅi, kālaniṅ turu paṅaveśaniṅ harip mata, saparvan ta ṅaranika, turahnya, ika taṅ saparvan, muvah ta ya linvaṅan deniṅ lara, mvaṅ prihati, tuha, vighna, atyanta riṅ akḍik ta ṅaranika kavkas.

sannimajjajjagadidaṁ gaMBhīre kālasāgare |
jarāmr̥tymahāgrāhe na kaścidavabudhyate ||374||
apan ikaṅ sarvabhāva, kaləbu riṅ saṅsārasāgara ya, ajro tuvi, lara, tuha, prihati pinakāvuhayanya, ndātan hana juga atutur.

nauṣadhāni na Sḥāṇi na homāna punarjapaḥ |
trāyante mr̥tyunopateṁ jarayā vāpi mānavam ||375||
tātan tamba, tan mantra, tan homa, tan japa, vnaṅ manuluṅ sakeṅ pāti, manulaka mr̥tyu, punah-punah mantrocāraṇa, pavaluy-valuyniṅ kocaraṇan saṅ hyaṅ mantra, japa ṅaranya.

yastu dr̥ṣṭvā Pā jīrṇaṁ vyādhitaṁ mr̥tameva ca |
svastho Bḥi nodvignyo yathā’ cotāstathaiva saḥ ||376||
anon pva tika vvaṅ, nirvighna svastha apagəh aṅən-aṅənya, tan kataman vairāgya, an panon vvaṅ jīrṇa, durbala deniṅ tuha, vvaṅ alara kunaṅ, vvaṅ māti kunaṅ, tinonya, ndātan virigən, kadi tan kamaṅkana hiḍəpnya, ikaṅ vvaṅ maṅkana kramanya, tan hana pahinya lavan vastu tan paviveka, nāṅ ghaṭapaṭadi.

api sāgaraparyantāṁ vijityeha vasundharām |
na kaccijjātvapakramejjaraṁ mr̥tyuṁ ca mānavaḥ ||377||
yadyapin tlas kavaśa makahiṅanaṅ catussāgara, ikaṅ pr̥thivīmaṇḍala denikaṅ vvaṅ, makahetu gə̄ṅniṅ kaśaktinya, yaya juga tan luputnya riṅ lara, tuha, pāti.

aho rātramayo loke jarā ऱā sañcarana|
mr̥tyurgrasati B्tāni pannagaḥ pavanaṁ yathā ||378||
kunaṅ saṅ hyaṅ mr̥tyu ṅaranira, kāla pinakāvak nira, kṣaṇa, lava, nimeṣa, ahorātrādi, ya pinakaṣaḍbhāva nira, patuduhaniṅ śarīra nira, pinakarūpa nira taṅ lara, tuha, prasiddha pakatona nira, mahas ta sira, vyāpaka amnuhiṅ sakala loka, sira tāmaṅan ikaṅ sarvabhāva, kady aṅganiṅ sarpa pakanaṅin, an paṅan ikaṅ pavan.

nopabhoktuṁ na ca tyaktuṁ śaknoti viṣayāñjarī |
asthi nirdaśanaḥ śveva jihvāya ledi kevalam ||379||
mataṅnyan pəṅpə̄ṅən ikiṅ hurip, lavan vnaṅ ta ri kagavayaniṅ dharmasādhana, apan ikaṅ guṇa tuha ṅaranya, atyanta saṅsāranya, anon mara kita vvaṅ matuha, maṅke kramanya, tan vnaṅ matiṅgal viṣaya, apan agə̄ṅ trəṣnānya, ndātan vnaṅ ya ri kabhuktyanya, apan jīrṇna sarvendriyanya, tātan hana pahinya lavan śrəgālātuha tan pahuntu, trəṣnā riṅ tahulan, kevala dinilaknya ikaṅ tahulan, deniṅ trəṣnānya riṅ āsvadamātra, maṅkana papaḍanikaṅ vr̥ddha kāmuka, lavan ikaṅ srəgālātuha tan pahuntu, arah tan vnaṅ amgat gə̄ṅniṅ trəṣnānya.

āsannataratāṁ yāti mr̥tyuryāti dine |
āghātaṁ nīyamānw vadhyasyeva pade pade ||380||
alupa ta juga yan katkan pāti, apan ikaṅ sarvabhāva, tan hana pahinya lavan vvaṅ doṣān vinava riṅ pamaṅgahan, rūpaniṅ salaṅka-salaṅkahan palvaṅ huripnya, maṅkana tikaṅ sarvabhava, savṅi-savṅin palvaṅ huripnya, maṅkin aparə pātinya.

idametatkariṣyāmi tata etadbhaviṣyati |
saṅkalpaḥ Kṝ yo’yaṁ na taṁ mr̥tyuḥ pratīkṣate ||381||
tātan kna tinulat ikaṅ mr̥tyu ṅaranya, tan paṅantyakən svabhāvanya, mataṅnyan salah ikaṅ viveka kumva, ikaṅ gavayənkva sakaR̥ṅ, rmah gavayənkva tikaṅ dharmasādhana, hayva ta maṅkana, pəṅpə̄ṅan usənakna ta pva ikaṅ puṇyakarma, sāvakaniṅ dharmasādhana.

y8 Fṇ pakvṇ nāny9 patanādbhayam |
t8 narṇ jātṇ nāny9 maraṇādbhayam ||382||
apan tan hana prasiddha vighnaniṅ kāryya, len saṅkeṅ mr̥tyu, saṅkṣepanya, mr̥tyu vastuniṅ kinatakutan, kāraṇaniṅ agaravalan aməṅpə̄ṅa gumavayaṅ dharmasādhana kārya, kady aṅganiṅ vavahan, tan hana avasthā hinernika len sakeṅ tibā, maṅkana taṅ vastu hana, niyata makāvasānaṅ taya juga ya.

nāprāptakālo mriyate viddhaḥ śaraśatairapi |
tr̥ṇāgreṇāpi saṁspr̥ṣṭaḥ prāptakālo na Jati ||383||
hana ādin pūrvakarmaphala tinūtniṅ mr̥tyun paṅhiṅan, śaṅkukāla vinava rəṅəhnya, apan yadyapin syuha jarjarita śarīranikaṅ vvaṅ deniṅ hru, yan tan prāptāvasara, tan tka niṅ śaṅkunya, tan māti ika, kalarasa riṅ tuṅtuṅniṅ dukutmatra tuvi, dadi ika māti, yan prāptakāla.

mr̥tyurjarā ca rogaśca dSpha़् cānekKāpha |
anuṣaktā yadā debe kiṁ svastha iva tiṣṭhati ||384||
saṅkṣepanikiṅ dadi, kinuñcaṅ iṅ lara prihati, tan vuruṅ māti, vruh pva kitān maṅkana purihnya, hayva ta humnəṅ, hayva aṅinak-inak, sumukhākənan tan sukha ṅaranika.

tiṣṭhatāṁ ca śayānaṁ ca mr̥tyuranveti vai yadā |
kiṁ palvale matsya iva sukhaṁ svapiṣi putraka ||385||
apan ikaṅ mr̥tyu ṅaranya, tumūt juga ya aṅintayirikiṅ sarvabhāva, riṅ paluṅguhan, riṅ paturvan, riṅ pamaṅanan, riṅ paran, hana juga ya aṅikū, an maṅkana, apa ta kāraṇanta aṅinak turu, apan tan hana pahinta maṅkā lavan ivak riṅ tunahan.

aviśrāmamapātheyamanālambhamadeśakam |
tamaḥkāntāramadhvānaṁ kathameko gamiṣyasi ||386||
lavan ta vaneh, niyata juga lakvanta, ikaṅ lakvana, atyanta riṅ durgama, tan paparāryanan, tātan hanaṅ bhakta ṅaranya, mvaṅ tan hanaṅ bhujālamba, tkən, gəgvan, prakāra, tan hana tinañan, ptəṅ pəpət tan panon rāt, yatika lakvananta, tānuṅga-nuṅgal, apa ta dāyanta, apa aṅən-aṅəntat lakvana ika, mataṅnyan puṇyakarma usənaknanta, pilih paramajñān, sahāyanta.

yadā viṣamajñaḥ sthiraścalekṣaṇaḥ prasaktahikkaḥ śvasanantavistitaḥ |
tamo mahaścvabhramivābhinīyase tadā kva bhavānkva bandhavāḥ ||387||
lavan ta vaneh, ri kālanta vismr̥ti, nrānta hilaṅ tuturta, aṅadəg matanta, asriṅ sgantāmka syambəkan, tumama riṅ ptəṅ tan pagamlan, ndita paranika strīnta, vkānta, kadaṅta, ekākī juga kitat laku.

purā jarā kalevaraṁ vijajarīkaroti te |
balāṅarūpahariṇi vidhatsva sauKaṁ nidhim ||388||
saṅkṣepanya, ikiṅ tuha ya aṅusi, paṅhilaṅakən kayauvanan, ya taṅ durbalākən śarīra, hilaṅ taṅ kaśaktin, rūpa, tka riṅ yāvat sarvāvayava, jīrṇananā sahananya, vruh pva tika ri niyatanika, mataṅnyan yatnā ta kita kəkəsa kalyan mās maṇik, ika taṅ kalyan liṅ mami, sukr̥takarma ika, salvirniṅ puṇyakarma.

hiraṇyaratnasañcayaḥ śubhā śubhena sañcitāḥ |
na tw dehasaṅkṣaye B्2i Kya़sādhakāḥ ||983||
apan ikaṅ vibhava, hiraṇyaratnādi, śubhā-śubhakarma humanakənya, tan vnaṅ ika sādhana, tumulakaṅ lara, tuha, pāti.

aṇīpha़् yauvanaṁ ऱ्pha़् Jitaṁ dravyasañcayaḥ |
ārogyaṁ priyasaṁvāso gr̥ddhyedyo na sa paṇḍitaḥ ||390||
anitya pva ikaṅ kayauvanan, rūpa, jīvita, ṅuniveh salvirniṅ vibhava, dhānyarajatavastrādi, si tayaniṅ lara, mvaṅ priyacamāgama, anitya ika ta kabeh, mataṅnya tan jnək saṅ paṇḍita irika.

na viśvasyādalpatayaṁ vahni vyādhivisadvasām |
tathaiva ca mahattāyamārogyavibhavāyuṣām ||391||

ko hi nāma manuṣyeṣu jānannapi vicakṣaṇaḥ |
hariṇīpadamātreṇa carmaṇā na khalīkr̥taḥ ||432||
nāṅ pati, nāṅ pracaṇḍānila, aṅin adr̥s tan paṅkura, nāṅ saṅ hyaṅ mr̥tyū, nāṅ vaḍavānala, apuy ahulu kuḍu, ri ḍasa riṅ pātāla, nāṅ laṇḍəpiṅ kuva-kuva, nāṅ kālakūṭa viṣa, nāṅ vyālasarpa, nāṅ prakupitāgni, apuy dumilah kātara, paturunan ika kabeh, yatika strī ṅaranya, pilih salahsikinika kabeh, tattvanikaṅ sinaṅgah strī.

prasvedamaladigdhena vahata mūtraśoṇitam |
vraṇena vivr̥tenaiva sarvamandhīkr̥taṁ jagata||433||
apan ikaṅ strī, tka asih agalak matanya, liṅnikaṅ kāmuka, vastuniṅ apus-apus tambaluṅ, śaṅkalaniṅ mūdha juga ya, kadyangganiṅ jāla, pukət, payaṅ, an hinanakən bandhanā paṅalap ivak, mvaṅ kadi kuruṅaniṅ manut, an hinalakən pañjaranikaṅ manuk.

kūlāni nāsya pātyante na kathamapi khanyate |
khanakaiva kṣayaṁ yāti balena ca dhanena ca ||434||
tātan hana tan yogya parana, deniṅ strī ṅaranya, tan yogya mara irika, apan mamaṅke gatiṅku, kunaṅ ika, mamaṅkana gatinya, mamaṅkana katvaṅanya, tātan katkan viveka maṅkana, ikaṅ strī ṅaranya, mara juga ya, mvaṅ tan pruh ta ya riṅ atuha riṅ anvam, tātan huniṅa ya riṅ surūpa lavan virūpa, jalu-jalu ta pva iki, maṅkana juga liṅnyan tkākən ṅaganya.

yānyeva malavāhīni pūticchidrāṇi yoṣitām |
tānyeva khalu kāmyāni aho puṁsāṁ viḍambanā ||435||
saṅkṣepanikiṅ strī, durācāra juga ya, tan kavnaṅ sinəṅkəran, yadyapin sinəṅkəran, vinarah riṅ maryādā yukti, apan tan saṅka ri pamātihnyān vinarah, mataṅnyan anukūla pakatonanya ri jalunya, kunaṅ prasiddha kāraṇanya ri denyan tan kināryya juga, nora mujuk-mujuki ya, pilih deniṅ takutnya kunaṅ, pilih paribhāva, kāraṇanyan maṅkan.

yoṣitāṁ na kathā śravyā na nirīkṣyā nirambarāḥ |
kadāciddarśanāttāsāṁ durbalānāviśedrajaḥ ||436||
yadyapin ikaṅ aji kavruh bhagavān śukra, mvaṅ ikaṅ aji kavruh bhagavān vrəhaspati, dadya ika kalih memana, kavaśa niyatanika bhyāsan, sāri-sāri lolyan kayatnākna, kunaṅ buddhiniṅ strī, vkasniṅ durglāhya juga ya, tar knenaku kakavaśanya, yadyapin lolyan sāri-śari kayatnākna, hrətśalya mata saṅlulun umapa ta kunəṅ tkapan ika saṅ vvaṅ rumakṣa ya.

mātrā svasrā duhitrā vā na viviktāsano bhaveta|
balavānindriyagrāmo vidvāṁsamapi karṣati ||437||
tan pakabsuran mata saṅ hyaṅ apuy ṅaranira, yadyapin sahananiṅ kayu, satumuvuh riṅ bhūrmaṇḍala, yan tibākna ri sira, ivəṅ tan trəptyanira, maṅkin vr̥ddhi juga dilaḥnira denika, maṅkana taṅ tasik, tan pakavarəgan uminum vvai riṅ lvah, maṅkana saṅ hyaṅ mr̥tyu, tan pakabsuran umaṅan hurip niṅ sarvabhāva, maṅkana tikaṅ strī ṅaranya, tan pakabsuran juga rāganya riṅ saṅga.

rāgadveṣa[sampādyatām] kotarāgni yathāśeṣaṁ samūlaṁ pādapaṁ daheta|
dharmārthaṁ ca tathā loke rāgadveṣo vināśayeta||438||
tan həntya mata doṣanikaṅ strī yan varṇan, yadyapin hana vvaṅ aliḍaha sevu, māyuṣa ta ya sātus tahun, hayva ta ya salah gave, doṣaniṅ strī kevala varṇananya, ivə̄ṅ tan həntya, akāntaṅ katkan pāti.

kāmo bandhanamevaikaṁ nānyadastīha bandhanam |
kāmabandhanamukto hi brahmabhūyāya kalpate ||439||
lavan ikaṅ strī ṅaranya, apuy vaṅba paḍanya, kunaṅ ikaṅ jalu-jalu ṅaranya, paḍa lavan mibāk ika, kaliṅanya, yāvat ikaṅ jalu-jalu sakka aparək irika, niyata syuḥ drava durbala ya, yapvan apagəh ikaṅ vvaṅ riṅ śiṣṭācāra, tan kāveśa denikaṅ strī, niyata nirvikāra ya apəgah riṅ hayu.

yaḥ sandhārayate manyuṁ yo’tivādaṁstitikṣati |
yaśca tapto na tapati sa bhr̥śaṁ śamabhājanam ||440||
tattvanikaṅ strī ṅaranya, sulap, bañcana juga ya, makāvak krodha, kimburu, mataṅnyan denohan ika de saṅ paṇḍita, tan hana pahinya lavan amedhya, bībhatsa, vastu campur.

atathyenocyamānasya kaḥ kopo yanna tattathā |
tathyenāpi hi kaḥ kopo yadanukte’pi tat tathā ||441||
svabhāvaniṅ strī ta ikaṅ magave hala riṅ vvaṅ, lara vrihati pinuharanya, muruṅakən sarvvakārya, eṅət pva saṅ paṇḍita, mataṅnyar yatna juga sira dumohiṅ strī.

rāgābhibhūtaḥ puruṣaḥ kāmena parigamyate |
icchā sañjāyate cādyā tatastr̥ṣṇā pravartate ||442||
hana ta avayava ṅkā yyarvakniṅ strī, atyanta riṅ bībhatsa, vkasniṅ kararəmah, yogya kelika, yukti siṅgahana, hayva ta maṅkana, ra pva tan ya kajnəknikaṅ vvaṅ, hartha akūṅ alulut juga ya irika, an maṅkana ikaṅ vvaṅ, ndya ta kunaṅ duhmaḥ ya vairāgya.

tr̥ṣṇā[sampādyatām] tr̥ṣṇā hi sarvapāpiṣṭhā nityodvega karī nr̥ṇām |
adharmabahulā caiva ghorā pāpānubandhinī ||443||
apan ṅkā riṅ mānuṣaloka, ika saṅ paṇḍita, vicakṣaṇa tuvi, tan hana sira tan dīne kaśmala, kinavaśākən denya avayavaniṅ strī, kulit sasulipatiṅ kidaṅ, pramānānya.

āsannānpurato bhogāndarśá punaḥ punaḥ |
chāgo haritamuṣṭyaiva dūraṁ nīto’smi tr̥ṣṇayā ||444||
ri tṅahnikaṅ kulit sasulipatniṅ kidaṅ, hana ta kani, mṅā tan kneṅ varas, pinakalnaniṅ mūtra, lavan rah, hibkan hariṅət, lavan sarvamala, ya ta aṅde vulaṅun irikaṅ rāt, mūdha vuta tuli ya denya.

yauvanaṁ jarayā grastamārogyaṁ vyādhibhirhr̥tam |
jivitaṁ mr̥tyurabhyeti tr̥ṣṇaikā nirupadravā ||445||
ika taṅ kani, sinuhan sāri-sāri, ndātan trəbis juga ya, tan rubuh piṅgirnya, tātan kna riṅ jro, kālih ikaṅ anuhan juga durbala, hilaṅ śaktinya, hilaṅ māsnya.

jīryanti jīryataḥ keśā dantā jīryanti jīryataḥ |
dhanāśā jīvitāśā ca jīryato ’pi na jīryati ||446||
atyanta riṅ bībhatsa ikaṅ kani liṅ mami, amətvakən sarvamalaniṅ śarīra, kāvaraṇan deniṅ kalā marvuduk lvat-lvat, yatināmuhara kūṅ trəśnā lulut irikaṅ rāt, āścarya mata kami, tan sipi karika bañcananikaṅ loka an maṅkana.

na talloke dravyamasti yattr̥ṣṇāmabhipūrayeta|
samudrakalpaḥ puruṣo na kathañcana pūryate ||447||
mataṅnyan dohana juga ikaṅ strī ṅaranya, tan reṅə̄n ujar-ujarnya, ṅuniveh tan piḍəṅarakna sabisik-bisiknya, hayveniṅət-iṅət, rūpanya, ṅuniveh yan pamunāṅligā, apan kavulatanika, karəṅvani śabdanika, ya amuhara paṅāveśaniṅ rāga.

yathaiva śr̥ṅgaṁ goḥ kāle vardhamānasya vardhate |
tathaiva tr̥ṣṇā vittena vardhamānena vardhate ||448||
hayva tātan yatna, hayva rukva-rukvan aṅucapa varvarn lavan ibunta, vvaṅ sānakta anakta kunəṅ, apan aglis juga paṅāveśan ikaṅ indriyalolya ṅaranya, yadyan saṅ paṇḍita tuvi kākarṣaṇa sira denya.

akartavyeṣvasādhvīva tr̥ṣṇā prerayate janam |
tameva sarvapāpebhyo lajjā māteva rakṣati ||449||
kady aṅganiṅ apuy ri kuvuṅniṅ kayu, an gsəṅ ikaṅ kayu niśeśa aradin tka riṅ lāṅnya, vitnya, vvadnya, maṅkana ta rakətnikaṅ rāgadveśa ri hati, niyata ika maṅlilaṅakən dharma, artha, mokṣa, nitya padulur niṅ rāga, lavan dveṣa, yāvat hanaṅ rāga, tāvat hanaṅ kadveśan.

tr̥ṣṇā lokatrayasyāsya nirvairaparimanthinī |
yaistu nirmokavattyaktā ko daridraḥ ka īśvaraḥ ||450||
lavan ikiṅ rāga, vkasniṅ bandhana ika, ṅliṅ iki tan pakarvva kāraṇaniṅ rāśa, apan ika saṅ luput sakeṅ rāgapāśa, niyata sira mulih riṅ brāhmapada, tadājara, mamara, mabhaya, mamrəyya, pada, brāhma, kṣama, saṅ hyaṅ brāhmapada ṅaranira, tan kataman tuha, lara, bhaya, lāti, nirvvāṇapada ṅaranira vaneh.

yā dustyaja durmatibhiryā na jīryati jīryataḥ |
yo’sau prāṇāntiko rogastāṁ tr̥ṣṇāṁ tyajataḥ sukham ||451||
kunaṅ pakatonan ika saṅ vvaṅ umgat rāganira, yan vnaṅ humrət krodhanira juga, klānta sira ri halahayuniṅ ujar, tātan alara sira yar inavaghāta, sira tika rāganirmukta ṅaranira.

yacca kāmasukhaṁ loke yacca divyaṁ mahatsukham |
tr̥ṣṇākṣayasukhasyaite nārhataḥ ṣoḍaśīṁ kalām ||452||
nya liṅa mami, ikaṅ vvaṅ inapahāsa ri tan doṣanya, pisaniṅu yan tuhva makadoṣa ikaṅ dośa vih, apa ta nimitta nikān agləṅ, apan tan tuhu ikaṅ paṅdūṣaṇa iriya, utuhva kunaṅ ikaṅ paṅapahāsa irikaṅ vvaṅ, apan suṅgah ya maka dāṣa ika, tan yogya ika aglaṅa yadyapin tan ujarana kta ya ri doṣanya, tan apahāsan, ivə̄ṅ juga rakətnikaṅ doṣa iriya, mataṅnyan klākna salahknaniṅ ujar.

eko lobho mahāgrāho lobha pāpaṁ pravartate |
tataḥ pāpādadharmāptistato duḥkhaṁ pravartate ||453||
valuyaknaṅ ujar, ikaṅ vvaṅ yan kāveśa deniṅ rāga, rāga ṅaranya hyun riṅ sarvaviṣaya, kakavaśa pva ya deniṅ rāga, deni ta kāmanika, kāma ṅaraniṅ hyun riṅ āliṅganādi cumbana, rumakət pvaṅ kāma ri hatinya, dadi ta icchānya, icchā ṅaraniṅ hyun riṅ viśeṣa, dadi pva icchānya, mtu ta trəṣnānya.

p.quote:
pāpānāṁ viddhayādhiṣṭhānaṁ lobha eva narottama |
lubdhāḥ pāpaṁ prakurvanti suvidvāṁso’pi mānavāḥ ||454||
ikaṅ trəṣna ṅaranya, salvirniṅ hala hinanākənya, ilik lavan takut pinuharanya, inaku tikān kagə̄ṅṅaniṅ adharma, karəsthas niyata phala kapāpan.

body.p:
asantoṣo’sukhāyaiva lobhādindriyavibhramaḥ |
tato’sya naśyati prajñāṁ vidyevābhyāsavarjitaḥ ||455||
apan kami maṅke, tonənta nirun kami, kinavaśākəniṅ trəṣṇā, inahasākən, vinavanya riṅ kadohan kami, parəknikaṅ bhoga katon maṅiṅin-iṅin ri kami sāri-sāri, tātan hana pahi mami lavan ikaṅ vḍus, iniṅin-iṅin riṅ dukut sāgəm tumūt ta ya maṅgāṅalor aṅidul.

arthānāmarjane duḥkhamarjitānāṁ ca rakṣaṇe |
nāśe duḥkhaṁ kṣaye duḥkhaṁ dhigarthānduḥkhavardhanam ||456||
nāṅ kayauvanan sakarəṅ paməpətniṅ śarīra, tan laṅgəṅ ika, kdə̄ deniṅ tuha, maṅkana ikaṅ ārogya ṅaranya, si tayaniṅ lara, anitya ika, apan aganti lavan lara, maṅkana ikiṅ hurip, anitya ika, apan niyata tka ikaṅ pāti ṅaranya, kunaṅ ikaṅ trəṣṇā, nitya juga pinakasvabhāvanya, apan tan hana humilaṅakən ya, ri pātikta tuvi, tumūt juga ya, yan tan katmu kaklabanya.

vimohyantii sampatsu tāpyantii vipatsu ca |
khedyantiyarjanakāle kadā bhogāḥ sukhāvahāḥ ||457||
nahan yaṅ vvaṅ atuha tonən denta, hilaṅ mara rambutnika, rurū rūkṣā kṣayā rigali, maṅkana huntunya, durbalā lara araṅ apogah, kunaṅ trəṣnānya riṅ hurip lavan riṅ vibhava, tan palvaṅ juga ya, yayā ləṅgaṅ tuṅgəṅ apəgah nirvikāra.

rājataḥ salilād agneś corataḥ svajanād api |
bhayam arthavatāṁ nityaṁ mr̥tyoḥ prāṇabhr̥tām iva ||458||
tātan hana vastu ṅkə riṅ loka, vnaṅa paṅlibkaniṅ trəṣnā, apan ikaṅ vvaṅ agə̄ṅ trəṣnānya, tan hana pahinya lavan tasik, kapva pisaniṅun kna riṅ hibək.

yathā hyāmiṣamākāśe pakṣibhiḥ śvapadairbhuvi |
bhakṣyate salile matsyaistathā sarveṇa vittavāna||459||
apan ikaṅ trəṣnā ṅaranya, agə̄ṅ juga ya, mavuvuh pva ikaṅ vibhava, sāvakaniṅ kinatrəṣnān, humvat ta ya maṅkin agə̄ṅ, kadi kramaniṅ suṅuniṅ ləmbu, an maṅkin humvat, tumvat ikaṅ ləmbu makasuṅu ya, humvat kramanya maṅkin agə̄ṅ, maṅkana tikaṅ trəṣnā, maṅkin agə̄ṅ ri hvatnikaṅ kinatrəṣnān.

sañcaye ca vināśānte maraṇānte ca jivitā |
saṁyoge viprayogānte ko vitte praṇayenmanaḥ ||460||
mvaṅ tan hana pahinikaṅ trəṣnā lavan strī kaśmala aṅavaśākən svāmī, vnaṅ kumon ikaṅ svāmī makolaha ṅulah tan yukti, kunaṅ apan ikaṅ iraṅ, paḍa lavan ibu, ya ta rumakṣa ikaṅ vvaṅ tumaṅgahi ya makolahaṅ vipatha, saṅkṣepanya, vvaṅ tarkneṅ iraṅ, maṅka makolahaṅ anyāya, deniṅ paṅavaśaniṅ trəṣnanya.

parityajya priyānprāṇānpraviśanti raṇājire |
puruṣāḥ preṣyatāmanye nirgacchanti dhanārthinaḥ ||461||
paramārthanikaṅ trəṣnā, ahala paṅāveśanya, mataṅnyan hanaṅ praṅ, tukar, halaniṅ ambəkiṅ triloka, paṅāveśaniṅ trəṣnā kaliṅan ika, kunaṅ irika saṅ vvaṅ mgat paṅapusniṅ trəṣnā, tan hanaṅ vaira ṅaranya, tātan hanaṅ daridra, tātan hanaṅ sugih ṅaranya ri sira, mvaṅ tan kataman prihati.

doṣāśrayamapāyāntamācāryayatiaṁ kāmayeta kaḥ |
yatsampattau vipattau vā janayatyeva vikriyām ||462||
ndya kari vastuniṅ trəṣnā ṅaranya, nya apan tahan kvaṅujar, nihan ikaṅ tan pāvak, an katon apagəh rakətnya riṅ avak, tar kna siniṅgahan, luput inilagan evəh katiṅgalanya deniṅ durbuddhi, an rakət riṅ śarīra, tātan ilu śīrṇa ri duvəgnya an śīrṇa durbala ikaṅ śarīra andəlanya tuvi, lara dhīra anavanakən, karakət riṅ śarīra, ndaḥ yatika si trəṣnā ṅaranya, kavaśā pva ri katiṅgalan ika denta, yatiku prasiddhaniṅ anmu sukha ṅaranya.

trayo madā mahārāja mohyantiyavicakṣaṇam |
striyo’nnapānamācāryayatiaṁ teṣu saktā na jāgrati ||463||
apayapan ikaṅ sukha, kavaṅun deniṅ kabhuktyaniṅ pañcaviṣaya, ṅke riṅ martyaloka, lavan ikaṅ sukha, kavaṅun deniṅ kabhuktyaniṅ pañcaviṣaya riṅ suraloka, ika taṅ sukha kālih, yatika pisanakna piṇḍan, tahil-tahilana ta ya, makalayanaṅ trəṣnākṣayasukha, trəṣnākṣayasukha ṅaranya, hana ya sukha katmu, makanimitta hilaṅniṅ trəṣnā vkasniṅ sinaṅgah sukha ika, yatika trəṣnākṣayasukha ṅaranya, yatika vrātana, tahilana lavan ikaṅ sukha kālih, ndan pisaniṅu hana pahiriban ikaṅ sukha kālih denya, yadyan panəmbəlasanya tuvi, ivə̄ṅ juga soran ikaṅ sukha kālih denya.

sampadaḥ pramadāścaiva taraṅgotsaṅgabhaṅgurāḥ |
kastāsvahiphanachattrachāyāsviva ramedbudhaḥ ||464||
ṅhiṅ si trəṣnā tikaṅ manuvuhakən kalobhan, tātan hana bhedanikaṅ kalobhan lavan vuhaya, ri kapvan krura aṅləmakən riṅ saṅsāra, tumuvuh pvaṅ kalobhan, mtu taṅ buddhipāpa, ikaṅ buddhipāpa, ya tikāmaṅun adharma, ikaṅ adharma, ya ta phaladuhkha, nivandhaniṅ amukti lara prihati ika ta.

mā tāta vistaraṁ kārṣīḥ sampadbhiḥ pravimohitaḥ |
svargātrānyapi bhārāya bhavanti vidhiparyaye ||465||
saṅkṣepanikaṅ trəṣnā manuvuhakən kalobhan, ikaṅ kalobhan, yatika parumahaniṅ sarvapāpa, apan ikaṅ lubdha, vvaṅ sinaputiṅ kalobhan, niyata juga ya mulahakən ikaṅ kapāpan, yadyapin vicakṣaṇa tuvi.

ākiñcanye ca rājye ca viśeṣaḥ sumahānayam |
nityodvigno hi dhanavānsarvaṁ tyaktvā sukhī bhavet ||466||
yāvat mtuṅ kalobhan, niyata tan santoṣanikaṅ vvaṅ, tan santoṣa pva ya ta, niyata ta ya amaṅgaḥ lara prihati, lavan maṅkin vr̥ddhi paṅāveśanikaṅ indriya deniṅ kalobhan, maṅāveśa pvaṅ indriya, hilaṅ taṅ kaprajñān, mvaṅ salvirniṅ aji paṅavruhnikaṅ vvaṅ, kadi kramaniṅ aji tan sinvādhyāya.

na hi saṁśayavānkacciddr̥śyate nirupadravaḥ |
tyajate sañcayāstasmātparajñaḥ kleśaṁ sahaiva ca ||467||
lavan ta vaneh, agə̄ṅ ikaṅ prihati ri kālaniṅ maṅarjana, prabhāvaniṅ kalobhān ika, siddha pva deniṅ maṅarjana, molih atah patəṅpa-təṅpaṅiṅ animtim, navuvuh taṅ prihati ri karakṣanya, apayapan sarvābhiśaṅkī juga ṅvaṅ mamṅa-mṅan artha, katuhvan tan apilih īrṣyā, krodha akira-kira riṅ hala, malvaṅ pva ya saṅkapisan, pinakabyaya dadah ri kaparipūrṇa paknanya, ṅuniveh yan alvaṅ deniṅ kativasan, ndah tan sipi ta denya amaṅun lara prihati, rasa atuṅtuṅa pāti, saṅkṣepanikaṅ artha, kaśmala juga ya, sāvasthān pamaṅun duhkha.

pratyūhapataho rājñaḥ sāmānyapuravāsibhiḥ |
mā maivamiti yo bhāvaḥ sa tasya prītikārakaḥ ||468||
nihan ta denikaṅ artha, ri duvəgnyan paripūrṇa siddha saphala nirvighna kārjananya, samaṅkana ta yan paṅde vulaṅun anuvuhakən mada, katkan pva ya vighna, malvaṅ hilaṅ kunaṅ, irika ta yan pagave manastāpa asama-sama tan sipi, ṅuni ri kālanyan inarjana pinrih kinārya, tan ucapən gə̄ṅiṅ denyāgave prihati, aṅhel ta saṅhulun maṅiṅət-iṅət, kapan ta kunaṅ ikaṅ bhogan panukha, ru haturnyan kinārya kinalarākən, liṅ mami maṅkana arah glāna.

arthāṁśca durlabhānloke kleśāṁśca sulabhāṁstathā |
duḥkhaṁ caiva kuṭumbārthaṁ yaḥ paśyati sa mucyate ||469||
mvaṅ tan apilih, katakutnika saṅ makdr̥byaṅ dhana ṅaranira, apayapan saṅśaya sira, ri saṅ prabhu, riṅ vvai riṅ apuy, riṅ maliṅ, riṅ kadaṅ, kapva kasaṅśaya saṅ mamās ika kabeh, kadyakgan saṅ hyaṅ mr̥tyu, an kinasaṅśayākən deniṅ sarvabhava.

alaṁ parigraheṇaiva doṣavānsaparigrahaḥ |
kr̥mirhi koṣakāro hi badhyate svaparigrahāta||470||
tātan hana pahinika saṅ mamās lavan dagiṅ reṅreṅ, sakvanyan kepvan, ndā yan uṅgva riṅ ākāśa, manuk mata katakutnya, o yan uṅgva riṅ lmah, śr̥gāla katakutnya, o yan uṅgva riṅ vvai, ikan katakutnya, saṅkṣəpanya, sakvanyan tan sukha apan tan apilih kasaṅśanya, maṅkana ta saṅ sugih ṅaranira.

yāvataḥ kurute jantuḥ sambandhānmanasaḥ priyāna|
tāvanto’sya vidhīyante hr̥daye śokaśaṅkavaḥ ||471||
saṅkṣiptaniṅ vuvus mami, ri sḍəṅnyan anitya ikaṅ sarvabhāva, makāntaṅ apasaha marikaṅ apupul, mvaṅ ikaṅ mapupul, avayava lavan avayavaṅ, vyaktinya, nāṅ avayava pāṇipādādi, inaku papasahnika jmah, lavan avayavaṅnya, ikaṅ śarīra, maṅkana ikaṅ hurip ṅaranya, niyata makāvasānaṅ pāti ika, maṅkana tikaṅ saṅyoga, niyata makāntaṅ viprayoga ika, vruh pva kita ri tan ləṅgaṅniṅ hana, mvaṅ ri tan hananiṅ ləṅgaṅ, ndya ta kāraṇaniṅ svaṅkāra amrih aṅusir vibhava, ndyaṅ prihən, ndyaṅ amriha, ndyaṅ pamrihakna.

mānasaṁ duḥkhamūlaṁ tu sneha ityabhidhīyate |
snehācca sajjate janturduḥkhayogamupatti ca ||472||
apan hana vvaṅ humaran-haran huripnya, māti riṅ palagan, saṅka ri svīkāranya aṅusir vibhava, dudū taṅ niṣkāraṇa humulunakən avaknya amrih sevaka, deniṅ hyunya riṅ vibhava.

putradārakuṭumbeṣu naktāḥ sīdanti jantavaḥ |
saraḥpaṅkārṇave magnā jīrṇā vanagajā iva ||473||
niyata amaṅun aiśvarya tikaṅ vibhava ṅaranya, aiśvarya ṅaraniṅ si vaśa, apan basa-basa aṅavaśākən kramanikaṅ vvaṅ deniṅ vibhava, parumahaniṅ doṣa tikaṅ aiśvarya ṅaranya, yayadyan tan ləṅgaṅ hananya, tan vuruṅ agave cittavikāra, hilaṅnya, hananya tuvi, an maṅkana tattvanikaṅ aiśvarya, syapa ta amseriya.

etattaddurjayaṁ loke putradāramayaṁ viṣam |
jāyante ca mriyante ca yatpītvā mohitāḥ prajāḥ ||474||
tuvi pva yan pamaṅun mada, apan tiga prasiddhaniṅ amaṅun mada, ikaṅ amuhara vulaṅun riṅ apuṅguṅ, pratyekanya, strī, annapānādi bhoga, aiśvarya, nahan taṅ amaṅun mada, hana pva jnək irika, ya tika aturu tan vriṅ rāt ṅaranya.

svadehajānasvasaṁjñānyadvadaṅgātkr̥mīṁstyajeta|
svasaṁjñānasvajāṁstadvatsutasaṁjñānkr̥mīṁstyajeta||475||
ikaṅ vibhava, lavan strī, paḍa ika mvaṅ patapatahniṅ yark, ri kapva cañcalākalis eṅā polahnya, an maṅkana, saṅ apa ta sira paṇḍita jnəkeriya, apan tan pabheda pavehnya sukha, lavan sukhaniṅ maṅə̄b ri kivikniṅ vyāla sarpa.

yatra sneho bhayaṁ tatra sneho duḥkhasya bhājanam |
snehamūlāni duḥkhāni tasmiṁstyakte mahatsukham ||476||
saṅkṣipta, hayva vulaṅun, tat lvi-lvih aṅarjana vibhava, saduvəg-duvəg ta ya, apan ikaṅ avak tuvi, dadi ika amuhara cukər, tat vnaṅ ri kavavanya, keṅvanya, katuluṅanya, yan ya tkā lalisniṅ vidhivaśa.

svajane na ca te cintā kāryā mokṣabuddhinā |
ime mayā vinā tāta bhaviṣyanti kathā nviti ||477||
ātyanta bheda marikaṅ kadaridran, lavan karatun, apan ika saṅ makadr̥byaṅ lakṣmī, hana juga posikni hatinira, kunaṅ ika saṅ tyantaparigraha, makadr̥byaṅ kadaridran, sira vastuniṅ amaṅgih sukha, apan nisaṅśaya solahnira.

svayamutpadyate jantuḥ svayameva vivardhate |
sukhaduḥkhaṁ tathā mr̥tyuṁ svayamevādhigacchati ||478||
apan sakvehnika saṅ mamās, sahananika saṅ maṅarjana abhyudaya, tan hana juga sira katon nirvighna, maṅkana pva ya ta, mataṅnya deyanika saṅ meṅət, tiṅalakna sira jugekaṅ artha, ilagana ikaṅ kleśa.

yathā kāṣṭhaṁ ca kāṣṭhaṁ ca sameyātāṁ mahodadhau |
sametya ca vyatīyātāṁ tadvadbhūtasamāgamaḥ ||479||
manah kta nimittaniṅ sukhaduhkhan katmu, nahan yaṅ paḍahi sajiniṅ rājya, maṅgala saṅ prabhu, sāmānya sahananikaṅ vvaṅ riṅ antahpura rumṅə̄ ya, hana pva kumva vivekanya, tan grāhī, karəṅə̄ mara ya deṅku, hilaṅ pāpaṅku denika, ya ika sukha denika.

evaṁ putrāśca jñātayaḥ suhr̥dastathā |
atisneho na kartavyo viprayogo dhruvo hi taiḥ ||480||
lavan ta vaneh, ika saṅ meṅət riṅ tlu, apanniṅ tlu, nya durlabhaniṅ artha, sulabhaniṅ kleśa, duhkhaniṅ maṅrakṣa kutumba, nahan tāvakniṅ tlu, saṅ yatna ri kālocitanika, sira tika luput tan kapāśa.

mokṣaḥ[sampādyatām] mātr̥pitr̥sahasrāṇi putradāraśatāni ca |
yuge yuge vyatītāni kasya te kasya vā vayam ||481||
mataṅnyan tiṅgalakna kaparigrahaniṅ sarvavastu, apan agə̄ṅ halaniṅ mamarigraha, tonənta, nāṅ ulər magave bsar, huruṅ pinarigrahanya, ya mara nimittanyān kabanḍa vkasan.

nāyamatyantasaṁvāso labhyate jātu kenacita|
api svena śarīreṇa kimutānyena kenacita||482||
ikaṅ vvaṅ magəhakən rakətniṅ vastu kāsihnya, kāptanya ri hatinya, tamolah maṅhə̄t-hə̄t prihati, mamakə̄ hatinya riṅ lipuṅ ṅaranya.

adarśanādāpatitāḥ punaścādarśanaṁ gatāḥ |
na te tava na teṣāṁ tvaṁ tatra kā paridevanā ||483||
apan ikaṅ sih ya ika mūlaniṅ prihati, sih nimittaniṅ kahrət tavandhana, prastāvaniṅ anmu duhkha tika.

naṣṭe dhane vā dāre vā putre pitari vā mr̥te |
aho kaṣṭamiti dhyāyañ śokasyāpacitiṁ careta||484||
rumakət pva sihnikaṅ vvaṅ riṅ anak, rabi, mvaṅ kuṭumba, manhər tika kakləm evəh kāntasanya, paḍa lavan liman atuha kaptək riṅ aəṇḍut.

mr̥taṁ vā yadi vā naṣṭaṁ yo’tītamanuśocati |
duḥkhena labhate duḥkhaṁ dvāvanarthau prapadyate ||485||
ṅhiṅ sihniṅ mānak marabi, matikaṅ paramārtha viṣa ṅaranya, riṅ rāt, śakti tar kna tinamban, apan sakvehnika saṅ tlas kna denya, bhrānta saṅsāra vulaṅun juga ya, kedər avaluy-valuy riṅ bhāvacakra haməṅanya.

bhaiṣajyametadduḥkhasya yadetannānucintayeta|
cintyamānaṁ hi na vyeti bhūyaścāpi pravartate ||486||
hana mara vastu mtu saṅkeṅ śarīra, ndātan inatu ya denikaṅ maśarīra, tan svaṅku ika, tan sapaku lavan ika, maṅkana liṅnyan āryyakən ya, krimi ika maṅkana kramanya, mtu saṅkeṅ śarīranika, tiniṅgalakən tan inatunya deniṅ maśarīranika, hana tātan mtu saṅkeṅ śarīra, ndān inaku svā denikaṅ maśarīra, anuṅku ika, sapaku lavan ika maṅkana liṅnya, putra ika maṅkana, ya tika tiṅgalakna, kadi kramanikaṅ krimi, mavan hana mata marəknikaṅ krimi, apan sākṣāt mtu saṅkeṅ śarīra, tathāpi tiniṅgalakən, pruh pva tika an dedeniṅ manah ika, mataṅnyan ika sādhananta amgatāsih niṅ mānak arabi.

dhanaṁ vā puruṣaṁ rājanpuruṣo vā punardhanam |
avaśyaṁ prajahātyetattadvidvānmānusaṁśayet ||487||
yan ikaṅ vastu kāsih, ika hetuniṅ bhayan katmu, apan parumahaniṅ duhkha ikaṅ sih ṅaranya, saṅkṣiptan ikaṅ sih vvitnikaṅ duhkha ta pva ya, tiṅgalakna pva ika, katmu taṅ parama sukha.

purastādeva te buddhiriyaṁ kāryā vijānataḥ |
anityaṁ sarvamevedamahaṁ ca mama cāsti yata||488||
hayva ta aṅaṅən-aṅən sambandha, kadaṅ varga, ya ta sādhyaṅ kamokṣan, liṅanta mapa ta lviran iki kabeh ri tayaṅku, liṅanta maṅkana, hayva tika.

anityatve kr̥tamatirmlānamālyena śocati |
nityatve kr̥tabuddhistu bhinnabhāṇḍe’nuśocati ||489||
apan tan prasiddhakāraṇa ṅaranya, lena saṅkeṅ avak, ikiṅ śarīra paramārthakāraṇa, ikiṅ dadi kabeh, avaknya kāraṇaniṅ hananya, vr̥ddhi pva ya , nirvighna tke katuhanya, avaknya juga kāraṇanika, manmu pva ya sukhaduhkha, pāti, prihati, avaknya atah kāraṇanika, apan pūrvakarma tinūtnika kabeh.

svayamutpadyate vahniḥ paritastena vahninā |
dahyamānaṁ parītāpaṁ bhajate na sa paṇḍitaḥ ||490||
kady aṅganiṅ vataṅ kahala makambaṅan riṅ tasik, dadi ya kacuṇḍuka apaṅgih lavan kapvanya vataṅ, niyatanya apasah muvah, dadi taya apaṅgih muvah, maṅkana ta papaṅgihnikaṅ sarvabhava, lavan kapranya, anitya ika, niyata makāntaṅ mapasah, dadi ta ya apaṅgih muvah.

sukhaṁ ca duḥkhaṁ ca bhavābhavau ca lābhālābhau maraṇaṁ jīvitaṁ ca |
paryāyaśaḥ sarvamiha spr̥śanti tasmāddhīro naiva tapyenna hr̥ṣyet ||491||
maṅkana tikaṅ anak, putu, puyut, kadaṅ, mitra, rinakva, papaṅgih ta ya lavan ika kabeh, irikaṅ sakṣaṇa tuvi, niyata apasah avasānanika, mataṅnyan hayva tībra karaktan māsih.

sukhamāpatitaṁ sevanduḥkhamāpatitaṁ bhaja |
kālaprāptamupāsīta sasyānāmiva karṣakaḥ ||492||
anādi ktaṅ janma ṅaranya, tan kinavruhan təmbenya, luput kinalakaran, vilaṅniṅ janmāntara, mevivut pva bapanta, ibunta, anakta, rabinta, riṅ sayuga-sayuga, paramārthanya, ndyaṅ enak katpətana sānu lavan ika, ndyaṅ tuduhan anunta.

sukhaṁ vā yadi vā duḥkhaṁ bhūtānāṁ paryupasthitam |
prāptavyamavaśaiḥ sarvaṁ parihāro na vidyate ||493||
tātan hana teka nitya patmunya ṅaranya, ikana patmu ika, ikan tan tmu ika, kapva tan laṅgəṅ ika, patmunta lavan ikiṅ śarīranta tuvi, tan laṅgəṅ ika, mapasaha mara don ikiṅ pāṇīpādādi, hayva tenucap ikaṅ len.

sukhasyānantaraṁ duḥkhaṁ duḥkhasyānantaraṁ sukham |
paryāyeṇopavartante naraṁ nemimarā iva ||494||
kta sakeṅ taya marika, muvah ta ya mulih riṅ taya, saṅkṣipta, tan akunta ika, ika tan sapa lavan kita, an maṅkana, apa tojara, apa polaha.

jñānavāneva puruṣaḥ saṁyuktaḥ parayā dhiyā |
udayāstamayajño hi na śocati na hr̥ṣyati ||495||
hilaṅ pva mās, māti pvaṅ anak, rabi, bapa, ibu, ikāna tlas paratra, atiśaya ta gə̄ṅnikaṅ lara, mvaṅ duhkhaniṅ hati eṅət pva kitān maṅkana, gavayənta tikaṅ tambāniṅ duhkha.

prajñayā mānasaṁ duḥkhaṁ hanyācchārīramauṣadhaiḥ |
etaddhi jñānasāmarthyaṁ na bālaiḥ samatāmiyāta||496||
hana mara vvaṅ kdə̄ maṅən-aṅən ikaṅ māti, vastu hilaṅ kunaṅ, agə̄ṅ prihatinya denya, ika gə̄ṅniṅ prihatinya, yatika amuṅun lara, rva ikaṅ lara kavaṅun denika aṅaṅən-aṅən ikiṅ huvus hilaṅ, ikaṅ vvaṅ maṅkana, ya ta amaṅun hala ṅaranya.

mānasena hi duḥkhena śarīramupatapyate |
ayaḥpiṇḍena taptena kuMBhasaṁsthāmivodakam ||497||
nyaṅ prasiddha tambāniṅ prihati, kramanya, ikaṅ vastu hilaṅ, luṅhā, māti kunaṅ, tan siddha kārjananya kunaṅ, yatika tan aṅən-aṅən, apan apəgah rakətnya ri hati yan inaṅən-aṅən, rumakət pva ya, maṅkin avuvuḥ kramanya, ya ta anuvuhakən prihati, mataṅnya hayva ika inaṅən-aṅən.

mānasaṁ śamayettasmājjñānenāgimivāmbunā |
praśānte mānase hyasya śārīramupaśāmyati ||498||
pilih saṅ mamās tumiṅgalakən māsnya, pilih ikaṅ mās tumiṅgalakən saṅ mamās, upalakṣaṇa riṅ asiṅ masambandha, tan laṅgəṅ ta pva patmuniṅ sānu mvaṅ anunya, pruh pva saṅ paṇḍiterika, mataṅnyan tan karantan sira.

saṁvidrate na valayaḥ palitāni na jānate |
prajñāvabodhitatattvānāmavyaparo’tra janmanaḥ ||499||
nyan taṅ buddhi sarvadāya, pagəhakna rumuhun, liṅanya anitya tattvanikaṅ sarvabhāva, iki gatiṅku maṅke, anuṅku nāṅ ikiṅ hana maṅke mne hləm, anitya ika, maṅkana liṅanikaṅ tutur katuturana.

duḥkheṣvanudvignamanāḥ sukheṣu vigataspr̥haḥ |
vītarāgabhayakrodhaḥ sthitadhīrmunirucyate ||500||
ika saṅ eṅət yarnityaniṅ sarvavastu, yadyan aluma ikaṅ skar suhunira, tar akiṅkiṅ sira tar manastāpa, kunaṅ ikaṅ vvaṅ karaktan, tar vavarəṅəh riṅ anityatattva, agə̄ṅ manastāpanika deniṅ viṅle suviṅ.

śokasthānasahasrāṇi bhayasthānaśatāni ca |
divase divase mūḍhamāviśanti na paṇḍitam ||501||
nyaṅ amoṅ apuy, kumuliṅ ri kahananya, kasūban pva ya denikaṅ apuy, maṅga ta ya aṅlampva humiḍəpaṅ panas, deniṅ mūdhanya, tar popāya ri tan sūbanikaṅ panas, ikaṅ vvaṅ maṅkana kramanya, tan paṇḍita ṅaranika apan tātan maṅkana saṅ paṇḍita ṅaranira, mahā sirān pagave duhkhanya avaknira līlā sirān hilaṅakən ya.

buddhilabhāddhi puruṣaḥ sarvaṁ tarati kilbiṣam |
vipāpo labhate sattvaṁ sattvasthaḥ samprasīdati ||502||
tuvi pvan paganti purihnikaṅ sukha mvaṅ duhkha, hana lavan taya, si sugih lavan si daridra, pāti lavan hurip, kapva maganti hananika riṅ dadi, eṅət pva saṅ paṇḍiterika, mataṅnyat tar agiraṅ, tar prihati, laṅgəṅ ahniṅ manahnira.

vasanviṣayamadhye’pi na vasatyeva buddhimāna|
saṁvasatyeva durbuddhiravasan viṣayeṣvapi ||503||
saṅkṣipta, bhuktin tkaniṅ sukha, tkani duhkha bhuktin atika, kaliṅanya, klākna ta pvaṅ sukha duhkha, hayva ta hana kinārya, herakna tkanya sovaṅ-sovaṅ, sambinta taṅ arjana dharmapravr̥tti, kady aṅganiṅ masava-savah, klān sinambinya anahən panastīs, an antyakən usunikaṅ pari.

lohayuktaṁ yathā hema vipakvaṁ na virājate |
tathāpakvakaṣāyasya vijñānaṁ na prakāśate ||504||
tar ?? sini??han ikaṅ sukha duhkha ṅaranya, paṅavaśaniṅ vidhivaśa, kāraṇaniṅ sarvabhāvān panmu sukha mvaṅ duhka.

bījānyagnyupadagdhāni na rohanti yathā punaḥ |
jñānadagdhaistathā keśairnātmā sambadhyate punaḥ ||505||
ikaṅ vidhi ṅaranika, pūrvakarma tinūtnya, səṅkəranya ikaṅ ikaṅ pūrvakarma niyatanya, jātinya ikān pakāvak hala, lavan hayu, mataṅnyan paganti ikaṅ sukhaduhkha ṅaranya, tātan hana pahinikaṅ sarvabhāva lavan catraniṅ guluṅan, niyata kapiṅsor ikaṅ aruhur ṅūni, muvah niyatanika kapiṇḍuhur ikiṅ sor.

śakunānāṁ yathākāśe matsyānāmiva codake |
padaṁ yathā hi dr̥śyeta tathā jñānavidāṁ gatiḥ ||506||
hana pva tuturan maṅkanaṅ tattva, yatika majñā ṅaranya, yāvat pva ikaṅ vvaṅ majñāna, tan rakət ikaṅ hartha lavan prihati ri manahnya, ika ta sinaṅgah paṇḍita ṅaranira.

prajñayā mānasaṁ duḥkhaṁ hanyācchārīramauṣadhaiḥ |
etaddhi jñānasāmarthyaṁ na bālaiḥ samatāmiyāt ||507||
ikaṅ manah maṅkana kramanya, yatika prajñā ṅaranya, ya ta sādhanantat klabakən duhkhaniṅ citta, kunaṅ ikaṅ tambāpalapah, lba guliga akar, prabr̥ti laraniṅ śarīra hilaṅ denya, yatika jñānabala ṅaranya ika, kaśaktiniṅ jñāna, ləvih saṅkeṅ kāyabala, kaśaktiniṅ śarīra.

mānasena hi duḥkhena śarīramupatāpyate |
ayaḥpiṇḍena taptena kumbhasaṁsthāmivodakam ||508||
apan duhkhaniṅ manah anuvuhakəni kalaraniṅ śarira, kady aṅganiṅ vsi tinunu pinanasan, pinasyakən vvai riṅ kumbha, panasnya ya amuhara panas irikaṅ vvai.

mānasaṁ śamayettasmāt prajñāyā’gnimivāmbasā |
praśānte mānase hyasya śārīramupaśāmyati ||509||
mataṅnya duhkhaniṅ manah, prihən paḍəmən riṅ kaprajñān, apan niyata juga hilaṅ deniṅ kaprajñān, kady aṅganiṅ apuy dumilah, niyata paṅəmnika deniṅ vvai, paḍəm pva duhkhaniṅ manah, paḍəm ta haranikaṅ śarīra.

saṁvidrate na balayaḥ palitāni na jānate |
prajñāvabodhitatattvānāmavyaparo’tra janmanaḥ ||510||
tan si tuha ktika vruh, tan syāpusniṅ kus, tan krutniṅ sarvāvayava, tan si huvan, apa pva, si kaprajñān juga, ika si vruh ta riṅ tattva, ya ika kaprajñān ṅaranya, ya ika paṅavruh, kāraṇaniṅ məntasanaṅ bhavasāgara.

duḥkheṣvanudvignamanāḥ sukheṣu vigataspr̥haḥ |
vītaśokabhayakrodhaḥ sthiradhīrmunirucyate ||511||
saṅ kinahananiṅ kaprajñān ṅaranira, tan alara yan panmu duhkha, tan agiraṅ yan panmu sukha, tātan kataman krodha, mvaṅ takut, prihati, laṅgəṅ mah?iṅ juga tuturnira, apar majñāna, muni vi ṅaraniṅ majñāna.

śokasthānasahasrāṇi bhayasthānaśatāni ca |
divase divase mūḍhamāviśanti na paṇḍitam ||512||
mātus-atus, mevivu marikaṅ lara, bhaya, prihati, tka sāri-sāri, ndān hatiniṅ mūdha ināveśanika, kunaṅ ri hati saṅ paṇḍita, pisaniṅu ikān tamā.

buddhilābhāddhi puruṣaḥ sarvaṁ tarati kilbiṣam |
vipāpo labhate sattvaṁ sattvasthaḥ samprasīdati ||513||
apan ika saṅ tlas taməmuṅ kaprajñān, hilaṅ kalaṅkaniṅ jñānanira, niṣkalaṅka pva jñānanira, katmu taṅ sattvaguṇa denira, sattva kevala, tan karaktan rajah tamah, sattva ṅaraniṅ satah bhāvah, si uttamajñāna, citta sat svabhāva, tar ka?nan trəṣnādi, katmu pvaṅ sattvaguṇa denira, prasannātmaka ta sira, tan karakət riṅ śarīra, luput riṅ karmaphala.

vasanviṣayamadhye’pi na vasatyeva buddhimān |
saṁvasatyeva durbuddhiravasan viṣayeṣvapi ||514||
lavan ta vaneh, ika saṅ kinahananiṅ kaprajñān, yadyapin panṅaha riṅ viṣaya sira, kambulana pañcāviṣaya, parəkana bhogopabhoga sāri-sāri, tar jnək juga sira, tan kalāśa denika, tan kadi kramanikaṅ apuṅguṅ, yadyapin atyanta tayanikaṅ viṣaya iriya, pisaniṅu yan kāmbvana bhogopabhoga mātra tuvi, tathāpi jnək juga ya, tan ari harəp-harəp.

lohayuktaṁ yathā hema vipakvaṁ na virājate |
tathā’pakvakaṣāyasya vijñānaṁ na prakāśate ||515||
ika taṅ kaprajñān, yan kavoran malaniṅ jñāna, tan aharəp ika, kady aṅganyaṅ mās hinapi, nda tapran śuddha, turuṅ hana rakətnikaṅ vsi ri ya, tan aharəp ika.

vījānyagnyupadagdhāni na rohanti yathā punaḥ |
jñānadagdhaistathā kleśairnātmā sampadhyate punaḥ ||516||
kunaṅ paramārthanya, hilaṅ ikaṅ kleśaniṅ avak, an pinanasan riṅ jñāna, hilaṅ pvaṅ kleśa, ri katəmvaniṅ samyagjñāna, hilaṅ taṅ janma, mari punarbhava, kady aṅganiṅ vīja, pinanasan sinaṅa, hilaṅ tuvuhnika, mari masəvə̄.

śakunānāṁ yathākāśe matsyānāmiva codake |
padaṁ yathā na dr̥śyeta tathā jñānavidāṁ gatiḥ ||517||
tātan kna livakṣaṇān, tan papakatonan, luput vinikalpa, jñānanika saṅ jñānī ṅaranira, kady aṅganiṅ tapakiṅ manut aṅlayaṅ riṅ ākāśa, tan katon tapaknya riṅ laṅit, mvaṅ ikān tan katon tapaknya riṅ vvai.
